Название: Numerical simulation of time-dependent geminate recombination in polymers
Организации: National Research Nuclear University MEPhI, Moscow 115409, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technological University), Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Korolev, N.A., National Research Nuclear University MEPhI, Moscow 115409, Russian Federation; Nikitenko, V.R., National Research Nuclear University MEPhI, Moscow 115409, Russian Federation; Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technological University), Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Numerical Monte Carlo simulation has been used to calculate the time dependences of the probability of survival of geminate pairs and geminate recombination. The transport of geminate pairs occurs by hopping between centers forming a cubic lattice. Along with isoenergetic centers, the lattice contains a few traps exponentially distributed in energy. The model is applicable to disordered polymers. The dependence of the kinetics of geminate recombination on the initial separation of charges in the pair, the relative concentration of traps, and the characteristic depth of the energy distribution of traps is studied. The limits of applicability of the analytical theory based on the diffusion-drift approximation for the dispersion transport of geminate pairs are established. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Economic diversification and Dutch disease in Russia
Организации: London School of Economics and Political Science, London, United Kingdom; Centre for Advanced Studies, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; University of Paris-Ouest, French Ministry of Economy, Industry and Employment, Paris and OECD Development Centre, Paris, France
Авторы организаций: Dobrynskaya, V., London School of Economics and Political Science, London, United Kingdom, Centre for Advanced Studies, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Turkisch, E., University of Paris-Ouest, French Ministry of Economy, Industry and Employment, Paris and OECD Development Centre, Paris, France
Краткое описание: Despite the impressive economic growth in Russia between 1999 and 2007 there is a fear that Russia may suffer the Dutch disease, which predicts that a country with large natural resource rents may experience de-industrialisation and lower long-term economic growth. This article examines whether there are any symptoms of the Dutch disease in Russia. Using a variety of Rosstat publications and the CHELEM database, we analyse the trends in production, wages and employment in Russian manufacturing industries, and we study the behaviour of Russian imports and exports. We find that, while Russia exhibits some symptoms of the Dutch disease, e.g. the real appreciation of the ruble, the rise in real wages, the decrease in employment in manufacturing industries and the development of the services sector, manufacturing production nonetheless increased, contradicting the theory of the Dutch disease. These trends can be explained by the gains in productivity and the recovery after the disorganisation in the 1990s, by new market opportunities for Russian products in the European Union and in CIS countries, by a growing Chinese demand for some products and by a booming internal market. Finally, investment in many manufacturing industries was largely encouraged, whereas investment in the energy sector was strongly regulated, which contributed to economic diversification. © 2010 Taylor & Francis.
Ключевые слова указателя: economic development; economic diversification; economic growth; export; import; manufacturing; resource use; Russian Federation

Название: Spectral pyrometry of objects with a nonuniform temperature
Организации: Research Institute of Perspective Materials and Technologies, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 115054, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Magunov, A.N., Research Institute of Perspective Materials and Technologies, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 115054, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The temperature of transparent gas flame (T ≈ 1900 K) is determined from the thermal radiation spectrum without using emittance data. The relation connecting the values of temperature calculated from the integrated spectrum of the entire glowing region of the flame with the maximal and arithmetic mean value is considered. Simulation is used to prove that the difference between the measured and maximal temperatures of a nonuniformly heated object in the Wien spectrum detection region does not exceed 10%. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Grach E.P., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: The effect of temperature on carrier transport in molecularly doped polycarbonate
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Grach, E.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The effect of elevated temperature on the pattern of current transients and the hole mobility in polycarbonate doped with 20 and 30 wt % aromatic hydrazone was studied. With the use of homogeneous carrier generation mode, it was found that the shape of the current transient varies with an increase in the temperature in qualitative agreement with the prediction of the multiple-trapping theory with the exponential trap energy distribution. The apparent activation energy of hole mobility is 0.41 eV in the classical measurement mode and 0.55 eV in the case of homogeneous irradiation. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Организации: Higher School, Economics State University, United States
Авторы организаций: Shabanova, M., Higher School, Economics State University, United States
Краткое описание: Business schools in Russia are having to adjust to new demands from students who have different needs and expectations from those of earlier times, and to change the content and educational goals of their curriculums. © 2010 M.E. Sharpe, Inc. All rights reserved.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Ikhsanov R.Sh., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.

Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Research Institute of Scientific Instruments, str. 8, promzona Turaevo, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast 140080, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: The hole transport in polystyrene doped with 15 wt % tritolylamine is studied via the time-of-flight technique in both the surface carrier generation mode and the bulk carrier generation mode. The hole transport is shown to be dispersive with a dispersion parameter value of 0.99 ± 0.03 at room temperature. The results contradict the widely held view that hole transport in this molecularly doped polymer is quasi-equilibrium. The hole mobility is found to be almost independent of the electric-field intensity. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Bulk carrier; Carrier generation; Dispersion parameters; Electric field intensities; Hole transports; Molecularly doped polymers; Quasi-equilibrium; Room temperature; Time-of-flight techniques; Polystyrenes; Hole mobility

Краткое описание: The data on the influence of an applied electric field (field dependence) on the mobility of holes in molecularly doped polycarbonate samples prepared at Eastman Kodak laboratories and at the Institute of Physical Chemistry and Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, were compared. The results were generally close (the dispersive transport and almost coinciding mobilities in medium fields), but, at high fields, substantial differences in the field dependence were observed. This is at variance with the almost universal applicability of the Pool-Frenkel law reported in the literature. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название источника: Journal of Experimental and Theoretical Physics
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Physics, Moscow State University, Moscow 119991, Russian Federation; Institute of Spectroscopy, Russian Academy of Sciences, Troitsk, Moscow oblast 142190, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Popova, E.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Vasil'Ev, A.N., Department of Physics, Moscow State University, Moscow 119991, Russian Federation; Klimin, S.A., Institute of Spectroscopy, Russian Academy of Sciences, Troitsk, Moscow oblast 142190, Russian Federation; Narozhnyi, M.V.; Popova, M.N., Institute of Spectroscopy, Russian Academy of Sciences, Troitsk, Moscow oblast 142190, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The temperature dependences of the heat capacity and optical transmission spectra of quasi-one-dimensional Haldane magnets (Y1-x Nd x )2BaNiO5 (x = 1, 0.75, 0.50, 0.25) have been studied. All the compounds studied undergoes antiferromagnetic ordering. In the ordered state, the internal magnetic field produces splitting of the ground-state Kramers doublet of Nd3+ ion. The temperature dependences of the magnitude of splitting, as determined from spectroscopic data, were used to calculate the Schottky anomaly on the heat capacity curve. Nonequivalent centers related to neodymium ions have been found in compounds with x = 0.75, 0.50, and 0.25. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Авторы: Mirkin B., Nascimento S., Fenner T., Pereira L.M.
Название: A hybrid cluster-lift method for the analysis of research activities
Название источника: Lecture Notes in Computer Science (including subseries Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics)
Организации: School of Computer Science, Birkbeck University of London, London, WC1E 7HX, United Kingdom; Division of Applied Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica, Portugal
Авторы организаций: Mirkin, B., School of Computer Science, Birkbeck University of London, London, WC1E 7HX, United Kingdom, Division of Applied Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Nascimento, S., Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica, Portugal; Fenner, T., School of Computer Science, Birkbeck University of London, London, WC1E 7HX, United Kingdom; Pereira, L.M., Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica, Portugal
Краткое описание: A hybrid of two novel methods - additive fuzzy spectral clustering and lifting method over a taxonomy - is applied to analyse the research activities of a department. To be specific, we concentrate on the Computer Sciences area represented by the ACM Computing Classification System (ACM-CCS), but the approach is applicable also to other taxonomies. Clusters of the taxonomy subjects are extracted using an original additive spectral clustering method involving a number of model-based stopping conditions. The clusters are parsimoniously lifted then to higher ranks of the taxonomy by minimizing the count of "head subjects" along with their "gaps" and "offshoots". An example is given illustrating the method applied to real-world data. © 2010 Springer-Verlag.
Ключевые слова указателя: Classification system; Hybrid clusters; Lift method; Lifting method; Model-based; Novel methods; Real world data; Research activities; Spectral clustering; Spectral clustering methods; Artificial intelligence; Taxonomies; Cluster analysis

Авторы организаций: Litmanovich, A.D., Institute of Petrochemical Synthesis of RAS, Leninsky pr. 29, 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation; Podbelskiy, V.V., Higher School of Economics, Kirpichnaya str. 33/5, 105187 Moscow, Russian Federation; Kudryavtsev, Y.V., Institute of Petrochemical Synthesis of RAS, Leninsky pr. 29, 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An algorithm was developed to generate an ensemble of statistical multiblock AB copolymer chains via a polymer-analogous reaction with acceleration. Ordering in the cylindrical ensemble of such chains is simulated via successive rotation of chains until an arrangement with the maximum energy of attraction between each two nearest chains is attained. The master relation of the ordering and the relations between AA, BB and AB contact fractions were found. Those relations permit to estimate the adequacy of modeling polymers of finite length. Influence of a chain structure, length, and interchain interactions on the ordering efficiency was studied. © 2010 WILEY-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA, Weinheim.
Ключевые слова автора: Block copolymers; Effect of neighboring units; Monte Carlo simulation; Ordering; Polymer-analogous reaction

Название: Distractor effects in perceptual tasks
Организации: Psychological Department SU-HSE, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Utochkin, I.S., Psychological Department SU-HSE, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Distractor's effect (stimulus which is irrelevant at a certain moment and ignored) on task solving efficiency is considered. It is revealed that according to problem situation and connection with target stimulus any distractor can produce two opposite effects: negative - interference and positive - redundancy effect. Distractor effects' classification based on one of possible grounds - distractor's source: sensory inputs effects, hierarchical effects and correlational effects is given. Possibility of level-hierarchical relation between the three classes of effects is discussed.
Ключевые слова автора: Attention; Distractor; Interferention; Redundancy effect

Краткое описание: The creation of hydraulic equipment for locally continuous plastic shaping of a blank is considered. Experimental results regarding a technology that combines upsetting with oscillation (rocking) are presented. © 2010 Allerton Press, Inc.
Ключевые слова указателя: Experimental design; Machine design; Hydraulic machinery

Название: Strategy techniques for the times of high uncertainty
Название источника: Journal for East European Management Studies
Организации: Department of Strategy and Organization, State University-Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gurkov, I., Department of Strategy and Organization, State University-Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper sets out to propose the techniques that enable corporations to develop and to implement robust strategies under conditions of severe uncertainty. Through the correction of the traditional definition of stakeholders I found the general algorithm for achieving robustness in corporate strategies. This algorithm includes: (1) the clear definition of a limited set of the types of stakeholders, (2) the simplification of the sets of stakeholders' claims and discovery of intrinsic benefits common for all stakeholders of a particular type, (3) defining the space of acceptance of corporate performance for each type of stakeholders, (4) finding a non-empty intersection of such spaces for all types of stakeholders. The use of these techniques is illustrated by the new strategy of LUKOIL - one of the major publicly traded oil companies.
Ключевые слова автора: Corporate strategies; Robustness; Strategic planning; Uncertainty

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Grach E.P., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: The effect of charged centers on the transport of charge carriers in molecularly doped polymers
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Grach, E.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The effect of charged centers on the mobility of charge carriers in molecularly doped polycarbonate is experimentally studied by the method of accelerated electrons for the generation of charge carriers in the surface layer and in the polymer bulk. The hypersensitivity of mobility toward the presence of charged sites that is predicted by the theory of correlated disorder (dipolar glass) is not found. With accumulation of charged centers, transformation of the time-of-flight curves with a well-pronounced plateau region, which is indicative of quasiequilibrium transport according to theory, proceeds in full agreement with the classical concepts on the role of a space charge or bimolecular recombination during high-signal irradiation. Transport of charge carriers in the molecularly doped polymer is not quasiequilibrium but dispersive. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Accelerated electrons; Bimolecular recombination; Correlated disorder; Dipolar glass; Molecularly doped polymers; Plateau region; Polymer bulk; Quasi-equilibrium; Space charges; Surface layers; Time of flight; Transport of charge; Charge carriers; Polymers

Название: Oil and gas in the capitals
Организации: EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sapir, J., EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The impact of eurozone economic crisis, the 16 European Union member nations that have adopted the euro as their sole currency, on Russia, is assessed. Russia is impacted due to this crisis as nearly 60% of Russian imports comed from the EU and nearly 50% from the eurozone. It is predicted that the European imports of Russian commodities will be slow in 2011 and expectedly in 2012. A study has found that less than 15 Russian enterprises have borrowed large amounts from European lenders. The Russian energy strategy to 2030, approved in August 2009, is expecting Far East countries to receive 12% of Russian gas exports by 2020 and up to 20% by 2030. Improving upon the 20% of gas exports that Russia expects to send to the Far East by 2030 will require higher investments. Increasing Russia's integration into the EU would allow the implementation of currency swaps between Russia and the European Central Bank.

Краткое описание: The possibility of using periodic pulsed laser radiation for spectral analysis of the thermal properties of multilayer metallic materials is studied. Pulse and frequency characteristics of samples are found. An expression for the transfer constant of a thermal signal in multilayer materials is obtained. A parametric model is used to determine the thermal conductivity of the interface in a three-layer Mo(1 μm)-W(48 μm)-Mo(1 μm) sample from the amplitude-frequency characteristic measured before and after irradiation by 9-MeV electrons. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Brams-Taylor model of fair division for divisible and indivisible items
Организации: State University-Higher School of Economics and International University, Dubna Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Rubchinsky, A., State University-Higher School of Economics and International University, Dubna Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this article, the fair division problem for two participants in the presence of both divisible and indivisible items is considered. Three interrelated modifications of the notion of fair division-profitably, uniformly and equitably fair divisions-were introduced. Computationally efficient algorithm for finding all of them was designed. The algorithm includes repetitive solutions of integer knapsack-type problems as its essential steps. The necessary and sufficient conditions of the existence of proportional and equitable division were found. The statements of the article are illustrated by various examples. © 2010 Elsevier B.V.
Ключевые слова автора: Conflict management; Fairness; Knapsack problem; Negotiation

Название: Peierls substitution and the Maslov operator method
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology, Moscow, Russian Federation; Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Grushin, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology, Moscow, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, S.Y., Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a periodic Schrödinger operator in a constant magnetic field with vector potential A(x). A version of adiabatic approximation for quantum mechanical equations with rapidly varying electric potentials and weak magnetic fields is the Peierls substitution which, in appropriate dimensionless variables, permits writing the pseudodifferential equation for the new auxiliary function:Ev(-iμδx)φ=Eφ where Ev is the corresponding energy level of some auxiliary Schrödinger operator, assumed to be nondegenerate, and μ is a small parameter. In the present paper, we use V. P. Maslov's operator method to show that, in the case of a constant magnetic field, such a reduction in any perturbation order leads to the equation Ev(P̂, μ)φ=Eφ with the operator Ev(P̂, μ) represented as a function depending only on the operators of kinetic momenta P̂j=-iμδx,j+Aj(x). © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова автора: Adiabatic approximation; Kinetic momentum; Peierls substitution; Periodic Schrödinger operator; Pseudodifferential equation; Stationary phase method

Название: On the topological stability of continuous functions in certain spaces related to Fourier series
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lebedev, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We show that the following properties of a continuous function f on the Circle are equivalent: the sequence mathematical equation presented of the Fourier coefficients of the superposition f ○ belongs to the weak l 1 for every homeomorphism h of the circle onto itself; f is a function of bounded quadratic variation. We obtain similar results for spaces of functions whose sequence of Fourier coefficients belongs to the weak l p, 1>p>2, for spaces Ap of functions f with f̂ ε lp, for the Sobolev spaces W2λ, and for other spaces of functions on T. Under rather general assumptions on a space X of functions on the circle, we give a necessary condition for a given continuous function f to stay in X for every change of variable. We also consider the multidimensional case, which is essentially different from the one-dimensional case. In particular, we show that if p > 2 and f is a continuous function on the torus Td, d ≥ 2, such that f ○ h ε Ap(Td) for every homeomorphism h: Td → Td, then f is constant.
Ключевые слова автора: Fourier series; Homeomorphisms of the circle

Название: Quantum geometry and quantum mechanics of integrable systems. II
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For a generic quantum integrable system, we describe the asymptotics of the eigenstate density and of the trace of the evolution operator in all orders of the quantization parameter. This is done by using quantum symplectic geometry, which makes the given quantum system to be equivalent to a deformed classical system with arbitrary accuracy with respect to the quantization parameter. The asymptotics is explicitly given via the deformed symplectic form, deformed Liouville-Arnold tori, and deformed Maslov class. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

The dependence of the critical temperature and the heat capacity of a superconducting system of the surface concentration of electrons and on the radius of the nanotube is studied. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: The role of personality traits in choosing of coping strategies in an organizational conflict
Название источника: World Academy of Science, Engineering and Technology
Организации: Department of Psychology, University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Hachaturova, M., Department of Psychology, University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The article is devoted to personality traits in choosing coping strategies of behavior in an organizational conflict. The research deals with such personality traits as empathy, locus of control, anxiety, self-appraisal and temperament. The author examines the influence of gender, age, working and managerial experience of an employee on the choice of coping strategies.
Ключевые слова автора: Anxiety; Coping strategy; Empathy; Organizational conflict

Название: Magic of the gift in the workplace: Reply to Dodlova and Yudkevich
Организации: Laboratory for Studies in Economic Sociology, Higher School of Economics, Kochnovsky, 3, 125319 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yudin, G., Laboratory for Studies in Economic Sociology, Higher School of Economics, Kochnovsky, 3, 125319 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The article is a reply to M. Dodlova and M. Yudkevich. In their recent paper they undertake an attempt to use the notion of gift in the analysis of principal-agent relationship and to generalize the idea of gift in order to obtain a theory of gift exchange in the workplace. However, the analysis suggested lacks conceptual clarity and rests upon false presuppositions regarding the nature of gift. As a result, authors draw erroneous conclusions and fall victims of the magic of the gift. This short reply points to these deficiencies and suggests some ideas for alternative approaches to the analysis of certain phenomena observed in the workplace. © 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Employer-employee relationship; Gift; Market; Reciprocity

Название: Moduli spaces ℳ2,1 and ℳ3,1
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kochetkov, Y.Y., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The cell structure of the spaces ℳ2,1 and ℳ3,1 is considered. These are the spaces of complex curves of genus 2 and 3 with one marked point. For the space ℳ2,1, nine cells of the highest dimension 8 are described and their adjacency is studied. For the space ℳ3,1, a list of all 1726 cells of the highest dimension 14 (with orientation) is obtained. The list of adjacent couples of cells is also obtained. These lists can be found on the web. © 2010 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Embedded graphs; Moduli space of curves with marked points

Название: Polynomial normal form and finitely smooth equivalence of autonomous systems with one zero eigenvalue
Организации: Higher School of Economics, State University, Myasnitskaya ul. 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Samovol, V.S., Higher School of Economics, State University, Myasnitskaya ul. 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The reducibility of a real autonomous system of ordinary differential equations to the resonance normal form (called simply the normal form in what follows) in a neighborhood of a singular point has been reported. An analysis shows that this class of transformations is insufficient for answering important questions on properties of partially degenerate systems, in particular, systems with one zero eigenvalue. The reduction of the linear part of the system to form suggests new refinements of the notion of resonance. Theorem 4 generalizes the Sternberg-Chen theorem to the case of systems with one zero eigenvalue. The notion of resonance for the systems under consideration and prove the possibility of reducing these systems to the polynomial resonance normal form.
Ключевые слова указателя: Autonomous systems; Eigen-value; Normal form; Singular points; Ordinary differential equations; Resonance; Eigenvalues and eigenfunctions

Авторы организаций: Chernyshkova, E., Department of Psychology, University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Zip code 125319, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper features an investigation of reflexive process specifics in context of "significant other" phenomenon. A question about their influence peculiarities at aggressive behavior nature is replied. Tendencies of direction and type frustration response developments in detail are described. Original experiment for these phenomena study is submitted. It is based on modifications of the "Picture - Frustration Study" test by S. Rosenzweig.

Название: The Erdo{double acute}s-Vershik problem for the golden ratio
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bezhaeva, Z.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Oseledets, V.I., M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Properties of the Erdo{double acute}s measure and the invariant Erdo{double acute}s measure for the golden ratio and all values of the Bernoulli parameter are studied. It is proved that a shift on the two-sided Fibonacci compact set with invariant Erdo{double acute}s measure is isomorphic to the integral automorphism for a Bernoulli shift with countable alphabet. An effective algorithm for calculating the entropy of an invariant Erdo{double acute}s measure is proposed. It is shown that, for certain values of the Bernoulli parameter, this algorithm gives the Hausdorff dimension of an Erdo{double acute}s measure to 15 decimal places. © 2010 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.

Название: Factorized solutions of Temperley-Lieb qKZ equations on a segment
Название источника: Advances in Theoretical and Mathematical Physics
Организации: Department of Mathematics and Statistics, The University of Melbourne, VIC 3010, Australia; Faculty of Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Vavilova str.7, Moscow, Russian Federation; Bogoliubov Laboratory of Theoretical Physics, Joint Institute for Nuclear Research, 141980 Dubna, Moscow Region, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: De Gier, J., Department of Mathematics and Statistics, The University of Melbourne, VIC 3010, Australia; Pyatov, P., Faculty of Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Vavilova str.7, Moscow, Russian Federation, Bogoliubov Laboratory of Theoretical Physics, Joint Institute for Nuclear Research, 141980 Dubna, Moscow Region, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We study the q-deformed Knizhnik-Zamolodchikov (qKZ) equation in path representations of the Temperley-Lieb algebras. We consider two types of open boundary conditions, and in both cases we derive factorized expressions for the solutions of the qKZ equation in terms of Baxterized Demazurre-Lusztig operators. These expressions are alternative to known integral solutions for tensor product representations. The factorized expressions reveal the algebraic structure within the qKZ equation, and effectively reduce it to a set of truncation conditions on a single scalar function. The factorized expressions allow for an efficient computation of the full solution once this single scalar function is known. We further study particular polynomial solutions for which certain additional factorized expressions give weighted sums over components of the solution. In the homogeneous limit, we formulate positivity conjectures in the spirit of Di Francesco and Zinn-Justin. We further conjecture relations between weighted sums and individual components of the solutions for larger system sizes. © 2010 International Press.

Авторы: Yakovlev A., Simachev Y., Danilov Y.
Название: The russian corporation: Patterns of behaviour during the crisis
Организации: Institute for Industrial and Market Studies, State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Interdepartmental Analytical Centre, Moscow, Russian Federation; Centre for Capital Market Development, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yakovlev, A., Institute for Industrial and Market Studies, State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Simachev, Y., Interdepartmental Analytical Centre, Moscow, Russian Federation; Danilov, Y., Centre for Capital Market Development, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article considers the behaviour patterns of Russian firms before and during the financial crisis of 2008-09. To facilitate comparison, we define three main groups of actors at the firm level in the Russian economy - large, politically connected companies; medium-size firms that expanded in the 2000s with the help of administrative support, and successful medium-size firms driven by market factors. Many of the large companies practised highly risky financial policies and experienced a decrease in efficiency before the crisis, and the managers and owners of some Russian firms have been engaging in opportunistic behaviour during the crisis; the forms and causes of this behaviour are analysed here. We conclude by proposing some policy implications with emphasis on supporting successful medium-size firms driven by market factors. © 2010 Taylor & Francis.
Ключевые слова указателя: financial crisis; financial policy; firm size; industrial performance; market conditions; regional economy; Russian Federation

Авторы: Schofield N., Claassen C., Ozdemir U., Zakharov A.
Название: Application of a theorem in stochastic models of elections
Название источника: International Journal of Mathematics and Mathematical Sciences
Организации: Center in Political Economy, Washington University, 1 Brookings Drive, Saint Louis, MO 63130, United States; State University, Higher School of Economics, 117218 Novocheremushkinskaya St. 34-1, Apt. 68 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Schofield, N., Center in Political Economy, Washington University, 1 Brookings Drive, Saint Louis, MO 63130, United States; Claassen, C., Center in Political Economy, Washington University, 1 Brookings Drive, Saint Louis, MO 63130, United States; Ozdemir, U., Center in Political Economy, Washington University, 1 Brookings Drive, Saint Louis, MO 63130, United States; Zakharov, A., Center in Political Economy, Washington University, 1 Brookings Drive, Saint Louis, MO 63130, United States, State University, Higher School of Economics, 117218 Novocheremushkinskaya St. 34-1, Apt. 68 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Previous empirical research has developed stochastic electoral models for Israel, Turkey, and other polities. The work suggests that convergence to an electoral center (often predicted by electoral models) is a nongeneric phenomenon. In an attempt to explain nonconvergence, a formal model based on intrinsic valence is presented. This theory showed that there are necessary and sufficient conditions for convergence. The necessary condition is that a convergence coefficient c is bounded above by the dimension w of the policy space, while a sufficient condition is that the coefficient is bounded above by 1. This coefficient is defined in terms of the difference in exogenous valences, the spatial coefficient, and the electoral variance. The theoretical model is then applied to empirical analyses of elections in the United States and Britain. These empirical models include sociodemographic valence and electoral perceptions of character trait. It is shown that the model implies convergence to positions close to the electoral origin. To explain party divergence, the model is then extended to incorporate activist valences. This extension gives a first-order balance condition that allows the party to calculate the optimal marginal condition to maximize vote share. We argue that the equilibrium positions of presidential candidates in US elections and by party leaders in British elections are principally due to the influence of activists, rather than the centripetal effect of the electorate. Copyright © 2010 Norman Schofield et al.

Название: Two-layer mutiple trapping model for universal current transients in molecularly doped polymers
Организации: Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of New Mexico, 800 Yale Blvd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87131, United States; Independent Consultant, 7026 Calcaterra Dr., San Jose, CA 95120, United States; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3, Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Physics, Missouri University of Science and Technology, 1315 North Pine Street, Rolla, MI 65409-06403, United States; Chemical Engineering Department, Gavett Hall, University of Rochester, Rochester, NY 14627, United States
Авторы организаций: Dunlap, D.H., Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of New Mexico, 800 Yale Blvd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87131, United States; Schein, L.B., Independent Consultant, 7026 Calcaterra Dr., San Jose, CA 95120, United States; Tyutnev, A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3, Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3, Moscow, Russian Federation; Parris, P.E., Department of Physics, Missouri University of Science and Technology, 1315 North Pine Street, Rolla, MI 65409-06403, United States; Weiss, D.S., Chemical Engineering Department, Gavett Hall, University of Rochester, Rochester, NY 14627, United States
Краткое описание: The mechanism of charge transport in molecularly doped polymers has been the subject of much discussion over the years. In this paper, data obtained from a new experimental variant of the time-of-flight (TOF) technique, called TOF1a, are compared to the predictions of a two-layer multiple trapping model (MTM) with an exponential distribution of traps. In the recently introduced TOF1a experimental variant, the charge generation depth is varied continuously, from surface generation to bulk generation, by varying the energy of the electron-beam excitation source. This produces systematic changes in the shape of the current transient that can be compared to predictions of the two-layer MTM. In the model, one additional assumption is added to the homogeneous MTM, namely: that there exists a surface region, on the order of a micrometer thick, in which the trap distribution is identical to the bulk, but has a higher trap concentration. We find that the characteristic experimental features of an initial spike, a flat plateau, and an anomalously broad tail, as well as the sometimes observed cusp or decreasing current occurring near the transit time, can all be described by such a two-layer model; that is, they can arise as a result of carriers delayed by a trap-rich surface layer. We find that we can semiquantitatively fit current transient data over the whole time range of the experiment, but only by using theoretical parameters that lie in a narrow range, the extent of which we quantify here. © 2010 American Chemical Society.

Название: Russia's skinheads: Exploring and rethinking subcultural lives
Название источника: Russia's Skinheads: Exploring and Rethinking Subcultural Lives
Организации: Department of Sociology, University of Warwick, United Kingdom; Department of Sociology, Higher School of Economics, St Petersburg, United States; Scientific Research Centre Region, Ul'ianovsk, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Pilkington, H., Department of Sociology, University of Warwick, United Kingdom; Omel'chenko, E., Department of Sociology, Higher School of Economics, St Petersburg, United States, Scientific Research Centre Region, Ul'ianovsk, Russian Federation; Garifzianova, A., Scientific Research Centre Region, Ul'ianovsk, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Russia's Skinheads: Exploring and Rethinking Subcultural Lives provides a thorough examination of the phenomenon of skinheads, explaining its nature and its significance, and assessing how far Russian skinhead subculture is the 'lumpen' end of the extreme nationalist ideological spectrum. There are large numbers of skinheads in Russia, responsible for a significant number of xenophobic attacks, including 97 deaths in 2008 alone, making this book relevant to Russian specialists as well as to sociologists of youth subculture. It provides a practical example of how to investigate youth subculture in depth over an extended period - in this case through empirical research following a specific group over six years - and goes on to argue that Russian skinhead subculture is not a direct import from the West, and that youth cultural practices should not be reduced to expressions of consumer choice. It presents an understanding of the Russian skinhead as a product of individuals' whole, and evolving, lives, and thereby compels sociologists to rethink how they conceive the nature of subcultures. © 2010 Hilary Pilkington, Elena Omel'chenko and Al'bina Garifzianova. All rights reserved.

Краткое описание: In this paper we consider sequences of functions that are defined on a subset of the real line and take on values in a uniform Hausdorff space. For such sequences we obtain a sufficient condition for the existence of pointwise convergent subsequences. We prove that this generalization of the Helly theorem includes many results of the recent research. In addition, we prove that the sufficient condition is also necessary for uniformly convergent sequences of functions. We also obtain a representation for regular functions whose values belong to the uniform space. © 2010 Allerton Press, Inc.

Краткое описание: Two seasoned observers of the Russian oil industry analyze the country's policy response to developments in its mineral resources base (often perceived as an exploration crisis), with a focus on oil. The authors review and discuss trends in exploration (including its organization and efficiency), recent developments in its financing, and the reorganization of exploration activity. The evolution of Russia's licensing system is presented, drawing attention to changes that have affected incentives, risks, and barriers to potential resource users, both Russian and foreign. Also identified are conflicts between the objectives of resource managers and broader political goals and interests. Copyright © 2010 by Bellwether Publishing, Ltd. All rights reserved.

Название источника: Russian Journal of Physical Chemistry B
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematic, Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematic, Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematic, Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Grach, E.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematic, Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematic, Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The dependence of the mobility of charge carriers in molecularly doped polycarbonate on the thickness of the polymer was studied at two dopant DEH concentrations (30 and 50 wt %). The mobility of holes in the more concentrated polymer did decrease as the film thickness increased in close agreement with the predictions of the theory of weakly nonequilibrium transport with a dispersion parameter of 0.75. For films with a lower dopant concentration, such a categorical statement cannot be made, because mobility can either decrease as the film thickness increases or remain almost unchanged depending on the method for data processing. For this reason, it is not recommended to use the dependence of the time of flight on film thickness as a criterion for selecting the mechanism of the transport of charge carriers in molecularly doped polymers. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.

Название: Pursuing the double affine Grassmannian, I: Transversal slices via instantons on Ak-Singularities
Организации: Department of Mathematics, Brown University, Providence, RI 02912, United States; Department of Mathematics, State University Higher School of Economics, Moscow 101000, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Braverman, A., Department of Mathematics, Brown University, Providence, RI 02912, United States; Finkelberg, M., Department of Mathematics, State University Higher School of Economics, Moscow 101000, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article is the first in a series that describes a conjectural analog of the geometric Satake isomorphism for an affine Kac-Moody group. (For simplicity, we only consider the untwisted and simply connected case here.) The usual geometric Satake isomorphism for a reductive group G identifies the tensor category Rep(Gv) of finite-dimensional representations of the Langlands dual group Gv with the tensor category PervG(O) (GrG) of G(O)-equivariant perverse sheaves on the affine Grassmannian GrG = G(K )/G(O) of G. (Here K = C((t )) and O = C[[t ]].) As a by-product one gets a description of the irreducible G(O)-equivariant intersection cohomology (IC) sheaves of the closures of G(O)-orbits in GrG in terms of q-analogs of the weight multiplicity for finite-dimensional representations of Gv. The purpose of this article is to try to generalize the above results to the case when G is replaced by the corresponding affine Kac-Moody group Gaff. (We refer to the (not yet constructed) affine Grassmannian of Gaff as the double affine Grassmannian.) More precisely, in this article we construct certain varieties that should be thought of as transversal slices to various Gaff (O)-orbits inside the closure of another Gaff (O)-orbit in GrGaff. We present a conjecture that computes the intersection cohomology sheaf of these varieties in terms of the corresponding q -analog of the weight multiplicity for the Langlands dual affine group Gv aff, and we check this conjecture in a number of cases. Some further constructions (such as convolution of the corresponding perverse sheaves, analog of the Beilinson-Drinfeld Grassmannian, and so forth) will be addressed in another publication. © 2010.

Краткое описание: We show that a pointwise precompact sequence of maps from the n-dimensional rectangle into a metric semigroup, whose total variations in the sense of Vitali, Hardy and Krause are uniformly bounded, contains a pointwise convergent subsequence. We present a variant of this result for maps with values in a reflexive separable Banach space with respect to the weak pointwise convergence of maps. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.

Краткое описание: The influence of high-field electron injection regimes on modification of metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) transistors with multilayered gate dielectric SiO2-PSG containing electron traps is studied. It is shown that the preferable regime for injection modification of MOS transistors is the regime of electron injection from the silicon substrate for which the maximum shift of the threshold voltage is higher and the gate dielectric breakdown probability is much lower as compared to injection from an aluminum electrode. The amplitude of current pulses used for charge injection into the gate dielectric should be chosen from the geometric size of the transistor and particular electrophysical characteristics of the dielectric film and should be in the range 10 -7-10-4 A/cm2. It is shown that, for obtaining MOS devices with high thermal field stability after modification of the charge state by electron injection, it is necessary to anneal devices at temperatures of about 200°C. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.
Ключевые слова автора: Charge state; High-field injection; Metal-dielectric-semiconductor structure; Thermal field stability

Краткое описание: The elemental composition and surface structure of polyvinyltrimethylsilane exposed in oxygen plasma flow accelerated to an energy of 20-30 eV are studied by scanning electron microscopy and X-ray microanalysis. A microrelief is developed on the surface of the material reflecting its fibrillar supramolecular structure: the oxygen concentration increases, but the carbon concentration decreases. The surface is contaminated with Cu and F atoms as a result of their emission to the plasma due to the wear of the accelerator components. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.

Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Vavilova St., 7, 117312, United States; Laboratoire J.-V. Poncelet, UMI 2615, Russian Federation; School of Mathematical Sciences, University of Nottingham, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD, United Kingdom

Poncelet, UMI 2615, Russian Federation; Lebacque, P., School of Mathematical Sciences, University of Nottingham, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD, United Kingdom
Краткое описание: A formula for the limit of logarithmic derivatives of zeta functions in families of global fields with an explicit error term is found. A global field that is a finite extension of a finite field is considered for a smooth absolutely irreducible projective curve. A number field, genus of a function field of smooth projective curve and number field, is considered. The Generalized Riemann Hypothesis is assumed to be true for zeta functions of number fields, that is all the non-trivial zeroes are on the line 0.5. The convergence of the logarithmic derivatives of zeta functions of global fields to the logarithmic derivative of the limit zeta function is found. An asymptotically exact family of global fields is considered and it is found that there exists a number greater than zero such that an integral holds good.
Ключевые слова указателя: Error terms; Finite extension; Finite fields; Function fields; Logarithmic derivatives; Non-trivial; Number fields; Riemann hypothesis; Zeta function; Data communication systems; Functions

Краткое описание: In this paper we give a criterion when an indecomposable principally polarized abelian threefold (A, a) defined over a field k = ℂ is a Jacobian over k. More precisely, (A, a) is a Jacobian over k if and only if the value of a certain geometric Siegel modular form χ18(A, a) is a square over k. This answers a question of J.-P. Serre. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.

Краткое описание: The present paper reports on the specific heat and magnetization of the YFe3(BO3)4 and ErFe3(BO 3)4 single crystals. In both compounds, antiferromagnetic order of the iron spins evolves at TN = 38K. The experimental data suggest that the magnetic moments are in the basal plane of the trigonal crystal for both compounds. In the magnetically ordered state the crystal is subdivided into three types of domains, the magnetic moments of the Fe3+ ions being aligned along the a axis within each domain. For ErFe3(BO 3)4, two non-equivalent magnetic positions of the Er 3+ ions in each domain are observed. © 2010 IOP Publishing Ltd.

Краткое описание: Inequality in Russia, plus the lack of opportunities for upward social mobility, indicates that investment in human capital in Russia is not as effective as it should be; the result is stagnant poverty and low economic productivity. © 2010 M.E. Sharpe, Inc. All rights reserved.

Название: Russian neo-etacratic society and its stratification: Discovering real social groups
Название источника: Journal of Communist Studies and Transition Politics
Организации: Laboratory for Comparative Analysis of Development in Post-Socialist Countries (SU-HSE), Higher School of Economics (Moscow), State University, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shkaratan, O., Laboratory for Comparative Analysis of Development in Post-Socialist Countries (SU-HSE), Higher School of Economics (Moscow), State University, Russian Federation; Yastrebov, G., Laboratory for Comparative Analysis of Development in Post-Socialist Countries (SU-HSE), Higher School of Economics (Moscow), State University, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Current empirical sociology features a limited set of indicators for associating individuals with certain social groups (classes or strata). European sociologists rely heavily on such an informative descriptor as occupation, which has become institutionalized and thus produces certain requirements of human, social and cultural resources for individuals to perform the underlying functions. However, this indicator manifests at least two substantial restrictions: first, it is natural that certain types of economic activity are historically less stable than the social classes with which they are associated; and second, Russian history demonstrates that in a developed society the system of occupations is consistent with its institutional set-up and system of values, which are transferred from generation to generation. In Russia specific occupations are associated with a certain character of labour yet not with particular status characteristics that should result from the corporate nature of professional associations. In fact, in that society there exists a unique form of social stratification, in which a hierarchy of social estates dominates elements of true class differentiation. © 2010 Taylor & Francis.

Название: Intelligent choice of the number of clusters in k-means clustering: An experimental study with different cluster spreads
Организации: Department of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck University of London, London, United Kingdom; State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chiang, M.M.-T., Department of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck University of London, London, United Kingdom; Mirkin, B., Department of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck University of London, London, United Kingdom, State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The issue of determining "the right number of clusters" in K-Means has attracted considerable interest, especially in the recent years. Cluster intermix appears to be a factor most affecting the clustering results. This paper proposes an experimental setting for comparison of different approaches at data generated from Gaussian clusters with the controlled parameters of between- and within-cluster spread to model cluster intermix. The setting allows for evaluating the centroid recovery on par with conventional evaluation of the cluster recovery. The subjects of our interest are two versions of the "intelligent" K-Means method, ik-Means, that find the "right" number of clusters by extracting "anomalous patterns" from the data one-by-one. We compare them with seven other methods, including Hartigan's rule, averaged Silhouette width and Gap statistic, under different between- and within-cluster spread-shape conditions. There are several consistent patterns in the results of our experiments, such as that the right K is reproduced best by Hartigan's rule - but not clusters or their centroids. This leads us to propose an adjusted version of iK-Means, which performs well in the current experiment setting. © 2010 Springer Science+Business Media, LLC.
Ключевые слова автора: Anomalous pattern; Gap statistic; Hartigan's rule; K-Means clustering; Number of clusters

Организации: Dept of Energy and Resource Markets, Higher School of Economia, Moscow, Russian Federation; Dept of Energy, Norwegian Institute of International Relations (NUPI), Oslo, Norway
Авторы организаций: Belyi, A.V., Dept of Energy and Resource Markets, Higher School of Economia, Moscow, Russian Federation; Overland, I., Dept of Energy, Norwegian Institute of International Relations (NUPI), Oslo, Norway
Краткое описание: The article points out the renewable energy potential in Russia in light of the new policy targets development, technical and economic potential as well as limits related to a lack of effectiveness of renewable energy promoting policies. Moreover, the article links the renewable energy development to the liberalization of Russian power sector which actually provides a possibility for rnarket-support mechanisms, such as the green certificates. Renewable energy in Russia also has an important regional dimension, particularly for remote regions.

Название: Similarity clustering of proteins using substantive knowledge and reconstruction of evolutionary gene histories in herpesvirus
Организации: School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck College, University of London, London, United Kingdom; Division of Applied Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Centre for Virology, Department of Infection, University College London, London, United Kingdom
Авторы организаций: Mirkin, B., School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck College, University of London, London, United Kingdom, Division of Applied Mathematics, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Camargo, R., School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck College, University of London, London, United Kingdom; Fenner, T., School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck College, University of London, London, United Kingdom; Loizou, G., School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck College, University of London, London, United Kingdom; Kellam, P., Centre for Virology, Department of Infection, University College London, London, United Kingdom
Краткое описание: The issue of clustering proteins into homologous protein families (HPFs) has attracted considerable attention by researchers. On one side, many databases of protein families have been developed by using popular sequence alignment tools and relatively simple clustering methods followed by extensive manual curation. On the other side, more elaborate clustering approaches have been used, yet with a very limited degree of success. This paper advocates an approach to clustering protein families involving knowledge of the protein functions to adjust the parameter of similarity scale shift. One more source of external information is utilised as we proceed to reconstruct HPF evolutionary histories over an evolutionary tree; the consistency between these histories and information on gene arrangement in the genomes is used to narrow down the choice of the clustering. © Springer-Verlag 2009.

Название: Convergence parameter associated with a Markov chain and a family of functions
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shur, M.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The proposed definition of convergence parameter R(W) corresponding to a Markov chain X with a measurable state space (E, B) and any nonempty setW of bounded below measurable functions f: E → ℝ is wider than the well-known definition of convergence parameter R in the sense of Tweedie or Nummelin. Very often, R(W) < ∞, and there exists a set playing the role of the absorbing set inNummelin's definition ofR. Special attention is paid to the case in whichE is locally compact, X is a Feller chain on E, and W coincides with the family C0+ of all compactly supported continuous functions f ≥ 0 (f ≇ 0). In particular, certain conditions for R(C0+)-1 to coincide with the norm of an appropriate modification of the chain transition operator are found. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2010.
Ключевые слова автора: Absorbing set; Convergence parameter; Feller chain; Irreducible chain; Locally compact set; Markov chain; Measurable state space; Random walk

Название: Discriminant analysis of high-dimensional data over limited samples
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Serdobolskii, V.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A study was conducted to perform discriminant analysis of high-dimensional data over limited samples. A linear discriminant procedure was developed for high-dimensional observation vectors with independent components specific by grouping of variables and averaging within groups. Asymptotic formulas were deduced for error probabilities that guaranteed the efficiency of discrimination uniformly in dimension under some restriction on parameters. Standard linear discriminant analysis was degenerated and was inapplicable for observations of large dimension and smaller samples. The discriminant function variance was reduced by averaging of variables. The set of the observation vector components was split into k groups each of m components, averaged, and passed to the discriminant analysis in reduced k-dimensional space.

Название: Geometric correlation methods for the identification of graphical objects
Организации: Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gostev, I.M., Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We review the recent progress in the identification of graphical objects by the so-called geometric correlation methods. We describe historical premises of these methods, and review the principles for designing the features utilized in constructing the recognition methods. The identification methods themselves are also considered, and the quality of their performance is analyzed. Statistical methods for setting the classification tolerance and the factors affecting the identification's precision are considered as well. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd 2010.

Название: Electric field enhancement in field-emission cathodes based on carbon nanotubes
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Vuzovskii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; OOO Kintekh, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation; Moscow Power Institute (Technical University), ul. Krasnokazarmennaya 17, Moscow 111250, Russian Federation; Russian Scientific Center Kurchatov Institute, pl. Kurchatova 1, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation; GE Global Research, Niskayuna, NY 12309, United States
Авторы организаций: Bel'skii, M.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Vuzovskii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation, OOO Kintekh, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation; Bocharov, G.S., OOO Kintekh, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation, Moscow Power Institute (Technical University), ul. Krasnokazarmennaya 17, Moscow 111250, Russian Federation; Eletskii, A.V., OOO Kintekh, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation, Russian Scientific Center Kurchatov Institute, pl. Kurchatova 1, Moscow 123182, Russian Federation; Sommerer, T.J., GE Global Research, Niskayuna, NY 12309, United States
Краткое описание: The problem of determining the field enhancement factor in field-emission cathodes based on carbon nanotubes (CNTs) is considered. The electrostatic problem of finding the field enhancement factor for nanotubes with different shapes of the tip as a function of the angle the nanotube makes with the cathode surface and of the interelectrode spacing is solved. The dependence of the electric field enhancement factor on the spacing between vertically oriented nanotubes constituting an array is derived. Making allowance for this dependence gives an optimal value of the surface density of nanotubes in the array at which the emission current density is maximal. The I-V characteristic of CNT-based cathodes is studied with regard to the statistical straggling of their orientation angles. This I-V characteristic is compared with the characteristic obtained with regard to the statistical straggling of the CNT geometrical parameters. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Авторы: Mirkin B., Nascimento S., Pereira L.M.
Название: Cluster-lift method for mapping research activities over a concept tree
Организации: School of Computer Science, Birkbeck University of London, London WC1E 7HX, United Kingdom; Department of Data Analysis and Artificial Intelligence, State University-School of Higher Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica 2829-516, Portugal
Авторы организаций: Mirkin, B., School of Computer Science, Birkbeck University of London, London WC1E 7HX, United Kingdom, Department of Data Analysis and Artificial Intelligence, State University-School of Higher Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Nascimento, S., Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica 2829-516, Portugal; Pereira, L.M., Computer Science Department, Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CENTRIA), Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica 2829-516, Portugal
Краткое описание: The paper builds on the idea by R. Michalski of inferential concept interpretation for knowledge transmutation within a knowledge structure taken here to be a concept tree. We present a method for representing research activities within a research organization by doubly generalizing them. To be specific, we concentrate on the Computer Sciences area represented by the ACM Computing Classification System (ACM-CCS). Our cluster-lift method involves two generalization steps: one on the level of individual activities (clustering) and the other on the concept structure level (lifting). Clusters are extracted from the data on similarity between ACM-CCS topics according to the working in the organization. Lifting leads to conceptual generalization of the clusters in terms of "head subjects" on the upper levels of ACM-CCS accompanied by their gaps and offshoots. A real-world example of the representation is provided. © 2010 Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg.
Ключевые слова автора: Additive clustering; Cluster-lift method; Concept generalization; Concept tree; Knowledge transmutation

Название: Literature as a meaningful life laboratory
Организации: Centre for Fundamental Sociology, State University-Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kurakin, D., Centre for Fundamental Sociology, State University-Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Meaningful life is emotionally marked off. That's the general point that Johansen (IPBS: Integrative Psychological & Behavioral Science 44, 2010) makes which is of great importance. Fictional abstractions use to make the point even more salient. As an example I've examined Borges' famous fiction story. Along with the examples of Johansen it provides an informative case of exploring symbolic mechanisms which bind meaning with emotions. This particular mode of analysis draws forth poetry and literature in general to be treated as a "meaningful life laboratory". Ways of explanation of emotional effect the art exercises on people, which had been disclosed within this laboratory, however, constitute a significant distinction in terms that I have designated as "referential" and "substantive". The former appeals to something that has already been charged with emotional power, whereas the latter comes to effect by means of special symbolic mechanisms creating the emotional experience within the situation. Johansen, who tends to explain emotions exerted by the art without leaving the semiotic perspective, is drawn towards the "referential" type of explanation. Based upon discussions in theory of metaphor and Robert Witkin's sociological theory of arts it is demonstrated an insufficient of "referential" explanation. To overcome a monopoly of "referential" explanation of emotional engagement, in particular, in literature, means to break away from the way of reasoning, stating endless references to "something else", presupposing the existence of something already significant and therefore sharing its effects. © 2010 Springer Science+Business Media, LLC.
Ключевые слова автора: Aesthetic; Arts; Emotion; Meaning; Memory; Metaphor; Perceptional mode; Poetic device; Sacred; Symbolic
Ключевые слова указателя: emotion; human; literature; memory; physiology; Emotions; Humans; Literature; Memory; Poetry as Topic

Краткое описание: A robust stability test is formulated and the methodology of its use in the robust control system design is presented. The paper makes a contribution to the existing approaches to solution of this class of problems. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Automation; Control; Robust control designs; Robust stability; Robust control

Название: Application of ontologies and relational logic for service composition
Организации: State University - Higher School of Economics, B. Pechorskaya 25/12, 603155, Nizhny Novgorod, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Babkin, E., State University - Higher School of Economics, B. Pechorskaya 25/12, 603155, Nizhny Novgorod, Russian Federation; Gudkova, E., State University - Higher School of Economics, B. Pechorskaya 25/12, 603155, Nizhny Novgorod, Russian Federation; Rodnaya, M., State University - Higher School of Economics, B. Pechorskaya 25/12, 603155, Nizhny Novgorod, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Despite of all the advantages brought by service-oriented architecture, many people argue that SOA introduces more complexity into IT systems rather than resolving it. The problem of service integration challenges modern companies dared to implement SOA. One of important aspects of this problem relates to service composition, which has to take into account many types of information and restrictions existing in each enterprise. Moreover, all the changes in business logic should also be promptly reflected. This paper proposes the approach to solution of the stated problem based on such concepts as MDA, ontology modeling and logical analysis. The approach consists of several steps of modeling and finite scope logical analysis for automated translation of business processes into the sequence of service invocations. Formal language of relational logic is proposed as a key element of the proposed approach which is responsible for logical analysis and service workflow generation. Our approach is worked out and realized using MIT Alloy Analyzer software. © EuroJournals Publishing, Inc. 2010.
Ключевые слова автора: MDA; MIT Alloy Analyzer; Ontology; Relational logic; Service composition; Service integration; SOA; Web services

Название: Small entrepreneurship and entrepreneurial activity of population in Russia in the context of the economic transformation
Организации: National Research University - Higher School of Economics Moscow, 125319 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chepurenko, A., National Research University - Higher School of Economics Moscow, 125319 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper deals with the main stages of private (small) entrepreneurship (SME) development and changing approaches to the SME policy in Russia under the systemic transition. The author argues that the entrepreneurship and SME policy in Russia remains rather reactive than pro-active. A special attention is paid to the crisis (2008-2009) impact both on the entrepreneurial activity of population based on Global Entrepreneurship Monitors (GEM) data as well as on the State inconsistent policy to promote SME under slowdown. In Russia, the strategic objective of government policies must be to support productive entrepreneurship and limit the options for rent-oriented or even parasitic growth of the two other types. But this task involves fundamental changes in the system of ownership rights and the entire structure of social relations, for the domination of unproductive and 'destructive' entrepreneurship is inseparable from the system of 'power-ownership' dominating in Russia.
Ключевые слова автора: Crisis' impact; Early entrepreneurial activity; Russia; Small entrepreneurship; Sme and entrepreneurship policy
Издатель: GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences

Название: Modular metric spaces, I: Basic concepts
Название источника: Nonlinear Analysis, Theory, Methods and Applications
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics and Informatics, State University Higher School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pecherskaya Street 25/12, Nizhny Novgorod, 603155, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chistyakov, V.V., Department of Applied Mathematics and Informatics, State University Higher School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pecherskaya Street 25/12, Nizhny Novgorod, 603155, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The notion of a modular is introduced as follows. A (metric) modular on a set X is a function w : (0, ∞) × X × X → [0, ∞] satisfying, for all x, y, z ∈ X, the following three properties: x = y if and only if w (λ, x, y) = 0 for all λ > 0; w (λ, x, y) = w (λ, y, x) for all λ > 0; w (λ + μ, x, y) ≤ w (λ, x, z) + w (μ, y, z) for all λ, μ > 0. We show that, given x0 ∈ X, the set Xw = {x ∈ X : limλ → ∞ w (λ, x, x0) = 0} is a metric space with metric dw{ring operator} (x, y) = inf {λ > 0 : w (λ, x, y) ≤ λ}, called a modular space. The modular w is said to be convex if (λ, x, y) {mapping} λ w (λ, x, y) is also a modular on X. In this case Xw coincides with the set of all x ∈ X such that w (λ, x, x0) < ∞ for some λ = λ (x) > 0 and is metrizable by dw* (x, y) = inf {λ > 0 : w (λ, x, y) ≤ 1}. Moreover, if dw{ring operator} (x, y) < 1 or dw* (x, y) < 1, then (dw{ring operator} (x, y))2 ≤ dw* (x, y) ≤ dw{ring operator} (x, y); otherwise, the reverse inequalities hold. We develop the theory of metric spaces, generated by modulars, and extend the results by H. Nakano, J. Musielak, W. Orlicz, Ph. Turpin and others for modulars on linear spaces. © 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Abstract convex cone; Convex modular; Equivalent metrics; Metric modular; Metric semigroup; Metric space; Modular convergence
Ключевые слова указателя: Basic concepts; Convex cone; Linear spaces; Metric spaces; Modulars; Reverse inequality; Semi-group; Abstracting; Cones; Topology; Set theory

Название источника: Journal de Theorie des Nombres de Bordeaux
Организации: State University - Higher School of Economics, 7, Vavilova st., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Zykin, A., State University - Higher School of Economics, 7, Vavilova st., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The main goal of this paper is to prove a formula that expresses the limit behaviour of Dedekind zeta functions for Re s > 1/2 in families of number fields, assuming that the Generalized Riemann Hypothesis holds. This result can be viewed as a generalization of the Brauer-Siegel theorem. As an application we obtain a limit formula for Euler-Kronecker constants in families of number fields. © Université Bordeaux 1, 2010, tous droits réservés.

Название: Scientific realism, truth, and the underdetermination of theories by empirical data
Организации: Department of Ontology, Logic and Theory of Knowledge, Faculty of Philosophy, State University-Higher School of Economics (SU-HSE), Russian Federation

Название: A setup for measuring the temperature dependence of the refractive indices of solids
Организации: Research Institute of Advanced Materials and Technology, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Malaya Pionerskaya 12, Moscow 115054, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lapshinov, B.A., Research Institute of Advanced Materials and Technology, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Malaya Pionerskaya 12, Moscow 115054, Russian Federation; Magunov, A.N., Research Institute of Advanced Materials and Technology, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Malaya Pionerskaya 12, Moscow 115054, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A setup for measuring the temperature dependences of refractive indices n(T) of semiconductors and dielectrics in the temperature range 300-700 K at the wavelengths of a He-Ne laser λ=0.63, 1.15, and 3.39 μm is described. Samples in the form of plane-parallel plates serve as Fabry-Perot etalons the optical thickness of which depends on the temperature. Upon heating and subsequent cooling of a sample, interference oscillations of the refiected-light intensity are recorded and used to determine the dependence n(T). The values of the refractive index at room temperature and the thermal expansion coefficient used in calculations are taken from the literature. Comparing the interferograms obtained for a heated and cooled sample allows evaluation of the temperature difference between the sample's probed area and a measuring thermocouple. The relative error in determining thermooptical coefficient dn/dT in the range 300-700 K is within 1%. © 2010 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Fabry-Perot etalons; He-Ne lasers; Interference oscillations; Interferograms; Light intensity; Optical thickness; Plane-parallel plates; Relative errors; Room temperature; Subsequent cooling; Temperature dependence; Temperature differences; Temperature range; Thermal expansion coefficients; Thermo-optical coefficients; Light measurement; Light refraction; Neon; Organic polymers; Refractive index; Refractometers; Temperature distribution; Thermocouples; Thermal expansion

Название источника: Nonlinear Analysis, Theory, Methods and Applications
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics and Informatics, State University Higher School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pecherskaya Street 25/12, Nizhny Novgorod, 603155, Russian Federation
