Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Elizarov, A.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The wave process of the propagation of heat in electromagnetic heating devices is analyzed. The velocity of propagation of a thermal wave and its dispersion properties are determined. It is shown that it is possible to use this method to solve self-consistent problems. © 2007 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Dispersion; Electromagnetic heating; Thermal wave
Ключевые слова указателя: Dispersions; Heating; Parameter estimation; Problem solving; Thermal effects; Wave propagation; Electromagnetic heating; Thermal waves; Electromagnetic waves

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Ikhsanov R.Sh., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Effect of dose on radiation-induced conductivity in polymers
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Research Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo 8, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Ikhsanov, R.Sh., Research Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo 8, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Numerical simulation of radiation-induced conductivity in polymers upon long-term irradiation on the basis of the generalized Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model, which allows for both dipolar carrier transport and generation of radiation traps during irradiation, was performed. The unusual properties of radiation-induced conductivity, such as the appearance of a maximum on current transients, the absence of a steady state, and a substantial difference between these curves for the first and subsequent irradiation, are rationalized in terms of the formation of free radicals, the major feature of radiolysis in the chemical aspect. This interpretation does not require the involvement of degradation or crosslinking processes, unlike other interpretations that appear in the literature. With the use of low-density polyethylene as an example, it was shown that radiation-induced conductivity both upon pulse and continuous irradiation can satisfactorily be described with the unified set of parameters of the generalized Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Filtering problem for discrete volterra equations with combined disturbances
Организации: Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Physics, Moscow Aviation Institute, Moscow, Russian Federation; Dipartimento di Informatica e Sistemistica, Università di Pavia, Pavia, Italy; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Leninskie Gory, Main MSU Building, Moscow 119991 GSP-1, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bashkov, A., Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Physics, Moscow Aviation Institute, Moscow, Russian Federation; De Nicolao, G., Dipartimento di Informatica e Sistemistica, Università di Pavia, Pavia, Italy; Kolmanovskii, V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Matasov, A., Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation, Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Leninskie Gory, Main MSU Building, Moscow 119991 GSP-1, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A minimax filtering problem for discrete Volterra equations with combined noise models is considered. The combined models are defined as the sums of uncertain bounded deterministic functions and stochastic white noises. However, the corresponding variational problem turns out to be very difficult for direct solution. Therefore, simplified filtering algorithms are developed. The levels of nonoptimality for these simplified algorithms are introduced as the ratios of the filtering performances for the simplified and optimal estimators. In opposite to the original variational problem, these levels can be easily evaluated numerically. Thus, simple filtering algorithms with guaranteed performance are obtained. Numerical experiments confirm the efficiency of our approach.
Ключевые слова автора: Combined noises; Duality theory; Guaranteed filtering problem; Linear discrete Volterra equations

Название: Cohomology of 3-dimensional color Lie algebras
Организации: Department of High Mathematics for Economics, State University 'Higher School of Economics', Myasnitskaja street 20, Moscow, 101990, Russian Federation; Centre for Mathematical Sciences, Lund University, Box 118, SE-221 00 Lund, Sweden
Авторы организаций: Piontkovski, D., Department of High Mathematics for Economics, State University 'Higher School of Economics', Myasnitskaja street 20, Moscow, 101990, Russian Federation; Silvestrov, S.D., Centre for Mathematical Sciences, Lund University, Box 118, SE-221 00 Lund, Sweden
Краткое описание: We develop the cohomology theory of color Lie algebras due to Scheunert-Zhang in a framework of non-homogeneous quadratic Koszul algebras. In this approach, the Chevalley-Eilenberg complex of a color Lie algebra becomes a standard Koszul complex for its universal enveloping algebra, providing a constructive method for computation of cohomology. As an application, we compute cohomologies with trivial coefficients of Z2n-graded 3-dimensional color Lie algebras. © 2006 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Cohomology; Color Lie algebras; Koszul algebras; Quadratic algebras

Название: Mini lenses for tiny low-voltage electron-beam devices
Название источника: Bulletin of the Russian Academy of Sciences: Physics
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fat'yanova, G.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The peculiarities of the design of tiny elements of electron optics - electron lenses used in the microsystem electron-beam technique, and their difference from conventional electron lenses that are applied in modern electron-beam equipment have been considered. Lenses with a two-functional magnetic circuit are analyzed. The magnetic circuit in such lenses, along with its direct destination, serves simultaneously as an electrode to which necessary potentials are applied. A lens with a coil playing the role of an electrode is considered as well. This approach allows more compact location of elements of electronic optics in an electron-optical system and simultaneous implementation of new properties of tiny lenses. The problem of fabrication of the excitation coil in the form of an Archimedes spiral is studied. The possibilities of application of new materials (high-temperature conductors, solid electrolytes, ferrites, etc.) that could not be previously used due to the large sizes of the elements of conventional electron optics are analyzed. © Allerton Press, Inc. 2007.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electrodes; Electron optics; Lenses; Magnetic circuits; Optical systems; Electron-optical system; Low-voltage electron-beam devices; Mini lenses; Electron beams

Название: To the theory of the Dirichlet and Neumann problems for strongly elliptic systems in Lipschitz domains
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For strongly elliptic Systems with Douglis-Nirenberg structure, we investigate the regularity of variational solutions to the Dirichlet and Neumann problems in a bounded Lipschitz domain. The solutions of the problems with homogeneous boundary conditions are originally defined in the simplest L 2-Sobolev spaces H σ . The regularity results are obtained in the potential spaces H p σ and Besov spaces B p σ . In the case of second-order Systems, the author's results obtained a year ago are strengthened. The Dirichlet problem with nonhomogeneous boundary conditions is considered with the use of Whitney arrays. © 2007 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Besov space; Dirichlet problem; Lipschitz domain; Neumann problem; Potential space; Strong ellipticity; Variational solution; Whitney array

Организации: Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Russian Federation

Краткое описание: A new precision circuit has been developed for a phase-type transformer displacement converter in which the errors of the phase shifter are balanced out; the working principle is described. © 2007 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Analog-to-digital displacement converter; Phase shifter
Ключевые слова указателя: Circuit theory; Error compensation; Phase shifters; Analog to digital displacement converters; Displacement digitizer; Electric transformers

Название: Complex elemental analysis of heterogeneous objects
Название источника: Bulletin of the Russian Academy of Sciences: Physics
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fat'yanova, G.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A complex method of local microanalysis of samples, in which the analysis conditions depend on the orientation of the boundaries of heterogeneous objects, has been considered. X-ray and electron spectroscopy methods are simultaneously used. Application of special instrumental methods for recording X-ray and electron spectra makes it possible to determine the elemental composition of samples in cuts and near interphase boundaries with a high accuracy. Such a possibility is realized due to the development of a method and equipment providing simultaneous recording secondary radiations in two mutually opposite directions with a change in the azimuthal direction with respect to the point of analysis, without loss of the beam positioning point, through application of microtomography. © Allerton Press, Inc. 2007.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electron spectroscopy; Radiation; Tomography; X ray spectroscopy; Complex elemental analysis; Elemental composition; Heterogeneous objects; Microtomography; Microanalysis

Название: Prospects of developing multibeam systems for low-voltage electron lithography
Название источника: Bulletin of the Russian Academy of Sciences: Physics
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fat'yanova, G.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Vasichev, B.N., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The prospects of developing tiny multibeam systems for electron lithography have been considered. Designs of tiny basic elements of electron-optical systems, including a magnetic lens with an open magnetic circuit and a lens with aligned axially symmetric fields (whose magnetic circuit simultaneously plays the role of electrodes of an electrostatic lens), are represented, as well as their analysis. The results of the investigation of high-speed one-turn deflection systems without or with a core and the analysis of a stigmator are reported. Radically new approaches to design of tiny electron-optical systems have been considered, which make it possible to increase the efficiency of electron beam formation and pass to micro-and nanotechnological design of vacuum microsystems. © Allerton Press, Inc. 2007.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electron optics; Magnetic circuits; Magnetic lenses; Optical systems; Electron-optical systems; Low-voltage electron lithography; Multibeam systems; Open magnetic circuit; Electron beam lithography

Название: Semiclassical soliton-type solutions of the Hartree equation
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Memorial University of Newfoundland, St. John's, A1C 5S7, Canada
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kondrat'eva, M.F., Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Memorial University of Newfoundland, St. John's, A1C 5S7, Canada; Smirnova, E.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The semiclassical soliton-type solutions of the hartree equation are analyzed. The eigenvalue problem for operator with a singular self-action potential is also analyzed by applying a singular versions of the WKB method with the help of reference equations. The type of localized asymptotic solutions of interest is described in the linear case by considering the evolution compressed coherent state in the semiclassical approximation. The construction of semiclassical asymptotics for a quantum problem is reduced to the construction of solutions to the equation of motion of the corresponding classical system.
Ключевые слова указателя: Approximation theory; Eigenvalues and eigenfunctions; Integral equations; Mathematical operators; Problem solving; Trees (mathematics); Hartree equation; Reference equations; Semiclassical asymptotics; Solitons

Организации: State University, High School of Economics, Moscow; Institute of Ethnology and Anthropology, RAS, Moscow; Saskatchewan University, Saskatown, Canada; Charbin Pedagogical University, Charbin, China
Авторы организаций: Lebedeva, N.M., State University, High School of Economics, Moscow; Tatarko, A.N., Institute of Ethnology and Anthropology, RAS, Moscow; Chirkov, V.I., Saskatchewan University, Saskatown, Canada; Lu, T., State University, High School of Economics, Moscow, Institute of Ethnology and Anthropology, RAS, Moscow, Charbin Pedagogical University, Charbin, China
Краткое описание: The results of empirical study of correlation of socio-cultural and personal characteristics with the attitudes to their own health among Russian (« = 103) and Chinese (« = 182) students are presented. There were cross-cultural differences: Chinese students have higher indices of social capital and long-term orientation while Russian students show autonomous motivation of behavior with respect to their health. Women's attitudes to their health in both samples were more positive then men's ones. Such indices of social capital as the level and radius of trust, significance of ethnic and civic identity are mated with positive attitudes towards health in both samples. Autonomous motivation of behavior is correlated with positive attitudes to health in Russian sample.
Ключевые слова автора: Attitude; Behavior; Culture; Ethnic identity; Health; Motivation; Psychological well-being; Social capital; Values

Название: Transient current in thin layers of disordered organic materials under conditions of nonequilibrium charge carrier transport
Организации: Moscow Engineering Physics Institute (State University), Moscow 115409, Russian Federation; Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Nikitenko, V.R., Moscow Engineering Physics Institute (State University), Moscow 115409, Russian Federation; Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The theoretical model of nonequilibrium hopping charge-carrier transport in disordered organic materials based on the concept of the transport level is applied to the case of Gaussian energy distribution of localized states. As limiting cases, the model includes quasi-equilibrium and extremely nonequilibrium (dispersive) transport modes at long and short times, respectively. An analytic description of the intermediate regime of moderately nonequilibrium transport is proposed. In this regime, the quasi-equilibrium value of the mobility is already established, whereas the coefficient of field-assisted diffusion continues to increase with time. The results of the calculations are in good agreement both with the data of time-of-flight experiments for photocon-ducting molecularly doped polymers and with the results of numerical simulation for the Gaussian disorder model. Transient currents under the conditions of near-electrode and spatially uniform charge-carrier generation are compared. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Selections of bounded variation under the excess restrictions
Название источника: Journal of Mathematical Analysis and Applications
Организации: Department of Mathematics, State University Higher School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pechërskaya street 25, Nizhny Novgorod, 603600, Russian Federation; Institute of Mathematics, Physics and Mechanics, University of Ljubljana, PO Box 2964, Ljubljana, 1001, Slovenia
Авторы организаций: Chistyakov, V.V., Department of Mathematics, State University Higher School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pechërskaya street 25, Nizhny Novgorod, 603600, Russian Federation; Repovš, D., Institute of Mathematics, Physics and Mechanics, University of Ljubljana, PO Box 2964, Ljubljana, 1001, Slovenia
Краткое описание: Let X be a metric space with metric d, c (X) denote the family of all nonempty compact subsets of X and, given F, G ∈ c (X), let e (F, G) = supx ∈ F infy ∈ G d (x, y) be the Hausdorff excess of F over G. The excess variation of a multifunction F : [a, b] → c (X), which generalizes the ordinary variation V of single-valued functions, is defined by V+ (F, [a, b]) = supπ ∑i = 1m e (F (ti - 1), F (ti)) where the supremum is taken over all partitions π = {ti}i = 0m of the interval [a, b]. The main result of the paper is the following selection theorem: IfF : [a, b] → c (X),V+ (F, [a, b]) < ∞,t0 ∈ [a, b] andx0 ∈ F (t0), then there exists a single-valued functionf : [a, b] → X of bounded variation such thatf (t) ∈ F (t) for allt ∈ [a, b],f (t0) = x0,V (f, [a, t0)) ≤ V+ (F, [a, t0)) andV (f, [t0, b]) ≤ V+ (F, [t0, b]) . We exhibit examples showing that the conclusions in this theorem are sharp, and that it produces new selections of bounded variation as compared with [V.V. Chistyakov, Selections of bounded variation, J. Appl. Anal. 10 (1) (2004) 1-82]. In contrast to this, a multifunction F satisfying e (F (s), F (t)) ≤ C (t - s) for some constant C ≥ 0 and all s, t ∈ [a, b] with s ≤ t (Lipschitz continuity with respect to e (ṡ, ṡ)) admits a Lipschitz selection with a Lipschitz constant not exceeding C if t0 = a and may have only discontinuous selections of bounded variation if a < t0 ≤ b. The same situation holds for continuous selections of F : [a, b] → c (X) when it is excess continuous in the sense that e (F (s), F (t)) → 0 as s → t - 0 for all t ∈ (a, b] and e (F (t), F (s)) → 0 as s → t + 0 for all t ∈ [a, b) simultaneously. © 2006 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Bounded variation; Compact set; Hausdorff excess; Lipschitz continuity; Metric space; Multifunction; Pointwise convergence; Selection

Название: Integrating VR into aerospace simulation
Название источника: Collection of Technical Papers - 45th AIAA Aerospace Sciences Meeting
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Computer Systems and Networks, MIEM, Bldg. 8, 1-3/12 B.Trekhsvyatitelski per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; AIAA, United States
Авторы организаций: Panfilov, P.B., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation, Department of Computer Systems and Networks, MIEM, Bldg. 8, 1-3/12 B.Trekhsvyatitelski per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation, AIAA, United States
Краткое описание: Virtual Reality is the merging of interactive 3D computer graphics with real time simulation, human-computer interfaces and significant computation systems. Rapid advances in virtual interface and computer technologies over the past decade have afforded the development of multi-sensory, immersive, and interactive virtual environments, which employ a variety of display and control interfaces. These include, but are not limited to, combinations of helmet-mounted displays, 3-D auditory displays, haptic and force feedback interfaces, vestibular displays, head and eye position tracking devices, manual controllers, voice and gesture recognition technology, and brain-body actuated controllers. Despite these technological advances, numerous and significant challenges still exist for the effective design of human-machine interfaces in virtual environments. Aerospace establishments and agencies across the globe have long been exploiters of virtual environment technology (or "synthetic environments"), primarily in large-scale simulators designed for such activities as telerobotics or teleoperation (of remotely operated vehicles) and telepresence (at the remote or hazardous or imaginary site), scientific data visualization and exploration (e.g., CFD data visualization), and of course tri-service pilot, navigator and maintenance personnel training. Currently, VR has been developed to create realistic technical environments for such tasks as helicopter machine gun training, parachuting experience, naval helicopter deck landing and many more. Also, as aerospace hardware becomes more advanced, the inevitable reduction in real systems available for training means that computer-based lessons, many featuring VR, will become an essential tool of the aerospace class room, helping to familiarize tri-service personnel with the spatial and behavioral aspects of aerospace platforms subsystems. This paper presents some preliminary findings of testing some virtual reality applications to aerospace and seeks to define those issues demanding urgent consideration.
Ключевые слова указателя: Auditory displays; Control interfaces; Real time simulation; Virtual environment technology; Flight simulators; Haptic interfaces; Helmet mounted displays; Human computer interaction; Large scale systems; Speech recognition; Virtual reality; Aerospace engineering
Название конференции: 45th AIAA Aerospace Sciences Meeting 2007
Сокращенное название источника: Collect. Tech. Pap. Aeros. Sci. Meet.

Название: Interval articulation of superiority and precise elicitation of priorities
Организации: State University - Higher School of Economics, Myasnitskaya str. 20, Moscow, 101978, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Podinovski, V.V., State University - Higher School of Economics, Myasnitskaya str. 20, Moscow, 101978, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper develops an approach to obtaining precise (point) estimates of priorities of objects, in particular, coefficients of importance of criteria. It is assumed that the judgements regarding the preference superiority of one object over another are given in the forms of intervals, that is by indicating the lower and upper bounds. The suggested approach is suitable both in the case of consistent and inconsistent preferences. In the former case, the available intervals are processed by contracting them to the maximum degree, in the latter, by extending them to the minimum degree. The degrees of contraction or extension are regarded as the indexes of indeterminacy or inconsistency of preferences, and treated as multiple objective functions. A method of transformation of such a multicriterial problem to a sequence of several linear programming problems is suggested. © 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Analytic hierarchy process (AHP); Criteria importance; Multiple criteria decision making
Ключевые слова указателя: Decision making; Linear programming; Operations research; Parameter estimation; Problem solving; Analytic hierarchy process (AHP); Criteria importance; Multiple criteria decision making; Decision theory

Название: Theoretical analysis of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model: Dipolar conductivity
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Research Institute of Instrumentation, Promzona Turaevo, str. 8, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast 140080, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: Results of numerical calculations on the kinetics of radiation-induced conductivity (current transients) in a case polymer in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model assuming dipolar carrier transport (irradiation times of 104-106 s) are reported. Unlike the case of unipolar transport, the pattern of current transients noticeably changes at times after passing a maximum in current. A steady-state value is still attained; however, its increase relative to the case of unipolar conductivity is disproportionately high with respect to a relatively small value of the parameter χ, which characterizes the relative contribution of minority carriers to the current. Allowance for the formation of radiation traps during irradiation somewhat mitigates this effect; however, the discrepancy between the conclusions of the theory for the two types of conduction strongly increases for the estimates of polymer recovery time after preliminary irradiation. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Charge carriers; Electric conductivity; Electron irradiation; Parameter estimation; Transients; Current transients; Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model; Unipolar transport; Polymers

John Heinz III School of Public Policy and Management, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, United States
Краткое описание: This paper studies experimentally the impact of the split-award statute, where the state takes a share of the plaintiff's punitive damage award, on litigation outcomes. Our findings indicate that dispute rates are significantly lower when bargaining is performed under the split-award institution. Defendants' litigation losses and plaintiffs' net compensation are significantly reduced by the split-award statute. © 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Asymmetric information; Bargaining; Experiments; Litigation; Settlement

Название: Quantization of topological spaces of negative dimension, parastatistics, and distribution of dependent random variables
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Quantization of topological spaces of negative dimension, parastatistics, and distribution of dependent random variables are presented. A theorem proved by V.P. Maslov in a case close to the Bose-Einstein distribution is stated for parasitics. A generalized operational risk problem is also considered. The risk problem has the special feature that the enterprises in which investments are to be made are given in advance. The problem is to distribute money among the enterprises so as to minimize the operational risk. Thus, the maximal concentration of equiprobable versions for the problem under consideration determines the safest (most riskless) distribution.
Ключевые слова указателя: Bose-Einstein condensation; Optimization; Problem solving; Random processes; Risk analysis; Theorem proving; Equiprobable versions; Operational risks; Topological spaces; Topology

Авторы организаций: Zakharova, E.V., Higher School of Economics, Nizhnii Novgorod Branch, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper, we study the spectra of finite difference operators generated by systems of multiple orthogonal polynomials and the corresponding systems of measures of Stieltjes type. We show that the common support of the orthogonality measures coincides with the intersection of the spectra of the family of finite difference operators with common collection of Weyl functions. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.
Ключевые слова автора: Difference operators; Essential spectrum; Hardy space; Hessenberg matrix; Multiple orthogonality polynomials; Toeplitz operator; Weyl functions

Название: Internal geometric current, and the Maxwell equation as a Hamiltonian system on configuration surfaces
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Internal tension tensors on Riemannian manifolds with magnetic field are defined by means of a quantization mapping and quantum statistical averaging. The internal geometric density, current, and stress are derived from asymptotic expansions of the corresponding quantum tensors in the quantization parameter. On Riemannian surfaces with magnetic field, the Maxwell-Lorentz equation is interpreted as a Hamiltonian system. The effect of geometric superconductivity is discussed. © Nauka/Interperiodica 2007.

Название: Power indices taking into account the agents' preferences to coalesce
Организации: State University Higher School of Economics, ul. Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation; Trapeznikov Institute of Control Sciences, Russian Academy of Sciences, Profsoyuznaya ul. 65, Moscow, 117997, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Aleskerov, F.T., State University Higher School of Economics, ul. Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation, Trapeznikov Institute of Control Sciences, Russian Academy of Sciences, Profsoyuznaya ul. 65, Moscow, 117997, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Power indices have become a powerful tool for analyzing electoral bodies and were first intensively used after the concept of the value of a game for simple games was extended to power estimation in electoral bodies. One of the main shortcomings mentioned in almost all publications on power indices is that all coalitions of agents are considered admissible. A coalition ω is called winning if the sum of the agents' votes in the coalition is no less than q. It can be seen that the intensity function for i (intensity) depends not only on the i's connections with the other coalition members but also on the connections of the other members among themselves.
Ключевые слова указателя: Function evaluation; Game theory; Intensity function; Power estimation; Power indices; Parameter estimation

Название источника: NATO Security through Science Series C: Environmental Security
Организации: State University - Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation; Department of Mathematics for Economists, Russian Federation; Lomonosov Moscow State University, Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics, Russian Federation; Russian Academy of Sciences, Dorodnicyn Computing Centre, 40 Vavilova str., 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lotov, A.V., State University - Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation, Department of Mathematics for Economists, Russian Federation, Lomonosov Moscow State University, Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics, Russian Federation, Russian Academy of Sciences, Dorodnicyn Computing Centre, 40 Vavilova str., 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper describes environmental applications of a multi-objective decision aid method based on interactive visualization of the Pareto frontier. The method provides an opportunity to explore the Pareto frontier, that is, the criterion tradeoffs, for three and more criteria. The knowledge about criterion tradeoffs helps stakeholders to better understand the problem, specify the preferred combination of the criterion values (the goal), and compute the associated decision alternatives. The method is introduced on the basis of an example related to coastal water pollution. Then, real-life applications of the method are described in short. Possible applications of this method in the case of risk and uncertainty are discussed. A new Web version of the method can be used for informing lay stakeholders about environmental risks. © 2007 Springer.
Сокращенное название источника: NATO Secur. Sci. Ser. C Environ. Secur.

Название: Semiclassical quantization of Bohr orbits in the helium atom
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Maksimov, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We use the complex WKB-Maslov method to construct the semiclassical spectral series corresponding to the resonance Bohr orbits in the helium atom. The semiclassical energy levels represented as the Rydberg tetra series correspond to the doubly symmetrically excited states of helium-like atoms. This level series contains the Rydberg triple series reported by Richter and Wintgen in 1991, which corresponds to the Z2+e-e- configuration of electrons observed by Eichmann and his collaborators in experiments on the laser excitation of the barium atom in 1992. The lower-level extrapolation of the formula obtained for the semiclassical spectrum gives the value of the ground state energy, which differs by 6% from the experimental value obtained by Bergeson and his collaborators in 1998. We also calculate the fine structure of the semiclassical spectrum due to the spin-orbit and spin-spin interactions of electrons. © Springer Science+Business Media, Inc. 2007.
Ключевые слова автора: Complex WKB-Maslov method; Generalized action-angle variable; Generalized harmonic oscillator variable; Semiclassical quantization; Spectral series

Авторы организаций: Bezhaeva, Z.I., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Oseledets, V.I., Department of Mechanics and Mathematics, MSU, Leninskie Gory, 119992 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider the random variable ζ = ω1β -1 + ω2β-2 + ⋯, where ω1, ω2, ⋯ is the stationary ergodic 2-step Markov chain with states 0, 1 and β is the golden ratio. The paper finds all cases of absolute continuity of the distribution function of the random variable ζ. For other cases the distribution function in continuous and singular. We prove that the respective Erdös measures arise under gluing together the states in a finite Markov chain. Ergodic properties of invariant Erdös measure are studied. © 2007 Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics.
Ключевые слова автора: 2-step markov chain; Erdös measure; Golden ratio; K-automorphism; Maximal entropy measure; Measure of hausdorff dimensionality

Название: Public service reform in Russia, 1991-2006
Организации: Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; State University of New York, Albany, United States; Department of Public and Municipal Service, School of Public Administration and Urban Management, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Rockefeller College of Public Affairs and Policy, State University of New York, Albany, United States
Авторы организаций: Barabashev, A., Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation, Department of Public and Municipal Service, School of Public Administration and Urban Management, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Straussman, J.D., State University of New York, Albany, United States, Rockefeller College of Public Affairs and Policy, State University of New York, Albany, United States
Краткое описание: This article assesses Russia's post-Soviet efforts to reform its public service in order to meet the challenges of social and economic transition and describes both obstacles to the creation of a modern public service and efforts to overcome them. First, the authors provide a snapshot of the public service in Russia since 1991. Second, they describe aspects of the Soviet legacy that have impeded efforts to modernize the public service. Third, they identify some of the traumas of transition experienced in the 1990s that have circumscribed efforts at reform. Finally, the authors identify gaps between the legislation enacted by the Duma and the limited implementation of that legislation to date. The article concludes with an assessment of the current status of public service reform in Russia. © 2007 The American Society for Public Administration.

Краткое описание: The dynamics of short envelope solitons in media with controlled dispersion is investigated in the framework of the third-order nonlinear Schrödinger equation. Evolution of the solitons amplitude is analyzed in the adiabatic approximation. The existence of short envelope solitons independent from linear dispersion inhomogeneity is shown. © 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

Авторы организаций: Kuznetsov, S.O., Department of Applied Mathematics, State University Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper we define and analyze stability of a formal concept. A stability index is based on the idea of a dependency in a dataset that can be reconstructed from different parts of the dataset. This idea, underlying various methods of estimating scientific hypotheses, is used here for estimating concept-based hypotheses. Combinatorial properties of stability indices, algorithmic comlpexity of their computation, as well as their dynamics with arrival of new examples are studied. © 2007 Springer Science+Business Media B.V.

Краткое описание: The water contents of oil products need to be determined. A method is considered for determining the water contents of light oil products by incoherent fiber-optics transformation. Basic formulas are given for a model for this conversion, and also results from computer simulation. © 2007 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.

Краткое описание: We present sufficient conditions for the existence of an eigenvalue of the Laplace operator with zero Dirichlet conditions in a weakly perturbed infinite cylinder in the case of localized perturbations which are extensions along the transverse coordinates with coefficients depending on the longitudinal coordinate. If such an eigenvalue exists, then, for this eigenvalue, we obtain an asymptotic formula with respect to a small parameter characterizing the values of extensions. © Nauka/Interperiodica 2007.

Краткое описание: A one-parameter form of the Henry law is suggested to describe the solution of real gases in water over a fairly wide range of temperature and pressure variations. The thermodynamic derivation of the Henry law is based on the Van't Hoff model of concentrated solutions of gases. The analytic approach developed in this work is a variant of rigorous thermodynamic theory that refines and generalizes the Krichevskii-Kazarnovskii equation. The thermodynamic theory suggested is compared with the experimental data on the solution of methane and nitrogen in water. © Nauka/Interperiodica 2007.

Название: Deterrence, lawsuits, and litigation outcomes under court errors
Название источника: Journal of Law, Economics, and Organization
Организации: University of Alberta, Canada; Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, United States; International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Russian Federation; University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, NC, United States; Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Canada; H. John Heinz III School of Public Policy and Management, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, United States; School of Law, University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, NC, United States
Авторы организаций: Landeo, C.M., University of Alberta, Canada, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, United States, Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Canada, H. John Heinz III School of Public Policy and Management, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, United States; Nikitin, M., International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Russian Federation; Baker, S., University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, NC, United States, School of Law, University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, NC, United States
Краткое описание: This article presents a strategic model of liability and litigation under court errors. Our framework allows for endogenous choice of level of care and endogenous likelihood of filing and disputes. We derive sufficient conditions for a unique universally divine mixed-strategy perfect Bayesian equilibrium under low court errors. In this equilibrium, some defendants choose to be grossly negligent; some cases are filed; and some lawsuits are dropped, some are resolved out of court, and some go to trial. We find that court errors in the size of the award, as well as damage caps and split awards, reduce the likelihood of trial but increase filing and reduce the deterrence effect of punitive damages. We derive conditions under which the adoption of the English rule for allocating legal costs reduces filing. © The Author 2006. Published by Oxford University Press on behalf of Yale University. All rights reserved.

Краткое описание: We consider axiomatic construction of ranking in a multicriteria problem provided that the criteria can take only three values. A new threshold aggregation rule is introduced, which is a unique rule satisfying the system of axioms constructed in this paper. © Pleiades Publishing, Ltd., 2007.

Название: Essay on clan capitalism in Russia
Организации: Department of Economic Sociology, Higher School of Economics, 3 Kochnovski proezd, Moscow 125319, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kosals, L., Department of Economic Sociology, Higher School of Economics, 3 Kochnovski proezd, Moscow 125319, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper is a description of the socio-economic system which emerged in Russia as a result of the transformation to a capitalist economy. The main actors in this system are the so-called 'clans' including business people affiliated with state officials and sometimes with criminal groups. In the analysis of the context of the Russian transformation a detailed study deals with the internal structure of a clan, focusing on its five main constituents (leader or 'chieftain', 'core', skilled professionals, ordinary members, agents of influence). Within clan capitalism, mechanisms of clan coordination dominate, while market mechanism and bureaucratic coordination are relatively weaker. The main features of this system are a clan-state, providing the convertibility of resources that maintain favourable conditions for clan activities; post-Soviet monopolism that is basically of a non-market character; distortion of the aims of enterprise; institutionalisation of the shadow economy; and unprotected property rights. Now clan capitalism has turned to the stage of oligarch capitalism with Putin's clan as the core of new Russian oligarchy. © 2007 Akadémiai Kiadó, Budapest.
Ключевые слова автора: Clan; Clan capitalism; Informal networks; Russia
Ключевые слова указателя: bureaucracy; capitalism; informal sector; market transition; monopoly; oligopoly; political economy; Eurasia; Russian Federation

Название: Magneto-metric Hamiltonians on quantum surfaces in the configuration space
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper deals with the Schrödinger operator on a generic Riemann surface in a generic magnetic field. On a class of nano-momentum states, this operator is reduced to a system with one degree of freedom whose (quantized) phase space is the given configuration surface. The Hamiltonian of the reduced system is a joint geometric invariant of metric and magnetic tensors. Its spectrum can be computed semiclassically, which provides the asymptotics of eigenvalue clusters for the original Schrödinger operator near the ground level. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Recent trends of China's energy strategy
Организации: Center for Energy Studies at IMEMO, Russian Academy of Science and State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; EuroChina Bridge, Beijing, China
Авторы организаций: Belyi, A., Center for Energy Studies at IMEMO, Russian Academy of Science and State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Niu, X., EuroChina Bridge, Beijing, China
Краткое описание: The present article describes the major factors of the Chinese energy strategy. The analysis is focused on three major dimensions of the Chinese energy strategy: security of supply, competitiveness and environmental protection. The security of supply dimension is characterized by a decrease of import strategy from a dependency on Gulf countries to favor regional projects for import of oil and gas from Russia and Central Asia. The second dimension is accompanied by a number of reforms in gas and electricity sectors. However, the lack of institutional support remains a major barrier for deeper reforms. The environmental protection dimension is characterized by an ever-increasing potiential for imports of the decentralized energy applications. The best practice transfer for the support of renewable energy could be improved.
Ключевые слова указателя: China; Competition; Environmental protection; International trade; Renewable energy resources; Strategic planning; Supply dimension; Energy policy; China; Competition; Energy policy; Environmental protection; International trade; Renewable energy resources; Strategic planning; best management practice; competitiveness; electricity generation; energy budget; energy planning; environmental protection; renewable resource; strategic approach; Asia; China; Eurasia; Far East

Авторы: Dobrokhotov S.Yu., Sinitsyn S.O., Tirozzi B.
Название: Asymptotics of localized solutions of the one-dimensional wave equation with variable velocity. I. The Cauchy problem
Организации: Institute for Problems in Mechanics RAS, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Department of Physics, University La Sapienza, Rome, Italy
Авторы организаций: Dobrokhotov, S.Yu., Institute for Problems in Mechanics RAS, Russian Federation; Sinitsyn, S.O., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Tirozzi, B., Department of Physics, University La Sapienza, Rome, Italy
Краткое описание: We present a systematic study of the construction of localized asymptotic solutions of the one-dimensional wave equation with variable velocity. In part I, we discuss the solution of the Cauchy problem with localized initial data and zero right-hand side in detail. Our aim is to give a description of various representations of the solution, their geometric interpretation, computer visualization, and illustration of various general approaches (such as the WKB and Whitham methods) concerning asymptotic expansions. We discuss ideas that can be used in more complicated cases (and will be considered in subsequent parts of this paper) such as inhomogeneous wave equations, the linear surge problem, the small dispersion case, etc. and can eventually be generalized to the 2-(and n-) dimensional cases. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Название: Calculation of time-dependent flows of sputtered material in the asymmetric alternating current glow discharge
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsviatitelskiy st. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Bazhenov st. 4, Kaluga, 248000, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsviatitelskiy st. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Bonk, O.G., Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Bazhenov st. 4, Kaluga, 248000, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Bazhenov st. 4, Kaluga, 248000, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Diffusion transport of material sputtered from the surface of the powered electrode in the asymmetric alternating current discharge is theoretically studied. It is shown that amplitudes of the non-stationary component of the sputtered atom (SA) flow densities at the electrodes depend on the discharge frequency and two dimensionless parameters, which are functions of the SA mass, its mean free path length in the background gas and the distance between the electrodes. It is found that diffusion damping of the time-varying component of the SA number density takes place in the discharge volume under certain conditions and their flows at the electrodes can be considered as time independent. © 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Alternating current glow discharge; Sputtered material diffusion transport

Название: Integrable models of the longitudinal motion of electrons in curved 3D nanotubes
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation; Nikolaev, S.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Integrable models of the longitudinal motion of electrons in curved three-dimensional nanotubes have been disclosed. The study focuses on providing model examples of curved nanotubes and configurations of a homogenous magnetic field, for which the matrix equation on the dimensional quantization subzone can be accurately integrated. Analytical formulas are derived for the spectrum of the electron and the Green time function of the initial boundary value problem for the reduced equation induced by problem for the initial equation. The study involves the use of transverse terms, the effective Hamiltonian, Dobrokhotov's Ansatz, and Maslov's geometric potential to derive the integrable models of the longitudinal motion of electrons in the nanotubes.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electrons; Green's function; Integral equations; Matrix algebra; Nanotubes; Three dimensional; Green time functions; Integrable models; Longitudinal motion; Three dimensional nanotubes; Mathematical models

Название: Magnetic properties of multiwall carbon nanotubes and astralenes in strong electric fields
Организации: Russian State Pedagogical University, St. Petersburg, 191186, Russian Federation; ZAO Astrin-Kholding, St. Petersburg, 198095, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Brozdnichenko, A.N., Russian State Pedagogical University, St. Petersburg, 191186, Russian Federation; Ponomarev, A.N., ZAO Astrin-Kholding, St. Petersburg, 198095, Russian Federation; Pronin, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Rybalko, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The force interaction between anode and cathode in the process of field-emission current extraction from cathodes based on carbon nanoclusters-carbon nanotubes and astralenes-has been investigated. The measured forces are linear functions of the field-emission current and significantly exceed the forces conditioned by the electrostatic nature of interaction. The observed effect is explained within the framework of a model that suggests the formation of magnetic nanoclusters in the cathode and the emission of polarized electrons. © 2007 Pleiades Publishing, Ltd.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Kolesnikov V.A., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Effect of hole scavenging and preirradiation on electron transport in polyvinylcarbazole
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Frumkin Institute of Physical Chemistry and Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kolesnikov, V.A., Frumkin Institute of Physical Chemistry and Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The results of experimental and theoretical studies of the effects of hole (majority carrier) scavengers, such as aromatic hydrazone, and preliminary irradiation on electron transport in polyvinylcarbazole are presented. It is shown that the scavenging effects can satisfactorily be described in terms of the multiple trapping model and the transport parameters of electrons-minority charge carriers-can simultaneously be determined (although approximately). The description of preirradiation effects required this model to be extended, in particular, with allowance for radiation-induced alteration in the electronic structure of the polymer at doses starting from the order of 100 Gy. © Nauka/Interperiodica 2007.

Название: Resonance gyrons and quantum geometry
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We describe irreducible representations, coherent states and star-products for algebras of integrals of motions (symmetries) of two-dimensional resonance oscillators. We demonstrate how the quantum geometry (quantum Kähler form, metric, quantum Ricci form, quantum reproducing measure) arises in this problem. We specifically study the distinction between the isotropic resonance 1: 1 and the general l: m resonance for arbitrary coprime l, m. A quantum gyron is a dynamical system in the resonance algebra. We derive its Hamiltonian in irreducible representations and calculate the semiclassical asymptotics of the gyron spectrum via the quantum geometrical objects. © 2007, Springer Basel. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Averaging; Coherent transform; Irreducible representations; Non-Lie commutation relations; Polynomial Poisson brackets; Quantum geometry; Resonance oscillator; Symplectic geometry

Название: Ontology-based framework for integration in ubiquitous computing environment
Организации: LITIS Laboratory, INSA de Rouen, Rouen, France; State University - Higher School of Economics, Nizhniy Novgorod, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Babkin, E., LITIS Laboratory, INSA de Rouen, Rouen, France, State University - Higher School of Economics, Nizhniy Novgorod, Russian Federation; Abdulrab, H., LITIS Laboratory, INSA de Rouen, Rouen, France
Краткое описание: This article considers integration of sensors networks in Ubiquitous Computing Environment (UCE), and proposes to augment general-purpose middleware solutions for sensors networks by reconfigurable and highly customizable hardware or software components, which are capable of manipulating meta-data in the form of ontologies. Such components, called Ontology Mediators, perform seamless fusion of sensors data and their representation in a form of real-world concepts and relationships for purposes of a certain single user or a small user's group. We offer description of a model-driven design methodology and architecture of a development framework. The framework includes a software library called T-Engine with reusable software components for semantic transformations, and extendable hardware components. For practical implementation of the proposed framework it is suggested to explore the graph-oriented ontology transformation approach and the RDF-based representation of ontology in the form of semi-structured data models. © EuroJournals Publishing, Inc. 2007.
Ключевые слова автора: Distributed systems; Integration; Model-driven approach; Semantic interoperability

Название: Erdos measures, sofic measures, and Markov chains
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Moscow State University, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bezhaeva, Z.I., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Oseledets, V.I., Moscow State University, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider the random variable ζ = ξ1ρ+ξ 2ρ2+..., where ξ1, ξ2, ... are independent identically distibuted random variables taking the values 0 and 1 with probabilities P(ξi = 0) = p0, P(ξi = 1) = p1, 0 < p0 < 1. Let β = 1/ρ be the golden number. The Fibonacci expansion for a random point ρζ from [0, 1] is of the form η1ρ + η2ρ2 + ... where the random variables ηk are {0, 1}-valued and ηkηk+1 = 0. The infinite random word η = η1η2 ... ηn ... takes values in the Fibonacci compactum and determines the so-called Erdos measure μ(A) = P(η A) on it. The invariant Erdos measure is the shift-invariant measure with respect to which the Erdos measure is absolutely continuous. We show that the Erdos measures are sofic. Recall that a sofic system is a symbolic system that is a continuous factor of a topological Markov chain. A sofic measure is a one-block (or symbol-to-symbol) factor of the measure corresponding to a homogeneous Markov chain. For the Erdos measures, the corresponding regular Markov chain has 5 states. This gives ergodic properties of the invariant Erdos measure. We give a new ergodic theory proof of the singularity of the distribution of the random variable ζ. Our method is also applicable when ξ1, ξ2, ... is a stationary Markov chain with values 0, 1. In particular, we prove that the distribution of ζ is singular and that the Erdos measures appear as the result of gluing together states in a regular Markov chain with 7 states. Bibliography: 3 titles. © Springer Science+Business Media, Inc. 2007.

Краткое описание: This case study uses the Ramsey model to analyze whether the current electricity prices charged by the natural monopoly Novosibirskenergo in a major industrial region of the Russian Federation are socially optimal. Our estimates of demand elasticities for two major groups of consumers, namely households and industrial users, show that prices are not socially optimal. A decrease in price for industrial users and an increase in price for households would bring the prices closer to socially optimal. © 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

Название: On a mixed Poincaré-Steklov type spectral problem in a Lipschitz domain
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a mixed boundary value problem for a second-order strongly elliptic equation in a Lipschitz domain. The boundary condition on a part of the boundary is of the first order and contains a weight function and the spectral parameter, while on the remaining part the homogeneous Dirichlet condition is imposed. The aim is to weaken the conditions sufficient for justifying the classical asymptotic formula for the eigenvalues. We show that it suffices to assume the boundary to be C1 in a neighborhood of the support of the weight outside a closed subset of zero measure. © MAIK "Nauka/ Interperiodica" (Russia) 2006.

Краткое описание: The main questions of flat dielectric materials heat-treatement, located near the slow-wave structures in the running wave field are considered. The analysis of the main equations for calculation of the waited and specific power losses distribution toward spreading microwave energy is organized in rectangular coordinate system. The dependency of the power distribution toward spreading energy direction on deceleration factor and heat-treated dielectric material parameters is shown. The microwave power distribution on the slow-wave structure surface in dependencies on dielectric material parameters, generator wavelength and deceleration factor is presented. © 2006 IEEE.

Название: On operational risks
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The problem related with operational risks for financial markets is discussed. Operational risks are related on one way, to random events in the control system of the investments of state institutions and on other way to the investment risks proper, which are determined by the financial markets. The distribution of the state contributions over banks, enterprises, or financial tools is not of statistical character but it is to be considered as an individual set, so it bears no relation to mathematical statistic and probability theory. This problem is closer to the theory of Kolmogorov complexity, the special feature of the problem is that the enterprises into which state finances are to be invested are chosen in advance. The concept of the financial markets with intelligence zero is supported to solve this problem, if the investments are chosen correctly and the priorities are assigned according to the actual potentials, then distribution gives a riskless income.
Ключевые слова указателя: Investments; Marketing; Probability; Problem solving; Statistical methods; Financial markets; Operational risks; Risk assessment

Название: Minimization of the statistical risk of purchases at the market of realty and consumer durables
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'nyi per. 3, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The minimization of the statistical risks involved in purchasing consumer durables such as automobiles and at the market of reality are discussed. The more expensive an automobile the higher are the risk of its being stolen and the price of spares in case of a breakage. To avoid these risks, a consumer must buy insurance and take into account the efforts involved in receiving the insurance money, liquidity, and a possible slump in the price of the purchased automobile. After an insurance money is paid for a stolen automobile, the insurance cost increases. Thus the real price of an automobile for a purchaser increases progressively as the progressive taxes. The more expensive the automobile the longer the train of additional expenses and higher the risk which determines the price for a purchaser who takes into account accompanying goods and services.
Ключевые слова указателя: Costs; Marketing; Statistical methods; Insurance money; Statistical risks; Risk assessment

Авторы организаций: Shekhovtsev, I.K., State University - High School Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this article we review the existing evidence on the memory impact of age EEG oscillations discharges. Original developmental equation provides reliable descriptors of brain electrical activity in people 21 to 83 years old. The magnitude of the deviations increases with clinical severity. Different levels of neurological manifestations are characterized by distinctive profiles of recognized pathological values of brain electrical features. Computerized personality profile of some of these levels can be achieved with high accuracy. Such classification, providing objective markers of cerebrovascular brain dysfunctions, may be a useful adjunct to differential diagnosis, which relies primarily on subjective clinical impressions.

Название: Dollarization traps
Название источника: Journal of Money, Credit and Banking
Организации: Department of Economics, University of Pittsburgh, United States; Department of Economics, International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Russian Federation; Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Canada
Авторы организаций: Duffy, J., Department of Economics, University of Pittsburgh, United States; Nikitin, M., Department of Economics, International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Russian Federation; Smith, R.T., Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Canada
Краткое описание: The paper analyzes dollarization in the sense of asset substitution, where a foreign currency competes with local assets, especially domestic capital, as a store of value, the impact of dollarization on capital accumulation and output, and why economies remain dollarized long after a successful inflation stabilization. We relate this dollarization hysteresis to a financial intermediation failure that happens during high inflation. We show that in dollarized countries, inflation stabilization policies may not have any effect on domestic capital accumulation, thus preventing such policies from stimulating growth - i.e. dollarized economies are vulnerable to "dollarization traps." Copyright 2006 by The Ohio State University.
Ключевые слова автора: Asset substitution; Dollarization; Financial intermediation; Hysteresis; Inflation

Название: Split-award tort reform, firm's level of care, and litigation outcomes
Название источника: Journal of Institutional and Theoretical Economics
Организации: Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Edmonton, Alta. T6G 2H4, Canada; John Heinz III School of Public Policy and Management, Carnegie Mellon University, 5000 Forbes Avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, United States; International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Moscow 107076, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Landeo, C.M., Department of Economics, University of Alberta, Edmonton, Alta. T6G 2H4, Canada, John Heinz III School of Public Policy and Management, Carnegie Mellon University, 5000 Forbes Avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, United States; Nikitin, M., International College of Economics and Finance, SU-HSE, Moscow 107076, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We investigate the effect of the split-award tort reform, where the state takes a share of the plaintiff's punitive damage award, on the firm's level of care, the likelihood of trial, and the social costs of accidents. A decrease in the plaintiff's share of the punitive damage award reduces the firm's level of care and therefore increases the probability of accidents. The effects of split awards on the likelihood of trial and social costs of accidents are ambiguous. Conditions under which a decrease in the plaintiff's share of the punitive damage award reduces the probability of trial and the social cost of accidents are derived. © 2006 Mohr Siebeck.

Название: Cognitonics as a new science and its significance for informatics and information society
Организации: Dept. of Mathematical Methods and Programming for Information Processing and Control Systems, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Informational Technologies, K.E. Tsiolkovsky Russian State Technological University - MATI, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation; State Educational Center Dialogue of Sciences, Universitetsky prospect, 5, 119296 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fomichov, V.A., Dept. of Mathematical Methods and Programming for Information Processing and Control Systems, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation, Department of Informational Technologies, K.E. Tsiolkovsky Russian State Technological University - MATI, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation; Fomichova, O.S., State Educational Center Dialogue of Sciences, Universitetsky prospect, 5, 119296 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An updated definition of Cognitonics as a new science which, in particular, is studying and looking for the ways of improving cognitive mechanisms of processing information and supporting and developing emotional sphere is introduced. The paper outlines a possible structure of Cognitonics and describes its formal tool. It is the notation of conceptual-visual dynamic schemes (CVD-schemes) - an extension of the notation of semantic nets, being popular in the artificial intelligence theory. A general approach to the use of CVD-schemes for inventing effective analogies in order to introduce difficult pieces of studied theoretical materials is illustrated. The optimal preconditions of successful introducing young children to computers are formulated as a consequence of discovering by the authors of a possible way of achieving in teaching the goals of Cognitonics. With this aim, the concept of the 'Thought-Producing Self' of the child is defined. The paper describes a scheme of the proposed method of the harmonic humanitarian development of the child allowing for realizing the 'Thought-Producing Self' of each normal, average child by the age of seven - nine, where the starting age is five to six years. The method has been personally tested by one of the authors during 16 years, the total number of successfully taught young children and teenagers exceeds four hundred. Finally, a new, large-scale goal for the software industry is formulated: to construct a new generation of culture-oriented computer programs (in the collaboration with educators, linguists, art historians, psychologists) - the programs destined for supporting and developing creativity, cognitive-emotional sphere, the appreciation of the roots of the national cultures, the awareness of the integrity of the cultural space in the information society, and for developing symbolic information processing and linguistic skills, associative and reasoning abilities of children.
Ключевые слова автора: Cognitive preconditions of introducing children to computers; Cognitonics; Culture-oriented computer programs of a new generation
Ключевые слова указателя: Artificial intelligence; Cognitive systems; Computer software; Semantics; Virtual reality; Cognitive preconditions; Cognitonics; Harmonic humanitarian development; Information society; Information science

Название: The evolution of business - State interaction in Russia: From state capture to business capture?
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yakovlev, A., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article discusses two basic strategies of Russian companies - isolation from, and close cooperation with the state. The author analyses several ways in which companies realise these strategies, drawing analogies with the 'exit' and 'voice' strategies suggested by A. Hirschman. It is shown that under the conditions of a weak state these strategies lead either to an expansion of the shadow economy or to 'state capture'. Both the privatisation of the state and the lack of its privatisation result in budget crises as well as drastic social and political shocks, leading to calls for a 'strong hand' in the business community itself. However, as there is little political competition and the mechanisms of democratic control are weak, state consolidation takes place as a bureaucratic consolidation accompanied by new opportunities for informal 'business capture' by the authorities. Nevertheless, the high degree of openness of the economy and the remaining heterogeneity of political actors provide business with a wide range of possible strategies of interaction with the state. This article explores how these strategies are becoming more formal and public compared to the 1990s. Strategies of isolation from the state now take place as legal strategies of internationalisation. Cooperation strategies, on the other hand, currently seem to be more efficient when switching from the traditional lobbying of private interests to more rational and collective actions aimed at providing the necessary conditions for sustainable economic development.
Ключевые слова указателя: business development; economic development; globalization; privatization; strategic approach; sustainable development; Eurasia; Russian Federation

Краткое описание: The linearization problem for a Poisson structure near a singular symplectic leaf of nonzero dimension is studied. We obtain the following generalization of the Conn linearization theorem: if the transverse Lie algebra of the leaf is semisimple and compact, then the Poisson structure is linearizable, provided that certain cohomological obstructions vanish. © 2006 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Cohomology; Ehresmann connection; Lie-Poisson structure; Linearization problem; Poisson structure; Schouten bracket; Symplectic leaf; Transverse Lie algebra

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Ikhsanov R.Sh., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Theoretical analysis of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Research Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Ikhsanov, R.Sh., Research Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Results of numerical calculations based on the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model of radiation-induced conductivity in a case polymer upon long (104 s) irradiation at doses of 5 × 105-107 Gy are reported. Two irradiation modes were considered: (1) preliminary irradiation and irradiation repeated at variable times after the end of the first irradiation and (2) probing the virgin and irradiated polymer with a standard pulse of ionizing radiation. It was shown that the properties of radiation-induced conductivity, such as its overshoot kinetics, a considerable difference between current transients for the initial and the repeated irradiation, extremely long annealing times of dose effects, and the absence of a steady state, are naturally explained in terms of this model (with allowance for the generation of radiation-induced traps as regards the last property). The Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg theory should be considered at present a well-approved semiempirical model of radiation-induced conductivity in polymers. © Nauka/Interperiodica 2006.
Ключевые слова указателя: Annealing; Dosimetry; Electric conductivity; Ionizing radiation; Mathematical models; Radiation effects; Irradiated polymers; Radiation induced conductivity; Rose Fowler Vaisberg model; Polymers

Название: Uniform integrability for strong ratio limit theorems. I
Название источника: Theory of Probability and its Applications
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsviatitelskii, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shur, M.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsviatitelskii, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For a given Markov chain with a measurable state space (E, ε), transition operator P, and fixed measurable function f ≧ 0, under necessary conditions, we consider variables μ(fn), where n ≧ 1 is sufficiently large, fn = Pnf/v(Pnf), and μ and ν are probability measures on ε. For a wide class of situations we propose sufficient and often necessary and sufficient conditions for the convergence of fn to 1 as n → ∞. These results differ from the results of Orey, Lin, Nummelin, and others by replacing the traditional recurrent conditions of a chain or the uniform boundedness of the functions fn and the minorizing condition of [E. Nummelin, General Irreducible Markov Chains and Nonnegative Operators, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK, 1984] with more flexible assumptions, among which the uniform integrability of functions fn with respect to some collection of measures plays a particular role. Our theorems imply a weak and often a strong convergence of these functions to φp = 1 in respective spaces of a summable function. © 2006 Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics.
Ключевые слова автора: Markov chain; Strong limit theorem for ratios
