Название: Asymptotically optimal methods of change-point detection for composite hypotheses
Название источника: Journal of Statistical Planning and Inference
Организации: Higher School of Economics, State University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Institute for Systems Analysis RAS, Prospekt 60-letya Oktyabria 9, Moscow 117312, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Brodsky, B., Higher School of Economics, State University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Darkhovsky, B., Institute for Systems Analysis RAS, Prospekt 60-letya Oktyabria 9, Moscow 117312, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper the problem of change-point detection for the case of composite hypotheses is considered. We assume that the distribution functions of observations before and after an unknown change-point belong to some parametric family. The true value of the parameter of this family is unknown but belongs to two disjoint sets for observations before and after the change-point, respectively. A new criterion for the quality of change-point detection is introduced. Modifications of generalized CUSUM and GRSh (Girshick-Rubin-Shiryaev) methods are considered and their characteristics are analyzed. Comparing these characteristics with an a priori boundary for the quality of change-point detection we establish asymptotic optimality of these methods when the family of distributions before the change-point consists of one element. © 2004 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Change-point problem; Composite hypotheses

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Kolesnikov V.A.
Название: Charge carrier transport in a molecularly doped polymer: Dispersive versus gaussian
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. Per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Frumkin Institute of Electrochemistry, Leninskii Prospekt, 31, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. Per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. Per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Trechsvyatitel. Per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Kolesnikov, V.A., Frumkin Institute of Electrochemistry, Leninskii Prospekt, 31, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A typical molecularly doped polymer (bisphenol-A-polycarbonate containing 30 mass % of hydrazone DEH) has been put to thorough experimental examination by both time of flight and radiation-induced conductivity methods. A much improved measurement technique incorporating a computer-assisted registration scheme that allows one to record a complete current transient over up to five decades in time in one single shot was employed. Studies of radiation-induced conductivity (conductivity proper as well as transit effects) uniquely prove the dispersive rather than the Gaussian transport of holes (majority carriers) in this polymer. The shape of the time-of flight current transients is strongly influenced by some extraneous factor, presumably surface traps, whose role in radiation-induced conductivity could hardly be detected. We describe the phenomenon quantitatively using a multiple trapping formalism. A critical discussion of the present situation in the field of charge carrier transport in disordered solids is also included. © 2005 Sage Publications.
Ключевые слова автора: Charge carriers; Dispersive or gaussian transport; General theory; Polymers
Ключевые слова указателя: Charge carriers; Dispersions; Doping (additives); Gaussian noise (electronic); Polycarbonates; Radiation; Shot noise; Dispersive or gaussian transport; General theory; Molecularly doped polymers (MDP); Radiation-induced conductivity (RIC); Polymers

Название: Coping with problems created by others: Directions of development
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation; Sadovnicheskaya St. 27-30, 115035 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Poddiakov, A., State University, Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation, Sadovnicheskaya St. 27-30, 115035 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Hedegaard's (2005) article dealing with developmental and detrimental effects of coping behavior among Danish-Turkish students under pressure of opposing values and demands, and Schousboe's (2005) article dealing with the effects of freedom imposed on students in Danish after-school centers are commented upon. Complex interactions between one's behavior when coping with problems and others' behavior when creating problems are discussed in the context of conflicts between people's values, aims and strategies. Copyright © 2005 SAGE Publications.
Ключевые слова автора: Coping behavior; Creating problems; Development; Help and counteraction; Learning; Teaching

Название: Asymptotic behavior of the eigenvalues of the Schrödinger operator with transversal potential in a weakly curved infinite cylinder
Организации: Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Grushin, V.V., Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper, we derive sufficient conditions for the existence of an eigenvalue for the Laplace and the Schrödinger operators with transversal potential for homogeneous Dirichlet boundary conditions in a tube, i.e., in a curved and twisted infinite cylinder. For tubes with small curvature and small internal torsion, we derive an asymptotic formula for the eigenvalue of the problem. We show that, under certain relations between the curvature and the internal torsion of the tube, the above operators possess no discrete spectrum. © 2005 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Locally perturbed boundary value problem; Schrödiger equation in nanotubes; Spectral problem; Transversal potential

Название: Multiplicative asymptotics of solutions of the first boundary value problem on a half-axis for a parabolic equation with a small parameter
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Department of Applied Mathematics, Bol. Trekhsvyatitel'skii 1-3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Frolovitchev, S.M., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Department of Applied Mathematics, Bol. Trekhsvyatitel'skii 1-3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this work we consider the first boundary value problem for a parabolic equation of second order with a small parameter on a half-axis (i.e., we consider the one-dimensional case). We take the zero initial condition. We construct the global (that is, the caustic points are taken into account) asymptotics of a solution for the boundary value problem. The asymptotic solution of this problem has a different structure depending on the sign of the coefficient (the drift coefficient) at the derivative of first order at a boundary point. The constructed asymptotic solutions are justified. © Springer-Verlag 2005.

Название: Deficiency indices of a one-term symmetric differential operator of even order degenerate in the interior of an interval
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Orochko, Yu.B., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Let a(x) ∈ C ∞[-h, h], h > 0, be a real function such that a(x) ≠ 0 for x ∈ [-h, h]. Consider the differential expression s p[f] = (-1) n(x p a(x) f (n)) (n) of arbitrary order 2n ≥ 2, which depends on the positive integer p and is degenerate for x = 0. Let H p be the real symmetric operator in L 2 (-h, h) corresponding to s p[f] and let Def H p be its deficiency index in the upper (or lower) half-plane. The proof of the formula Def H p = 2n + p, 1 ≤ p ≤ n, is presented. It complements the formulae Def H p = 2n for p ≥ 2n and Def H p = 4n - p for p = 2n - 2, 2n - 1 obtained by the same author before. © 2005 RAS(DoM) and LMS.

Авторы: Bondarenko G.G., Korzhavyi A.P., Chistyakov G.A.
Название: Behavior of aluminum-based composite cold cathodes in a glow discharge
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation; Korzhavyi, A.P., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation; Chistyakov, G.A., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The behavior of sandwich structures of cold cathodes has been studied in a glow discharge. The emitting layer of the sandwich structures is high-purity aluminum deposited on quartz substrates by vacuum evaporation and condensation. The electrophysical parameters of these structures and the well-known and widely used aluminum composites on metallic substrates are measured and compared. The differences in the behavior of the cold-cathode composite structures under the action of a glow discharge in a helium-neon mixture are discussed. Copyright © 2005 by Pleiades Publishing, Inc.

Название: Measuring the execution time of fragmented programs
Организации: Moscow Power Institute, ul. Krasnokazarmennaya 14, Moscow, 111250, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, str. 8, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Toporkov, V.V., Moscow Power Institute, ul. Krasnokazarmennaya 14, Moscow, 111250, Russian Federation; Toporkova, A.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, str. 8, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A technique for evaluating the execution time of program fragments on superscalar and explicitly parallel processors is described. Rules for the fragmentation and modification of the initial source code in a high-level language are proposed, and examples in C++ are considered. An implementation of the dynamic analysis of programs and the examination of its results with account for side effects caused by specific features of a processor architecture and operating system are considered. © 2005 Pleiades Publishing, Inc.
Ключевые слова указателя: Computer operating systems; Decoding; Errors; High level languages; Mathematical models; Optimization; Parallel processing systems; Signal processing; Clock cycles; Execution time; Fragment complexity; Kernels; Computer program listings

Авторы: Sadovnichii D.N., Tuytnev A.P., Milekhin Yu.M.
Название: Electron-beam charging of poly(methyl methacrylate)
Организации: Soyuz Federal Center of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140090, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sadovnichii, D.N., Soyuz Federal Center of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140090, Russian Federation; Tuytnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Milekhin, Yu.M., Soyuz Federal Center of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140090, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The charging of bulk poly(methyl methacrylate) by irradiation with electrons of ∼2 MeV energy at room temperature in vacuum was studied. The experimental data obtained using the split Faraday cup are compared with the results of numerical simulation assuming one-dimensional geometry with allowance for the spatial distribution of dose rate and injected-electron current, nonlinear properties of radiation-induced conductivity in the prebreakdown electric-field region, and the intrinsic conductivity of poly(methyl methacrylate). It was shown that published data on the electric field strength measured by means of the electro-optical Kerr effect in electron-beam charged poly(methyl methacrylate) agree satisfactorily with the calculation results. © 2005 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: Algebra with polynomial commutation relations for the Zeeman-Stark effect in the hydrogen atom
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Novikova, E.M., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We study the Zeeman-Stark effect for the hydrogen atom in crossed homogeneous electric and magnetic fields. A nonhomogeneous perturbing potential can also be present. If the crossed fields satisfy some resonance relation, then the degeneration in the resonance spectral cluster is removed only in the second-order term of the perturbation theory. The averaged Hamiltonian in this cluster is expressed in terms of generators of some dynamical algebra with polynomial commutation relations; the structure of these relations is determined by a pair of coprime integers contained in the resonance ratio. We construct the irreducible hypergeometric representations of this algebra. The averaged spectral problem in the irreducible representation is reduced to a second-or third-order ordinary differential equation whose solutions are model polynomials. The asymptotic behavior of the solution of the original problem concerning the Zeeman-Stark effect in the resonance cluster is constructed using the coherent states of the dynamical algebra. We also describe the asymptotic behavior of the spectrum in nonresonance clusters, where the degeneration is already removed in the first-order term of the perturbation theory. © 2005 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Coherent states; Integrable systems; Nonlinear commutation relations; Resonance asymptotic behavior of spectrum

Авторы: Turkatenko I.V., Feigin L.A., Bukreeva T.V., Myagkov I.V., Novoselova E.G., Smirnov I.S.
Название: On the structure of Langmuir-Blodgett superlattices of yttrium and lead stearate alternative bilayers
Организации: Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninsky pr., 59, 119333 Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelsky per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Turkatenko, I.V., Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninsky pr., 59, 119333 Moscow, Russian Federation, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelsky per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Feigin, L.A., Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninsky pr., 59, 119333 Moscow, Russian Federation; Bukreeva, T.V., Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninsky pr., 59, 119333 Moscow, Russian Federation; Myagkov, I.V., Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninsky pr., 59, 119333 Moscow, Russian Federation; Novoselova, E.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelsky per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelsky per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: X-ray reflectivity measurements are used to characterize Langmuir-Blodgett (LB) superlattice composed of different numbers of elementary units. The elementary unit of this superlattice consists of four monolayers of the stearic acid residue which are organized in two different bilayers. One of such bilayers contains yttrium ion in between two stearic residues, and the next one contains lead ion with the same surrounding. The rather large difference between the number of electrons for these metal ions (39 and 82) reveals a sufficient X-ray contrast to receive rather strong Bragg peaks. Positions of these peaks correspond to the tetralayer unit cell (∼100 Å length). For such tetralayer LB superlattices the electron density distribution, namely for one, four and ten unit cells, were calculated. © 2004 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Langmuir-Blodgett films; Stearic acid; Superlattice structure; X-ray scattering
Ключевые слова указателя: Carrier concentration; Crystal structure; Langmuir Blodgett films; Lead compounds; Monolayers; Stearic acid; Ultrathin films; X ray scattering; Yttrium compounds; Bilayers; Electron density distribution; Superlattice structure; Ultrathin organic films; Superlattices

Название: Matrix shrinkage of high-dimensional expectation vectors
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Vuzovskii 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Serdobolskii, V.I., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Vuzovskii 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The shrinkage effect is studied in estimating the expectation vector by weighting of mean vector components in the system of coordinates in which sample covariance matrix is diagonal. The Kolmogorov asymptotic approach is applied, when sample size increases together with the dimension, so that their ratio tends to a constant. Under some weak assumptions on the dependence of variables, the limit expression for the principal part of the quadratic risk function is found in dependence of weighting function. It is proved that the limit risk function does not depend on distributions. The extremum problem is solved, and an approximately unimprovable distribution-free estimator of the expectation vector is proposed. © 2003 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Expectation vectors estimators; Large dimension; Matrix shrinkage; Shrinkage estimators

Название: Oil and gas in the capitals
Организации: Department of Economics, EHESS, Paris, France; Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sapir, J., Department of Economics, EHESS, Paris, France, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The growth in the Russian oil and gas industry which has been shown due to the creative policy implemented by the Russian Government is discussed. Russian growth had been fast after the August 1998, partially attributable to booming oil and gas exports. The growth has also been the direct result of the massive currency devaluation, and of sound stabilization policies, implemented first by Primakov's government and then followed by the Putin's regime. Several development are showing that rebuilding the country cannot be done by relying on raw-material rent and liberal-minded economic policy.

Краткое описание: It is shown that if Ω is an infinite, metrizable, compact space such that some finite order iterated derived set of Ω is empty, then dg C(Ω)=db C(Ω)=2. © 2005 London Mathematical Society.

Название: Algebra with polynomial commutation relations for the Zeeman effect in the Coulomb-Dirac field
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Novikova, E.M., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a model of particle motion in the field of an electromagnetic monopole (in the Coulomb-Dirac field) perturbed by homogeneous and inhomogeneous electric fields. After quantum averaging, we obtain an integrable system whose Hamiltonian can be expressed in terms of the generators of an algebra with polynomial commutation relations. We construct the irreducible representations of this algebra and its hypergeometric coherent states. We use these states to represent the eigenfunctions of the original problem in terms of the solutions of the model ordinary differential equation. We also present the asymptotic approximations of the eigenvalues in the leading term of the perturbation theory, where the degeneration of the spectrum is removed completely. © 2005 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Asymptotic behavior of spectrum; Coherent states; Dirac monopole; Integrable systems; Nonlinear commutation relations

Название: On some spectral problems for the Maxwell system
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider three spectral problems for the Maxwell system with spectral parameter in the boundary or transmission conditions on a smooth closed boundary. Each problem can be reduced to a spectral equation on the boundary for the corresponding first order pseudodifferential operator A. These operators are nonelliptic, but have inverses in the space of C∞ vector functions, which again are first order pseudodifferential operators. We show that any linear combination αA + βA-1 is elliptic if α and β are nonzero. It follows that the eigenvalues of A have exactly two points of accumulation, -0 and +∞. This result is new for the third problem and is obtained in a new manner for the first two problems. In addition, we describe the asymptotic behavior of the eigenvalues of A more precisely. Copyright © 2005 by MAIK "Nauka/interperiodica" (Russia).

Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Grigor'ev, O.N., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Russian Federation; Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We derive a system of dynamical equations for an associative noncommutative product of functions on a symplectic space. This system is explicitly solved in semiclassical approximation. © 2005 Springer Science+Business Media, Inc.
Ключевые слова автора: Poisson tensor; Semiclassical approximation; Symplectic space; Weyl quantization

Название: Pareto-optimal Contracts in an Insurance Market
Организации: Dep. of Operations Research, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Golubin, A.Y., Dep. of Operations Research, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In distinction to the Borch's model of a reinsurance market, this paper treats the problem of optimal risk exchange in an insurance market where treaties are allowed between the insurer and each insured only, not among insureds themselves. A characterization of the Pareto-optimal contract is found. It is shown that the indemnity function in the contract is of a coinsurance kind. We also present a way of finding Pareto-optimal contracts under individual rationality constraints. The obtained results are compared with those of the known model of risk exchange in a reinsurance market. © 2005, ASTIN Bulletin. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Indemnity function; Individual rationality; Insurance contract; Pareto optimality; Premium

Краткое описание: Transport of holes (majority carriers) in polycarbonate doped with an aromatic hydrazone DEH (20, 30, and 50 wt %) was proved to be non-Gaussian (dispersive). The concentration dependence of the drift mobility of holes and transient radiation-induced conductivity was rationalized in terms of the generalized Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model.

Название: On one simple backscattering task of the general light scattering theory
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Radiology, Moscow Reg. Res. and Clin. Inst., Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 129110, Russian Federation

Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Rogatkin, D.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation, Department of Radiology, Moscow Reg. Res. and Clin. Inst., Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 129110, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It is well known that there are some difficulties with the analytical solution of the main equations in the general light transport and scattering theory, which is widely used today in the biomedical optics and optical noninvasive medical diagnostics, in particular, if the optical turbid media are taking into account. As we have reported in some our previous publications we assume that marked problems in biomedical optics follow from the not quite correct formulation of main equations of the classical transport theory in application to biomedical noninvasive diagnostic tasks. To study more detailed this problem we had taken into consideration one simple and ID theoretical modeling task for which we have tried to obtain the simple analytical solution for the backscattered flux. This report highlights the way to obtain expected result and differences between classical and our modified approaches.

Краткое описание: The linear theory of BWO with automodulation emission has been presented and simulation of nonlinear rates has been conducted. The possibility of considerable increase device's efficiency up to 30-40 % with electron tuning of frequency retained is shown. This device can be used in digital TV, RF-warm devices, electronic warfare and other applications. © 2004 IEEE.

Название: Evolution of corporate governance in Russia: Government policy vs. real incentives of economic agents
Организации: Inst. Industrial and Market Studies, State University, Higher School of Economics, Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yakovlev, A., Inst. Industrial and Market Studies, State University, Higher School of Economics, Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article is devoted to analysing the evolution of corporate governance mechanisms in Russia. Special attention is paid to the causes of dramatic discrepancies between the expected outputs of institutional reforms implemented by the Russian government with World Bank and IMF support and the actual behaviour of Russian companies. Why was the model of interaction between enterprises and investors, owners and managers, which had been successful in other countries, rejected by Russian business in the 1990s? And how can we evaluate certain positive changes that have occurred recently in corporate policies of major Russian companies? These questions are answered on the bases of analysis of economic agents' motivation at different stages of development of corporate structures in Russia. The article argues that the need for comprehensive organisational and technological restructuring of enterprises led to the need for a concentrated ownership structure. The formation of such a structure in the late 1990s (which occurred, in fact, contrary to the government's activities) created preconditions for extending the time horizon of dominant owners and managers and for positive qualitative changes in the relations between major Russian companies and their shareholders and investors. © 2004 Centre for Research into Post-Communist Economies.
Ключевые слова указателя: corporate strategy; industrial policy; ownership; strategic approach; Eastern Hemisphere; Eurasia; Russian Federation; World

Название: Algebra with quadratic commutation relations for an axially perturbed Coulomb-Dirac field
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Novikova, E.M., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The motion of a particle in the field of an electromagnetic monopole (in the Coulomb-Dirac field) perturbed by an axially symmetric potential after quantum averaging is described by an integrable system. Its Hamiltonian can be written in terms of the generators of an algebra with quadratic commutation relations. We construct the irreducible representations of this algebra in terms of second-order differential operators; we also construct its hypergeometric coherent states. We use these states in the first-order approximation with respect to the perturbing field to obtain the integral representation of the eigenfunctions of the original problem in terms of solutions of the model Heun-type second-order ordinary differential equation and present the asymptotic approximation of the corresponding eigenvalues.
Ключевые слова автора: asymptotic spectrum behavior; coherent states; Dirac monopole; integrable systems; nonlinear commutation relations

Название: Business innovation in Russian industry
Организации: Centre for Organisational Studies, State University, Higher School of Economics, Kochnovsky Proezd 3, Moscow 125319, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gurkov, I., Centre for Organisational Studies, State University, Higher School of Economics, Kochnovsky Proezd 3, Moscow 125319, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article reports the results of a quasi-longitudinal survey of 2,800 top corporate executives of Russian industrial enterprises, presenting a snapshot of current innovation attempts in Russian enterprises and indicating economic and institutional factors that foster or hinder innovation. Russian CEOs see the necessity of profound changes in many areas of enterprise management and are not afraid of such changes, as innovations are perceived to be the best competitive weapon. However, their resources for radical innovation are rather limited. Beside lack of finance, the superimposed narrower strategic focus, the rigidities of local business networks, the weakness of external infrastructure for innovation and the absence of state support seriously impede attempts to implement radical changes. However, in every Russian industry surveyed there is a visible presence of innovative companies, which constitute 15-30% of all large and medium-size companies. Moreover, increasing imports and the growing number of foreign subsidiaries in Russia will continue to push Russian companies towards more intensive changes in all areas of enterprise management. © 2004 Centre for Research into Post-Communist Economies.
Ключевые слова указателя: corporate strategy; innovation; science and technology; Eastern Hemisphere; Eurasia; Russian Federation; World

Название: Birkhoff resonances and quantum ray method
Название источника: Proceedings of the International Seminar - Days on Diffraction 2004
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The known problem of resonances in the semiclassical approximation theory is analyzed. It is shown how a specific "quantum behavior" near the resonance motion appears. In the classical limit, we observe a Poisson micro-geometry concomitant with the resonance. We discuss what the corresponding quantum geometry is and construct irreducible representations of resonance algebras and their coherent states. This results in solving the resonance problems in question.
Ключевые слова указателя: Algebra; Approximation theory; Poisson distribution; Problem solving; Resonance; Birkhoff resonances; Micro-geometry; Resonance algebras; Quantum theory
Спонсоры: Russian Foundation for Basic Research;IEEE ED/Mtt/AP St. Petersburg Chapter;Russian Academy of Sciences
Название конференции: International Seminar - Days on Diffraction 2004

Название: Teaching economic thought: Landscapes after battles
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation; Alexander Poddiakov, Sadovnicheskaya St. 27-30, 115035 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Poddiakov, A., State University, Higher School of Economics, Russian Federation, Alexander Poddiakov, Sadovnicheskaya St. 27-30, 115035 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Van Bavel and Gaskell's (2004) analysis of laypeople's and economics experts' discourse in Chile is complemented by a look at expert-talk-based colonization of the social realities of Russia. It is demonstrated that resistance by laypeople to the acceptance of expert discourses is a buffering mechanism in a society to balance the import of deductively derived economic models from other countries. A dialogical approach is suggested for making sense of economic processes in any society.
Ключевые слова автора: 'Evil intent'; Colonization; Economy; Expert knowledge; Laypeople's thinking; Resistance; Russia

Авторы организаций: Pchelnikov, Yu.N., SloWaveS, Inc., 104 Drexelbrook CT, Cary, NC 27519, United States; Solntsev, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Variable Frequency Microwave (VFM) technology, developed by Lambda Technologies, is successfully used in Industry and other applications. This technology requires variable frequency source of microwave energy. The electronically adjustable microwave generators such as backword wave oscillators (BWO) have very low efficiency and can not be used for commercial heating. The best efficiency of the offered BWO-TWT device can be achieved at relatively low intensity of the field at the BWO section.

Название источника: Progress in Biomedical Optics and Imaging - Proceedings of SPIE
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 89028, Russian Federation; Dept. Radiol. Moscow Reg. Res. Clin., Institute MONIKI, Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 12918, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fedukova, M.V., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 89028, Russian Federation; Dmitriev, M.A., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 89028, Russian Federation; Mustafaeva, D.M., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 89028, Russian Federation; Rogatkin, D.A., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., B. Trehsvyatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, 89028, Russian Federation, Dept. Radiol. Moscow Reg. Res. Clin., Institute MONIKI, Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 12918, Russian Federation; Bychenkov, O.A., Dept. Radiol. Moscow Reg. Res. Clin., Institute MONIKI, Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 12918, Russian Federation; Polyakov, P.Y., Dept. Radiol. Moscow Reg. Res. Clin., Institute MONIKI, Shepkina str., 61/2, Moscow, 12918, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Today the noninvasive (in vivo, in situ) and real-time methods of diagnostics are desirable for general clinical practice. One of such promising technique is the optical multi-wave diffusion and absorption spectrophotometry. It allows a doctor to measure a number of important medical and biological (M&B) parameters such as the blood microcirculation parameters into the soft tissues, contents of the hemoglobin fractions into the periphery blood, etc. The use of the new components of the microelectronics and optics and development of new approaches to the diagnostic data processing makes it possible to design a of number of small and effective devices for this purpose. The basic principle of work of them in means of hardware function is the multi-wave light scanning of the tested tissue's area and detecting a backscattered light. In means of software function the basic principle of work of them is the inverse optical task solution when the optical and corresponding M&B parameters of the tested medium are calculated from the measured backscattered spectral optical data. This report presents one of such designed portable apparatus "Spectrotest"® developed in cooperation with Moscow Regional Research and Clinical Institute of "MONIKI". This device allows a doctor to register the index of melanin pigmentation of the skin, the volume of the blood in the tested tissue and the average hemoglobin saturation of the peripheral blood. All this parameters are available for a doctor to see them on the monitor screen in real-time mode directly during any diagnostic or treatment procedure. For that a new modified light scattering theory with the analytical solution of the main equations has been developed. Analytical solution allows the software to calculate and indicate the measured M&B parameters on the computer's monitor screen during less than one second. Today the developed diagnostic system "Spectrotest"® is used in real clinical practice in "MONIKI" and in the Oncology Center of the Russian Academy of Medical Science for the medical research aims. The general hardware and software composites of this diagnostic apparatus and examples of the application of it for the functional diagnostic tests are presented in this report as well.
Ключевые слова автора: Blood; Diagnostics; Fractions of the hemoglobin; Microcirculation; Noninvasive; Spectroscopy

Название: BWO with TWO-section structure
Название источника: Conference Proceedings - International Conference on Actual Problems of Electron Devices Engineering, APEDE' 2004

Краткое описание: This paper presents an analysis of a two-section BWO in which the first section operates as a beam modulator and the second section converts the energy of the modulated beam into the microwave energy at the output of the device. The finit section operates in the backward wave mode (BWO), the second section - in the forward wave mode (TWT) or backward wave mode (BWO). It is shown in this paper that the best efficiency of the offered BWO-TWT can be achieved at relatively low intensity of the field at the BWO (first section) output. In this case the theoretical efficiency of the offered oscillator fourfold exceeds the maximum efficiency of a conventional BWO (32% in comparison to 8,4%). © 2004 IEEE.

Краткое описание: The paper is devoted to a visualization-based data mining tool that helps to explore properties of large volumes of data given in the form of relational databases. It is shown how the tool can support the process of exploration of data properties and selecting a small number of preferable items from the database by application a graphic form of goal programming. The graphic Web application server is considered which implements the data mining tool via Internet. Its current and future applications are discussed. © Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg 2004.

Название: Russia's accession to the WTO: The potential for trade increase
Организации: CNRS-ROSES, France; University of Paris I, 106-112 Blvd. de l'Hôpital, 75013 Paris, France; State University-HSE, Moscow, Russian Federation; CERGE-EI, Prague, Czech Republic; WDI, France; CEPR, France
Авторы организаций: Babetskaia-Kukharchuk, O., CNRS-ROSES, France, University of Paris I, 106-112 Blvd. de l'Hôpital, 75013 Paris, France, State University-HSE, Moscow, Russian Federation, CERGE-EI, Prague, Czech Republic; Maurel, M., CNRS-ROSES, France, University of Paris I, 106-112 Blvd. de l'Hôpital, 75013 Paris, France, WDI, France, CEPR, France
Краткое описание: This paper investigates the impact of institutions on trade and estimates the potential for trade increase between the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS) and the European Union (EU). The latter is computed from a gravity equation using the procedure introduced by Hausman and Taylor [1981. Panel Data and Unobservable Individual Effects. Econometrica 49 (6) 1377-1398]. We find that CIS trade is still characterized by a large trade diversion effect, which implies that trade with non-CIS countries could increase considerably in the long run. Another source of deepening the level of the European trade integration comes from the convergence of institutions towards the EU standards in light of Russia's application to join the WTO. © 2004 Association for Comparative Economic Studies. Published by Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Accession to the WTO; EU enlargement; Gravity equation; Institutions; Transition

Название: Hopping transport of charge carriers in molecularly doped polymers: Theory and experiment
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The state of the art of experimental and theoretical studies on electron transport in molecularly doped polymers is analyzed. Three basic experimental methods used in this area - the time-of-flight (TOF) technique with both surface (classical version) and bulk generation of charge carriers, as well as the measurement of radiation-induced conductivity - were considered. The unified investigation method practiced in this work, which is based on the combination of the above approaches, makes it possible to unequivocally determine both the transport type and the parameters of a corresponding physical-mathematical model. In molecularly doped polymers under normal conditions, electron transport is dispersive, not Gaussian. Gaussian transport is supposed to be an extremely improbable phenomenon; in order to prove its presence, it is necessary to carry out extensive TOF measurements using both (surface and bulk) charge generation modes.
Ключевые слова указателя: polymer; dispersion; electric conductivity; electron transport; mathematical computing; mathematical model; normal distribution; radiation; review; time of flight mass spectrometry

Авторы: Belov V.V., Dobrokhotov S.Y., Tudorovskii T.Y.
Название: Asymptotic solutions of nonrelativistic equations of quantum mechanics in curved nanotubes: I. Reduction to spatially one-dimensional equations
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Institute for Problems of Mechanics, RAS, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, S.Y., Institute for Problems of Mechanics, RAS, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Tudorovskii, T.Y., Institute for Problems of Mechanics, RAS, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider equations of nonrelativistic quantum mechanics in thin three-dimensional tubes (nanotubes). We suggest a version of the adiabatic approximation that permits reducing the original three-dimensional equations to one-dimensional equations for a wide range of energies of longitudinal motion. The suggested reduction method (the operator method for separating the variables) is based on the Maslov operator method. We classify the solutions of the reduced one-dimensional equation. In Part I of this paper, we deal with the reduction problem, consider the main ideas of the operator separation of variables (in the adiabatic approximation), and derive the reduced equations. In Part II, we will discuss various asymptotic solutions and several effects described by these solutions.
Ключевые слова автора: adiabatic approximation; nanotubes; semiclassical approximation; size quantization; spin-orbit interaction

Название: Scattering of electromagnetic waves by a randomly rough surface as a boundary problem of laser radiation interaction with light-scattering materials and media
Название источника: Optics and Spectroscopy (English translation of Optika i Spektroskopiya)
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Rogatkin, D.A., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The light scattering by a rough surface with random Gaussian fluctuations of roughness is studied in the case of coarse roughness, whose parameters - mean deviation and correlation length - are much greater than the radiation wavelength. Closed analytical solutions of the problem are presented in terms of radiophysics for the boundary conditions of an ideal conductor and the impedance boundary conditions. These solutions are formulated in terms of a photometric scattering indicatrix. The possibility of their application to the problems of photometry and theory of radiative transfer and scattering in turbid media, in particular, in simulation of the process of boundary scattering of laser radiation by rough surfaces of biological tissues and media, is discussed. © 2004 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название источника: 5Th IEEE International Vacuum Electronics Conference, IVEC 2004
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., 1-3/12, Bol.Trekhsvyatitelsky per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., 1-3/12, Bol.Trekhsvyatitelsky per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Excitation of periodic waveguides was analyzed using intensive electron beams. A general electrodynamic theory of electromagnetic field excitation in periodic waveguides was also developed using electron beams. The theory is based on solution of non-uniform Maxwell's equations. It allowed to define the magnetic field corresponding to the magnetic interaction of moving electrons. The theory also allowed to solve the problem of excitation of slow-wave systems and simulate devices including areas near cut-off frequencies without using any equivalent circuits taking into account the dynamic effects of the space charge.

Краткое описание: The preliminary analysis of a two-section backward wave oscillator (BWO) with an amplifying section was discussed. It was found that the first section was loaded at the both ends by matched severs and the second section was connected to the matched output of the electron gun. The slow-wave structure (SWS) parameters and the modulated beam interact with each other at the forward wave mode. The results show that the best efficiency of the BWO-TWT (traveling-wave tube) could be achieved at low intensity of the field at the BWO section output.

Cheremushkinskaya Str., Moscow 117218, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 3/12 Trjekhsvyatitelsky pr., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Changes in the optical characteristics in synthetic sapphire specimens produced by microsecond pulse irradiation with a stream of hydrogen ions of energies ranging up to tens keV have been observed. Data on decrease in the optical reflection, measured within the wavelength range of 200-900 nm, are presented. This characterization is compared with the data received by optical and atomic force microscopy as well as by lattice structure analysis performed with X-rays. The measurements indicate that the changes of optical parameters are not a consequence of absorption increase and/or sapphire decomposition. They result from modifications of the morphology and structure of surface layer of the sapphire samples, induced by irradiation.
Ключевые слова автора: Fast ion stream; Irradiation; Morphology; Optical characteristics; Surface modification

Название: Counteraction to the learning and development of another person
Организации: Faculty of Psychology, State University, High School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Poddiakov, A.N., Faculty of Psychology, State University, High School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The phenomenon of counteraction to the learning and development of other subjects is analysed. Here the results of original empirical research of people's representations about prevalence of the phenomenon in real life (the interview of Russians and Americans). The typology of situations of counteraction and assistance to another's learning and development on parameters of "purpose - means-results" is submitted. A new research field is distinguished - the study of abilities and strategies of deliberate creation of learning and developmental difficulties by one subject to another one.
Ключевые слова автора: Aid; Assistance; Coping behavior; Counteraction; Creation and overcoming of difficulties; Development; Learning

Название: Oil and gas in the capitals: Russia and the Kyoto Protocol: It's all about oil and gas, stupid!
Организации: EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sapir, J., EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Russia may, at last, ratify the Kyoto Protocol by the end of 2004. Some people believed that the ratification would be bartered for European support of Russia's admittance to the World Trade Organization. However, some believe that its ratification correlates with oil and the associated economic aspects that come with it. Even if the US does not ratify the Kyoto Protocol, Russia could sell carbon rights to other countries. Thus, implementing the protocol would not harm growth and could even be used to channel funds toward modernization projects.

Название: Electron-beam charging of elastic vulcanized rubbers
Организации: Soyuz Fed. Ctr. of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140090, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Vorontsovo pole 10, Moscow, 103064, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Charging of filled polymer compositions (rubber blends) in the rubbery state by 60-120 keV electrons in vacuum was studied using the split Faraday cup. It was found that the electrode material almost did not affect the charging behavior. The buildup of electric charge was shown to be effective as a result of the presence of dispersed dielectric fillers, even at a high conductivity in the rubber blends. The experimental data are compared with numerical simulation results obtained for the one-dimensional case, taking into account the dose and current density depth profiles for incident and secondary electrons, as well as the intrinsic conductivity of filled polymer compositions.
Ключевые слова указателя: rubber; article; chemical composition; dielectric constant; elasticity; electric activity; electric conductivity; electron; electron beam; materials testing; molecular mechanics; simulation

Организации: Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Aviation Institute, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Department of Statistics, University of Strathclyde, Glasgow, United Kingdom; Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M. Lomonosov Moscow Stt. Univ., GSP-2, Vorobiovy Gory, Moscow 119992, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The mean-square filtering problem for the discrete Volterra equations is a nontrivial task due to an enormous amount of operations required for the implementation of optimal filter. A difference equation of a moderate dimension is chosen as an approximate model for the original system. Then the reduced Kaiman filter can be used as an approximate but efficient estimator. Using the duality theory of convex variational problems, a level of nonoptimality for the chosen filter is obtained. This level can be efficiently computed without exactly solving the full filtering problem.
Ключевые слова автора: Duality theory; Linear discrete Volterra equations; Stochastic mean-square filtering problem

Название: Selections of bounded variation
Организации: Department of Mathematics, State University Higher, School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pechërskaya St. 25, Nizhny Novgorod 603600, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chistyakov, V.V., Department of Mathematics, State University Higher, School of Economics, Bol'shaya Pechërskaya St. 25, Nizhny Novgorod 603600, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper presents recent results concerning the problem of the existence of those selections, which preserve the properties of a given set-valued mapping of one real variable taking on compact values from a metric space. The properties considered are the boundedness of Jordan, essential or generalized variation, Lipschitz or absolute continuity. Selection theorems are obtained by virtue of a single compactness argument, which is the exact generalization of the Helly selection principle. For set-valued mappings with the above properties we obtain a Castaing-type representation and prove the existence of multivalued selections and selections which pass through the boundaries of the images of the set-valued mapping and which are nearest in variation to a given mapping. Multivalued Lipschitzian superposition operators acting on mappings of bounded generalized variation are characterized, and solutions of bounded generalized variation to functional inclusions and embeddings, including variable set-valued operators in the right hand side, are obtained. © Heldermann Verlag.
Ключевые слова автора: Generalized variation; Multivalued superposition operators; Regular selections; Selection principle; Set-valued mappings

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Kolesnikov V.A.
Название: Mobility of excess charge carriers in low-density polyethylene
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Frumkin Inst. of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kolesnikov, V.A., Frumkin Inst. of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Comparative testing of commercial LDPE (20-μm-thick film) was performed using the radiation-induced conductivity and time-of-flight techniques at elevated temperatures (basic value, 353 K). It was shown that charge carrier transport in the test polymer is bipolar, and its hole and electron transport parameters are virtually equal. The appearance of a plateau on the hole current transient in time-of-flight experiments is not due to the establishment of a quasi-equilibrium regime of hole transport but is presumably associated with the normal (Gaussian) transport of a small group of positively charged particles. The exact nature of these particles was not revealed. The transport of electrons and holes still remains nonequilibrium (dispersive) over the entire observation time span (at least, up to a few seconds). The transit of holes and electrons is reliably detected at times of about 200 ms and occurs in full accordance with the dispersive transport laws (electric field strength of 5 × 10 7 V/m). In the transit region, the dispersion parameter for holes (0.5-0.6) is somewhat greater than that for electrons (0.3-0.4).
Ключевые слова указателя: polyethylene derivative; polymer; article; correlation analysis; density; dispersion; electric conductivity; electric field; electricity; electron transport; equilibrium constant; experimental test; film; ion current; ionic strength; molecular dynamics; molecular interaction; molecular mechanics; parameter; phase transition; reaction analysis; reliability; temperature dependence; thickness; time of flight mass spectrometry

Авторы: Smirnov I.A., Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Theoretical analysis of the mechanism of slow reversible degradation of the transport properties of photoconducting polymers
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Smirnov, I.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The dose effect in photoconducting polymers is analyzed, concerning the buildup of minority charge carriers that act as recombination sites, which leads to a noticeable decrease in the effective mobility of majority carriers and degradation of the transport properties of polymer layers. This charge degradation mechanism is universal and completely reversible and can be rationalized in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model. The disorder parameter plays a determining role in the manifestation of the dose effect; when it decreases (<0.4), both the magnitude of the dose effect and the time required for its annealing strongly increase.
Ключевые слова указателя: polymer; article; chemical analysis; conductance; degradation; mechanics; model; parameter; theoretical study; time; transport kinetics

Краткое описание: We consider smooth normalization problems for systems of ordinary differential equations whose linear part has one zero eigenvalue, while the other eigenvalues lie outside the imaginary axis.
Ключевые слова автора: Autonomous system; Degenerate singular point; Normal form; Ordinary differential equations

Название: On the Lin condition in strong ratio limit theorems
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shur, M.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A new version of strong limit theorems for Lin ratios (1976) free of former restrictions such as the absolute continuity of the measures in question or the conservativeness of the corresponding operators is presented. As the most original statement of the paper (Theorem 5) states, one of the two basic Lin conditions holds automatically for a wide class of Markov chains and, in particular, for many random walks on groups. The proof is based on a substantial development of the author's results (1980) concerning the behavior of multistep transition probabilities.
Ключевые слова автора: Lin conditions; Markov chains; Multistep transition probability; Random walks on groups; Ratio limit theorems

Название: Deficiency indices of a symmetric ordinary differential operator with infinitely many degeneration points
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Orochko, Yu.B., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Let H be the minimal symmetric operator in L 2(ℝ) generated by the differential expression (-1) n(c(x)f (n)) (n), n ≥ 1, with a real coefficient c(x) that has countably many zeros without finite accumulation points and is infinitely smooth at all points x € ℝ with c(x) ≠ 0. We study the value Def H of the deficiency indices of H. It is shown that Def H = +∞ if infinitely many zeros of c(x) have multiplicities p satisfying the inequality n - 1/2 < p < 2n - 1/2. Our second result pertains to the case in which the set of zeros of c(x) is bounded neither above nor below. Under this condition, Def H = 0 provided that the multiplicity of each zero is greater than or equal to 2n - 1/2. The multiplicities of zeros of c(x) are understood in the paper in a broader sense than in the standard definition.
Ключевые слова автора: Deficiency indices; Degenerate ordinary differential operator; Symmetric operator

Название: Intrinsic dynamics of manifolds: Quantum paths, holonomy, and trajectory localization
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a dynamic generalization of the classical "kinematic" notion of affine connection providing a correspondence between paths in the manifold and diffeomorphisms of the manifold. The linearization of these path-diffeomorphisms coincides with the parallel translations via the connection. In this dynamical geometry one can translate nonanalytic functions and distributions rather than tangent vectors. We describe the dynamical holonomy and the dynamical curvature. At the symplectic or quantum level, this construction makes up the symplectic or quantum paths, as well quantum connection, quantum curvature, and quantum holonomy. The construction of path-diffeomorphisms, when applied to trajectories of a given dynamical system, produces a dynamical localization of the system. In the symplectic (quantum) case, this dynamical localization provides a coherent-type representation of the quantum flow.

Название: Intrinsic dynamics of symplectic manifolds: Membrane representation and phase product
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We describe a correspondence between symplectic transformations and their phase functions on general symplectic manifolds. At the quantum level, this is a correspondence between unitary operators and phase functions of the WKB-approximation. We represent generic functions via the symplectic area of membranes and consider related geometric properties of the noncommutative phase product. An interpretation of the phase product in terms of symplectic groupoids and the groupoid extension of Lagrangian submanifolds are described. The membrane representations of the corresponding Lagrangian phase functions are obtained. The paper uses the intrinsic dynamic approach based on the notion of Ether Hamiltonian, which is a generalization of the notion of symplectic connection. We show that this approach works in the torsion case as well.

Название: On relations between probabilities under quantum and classical measurements
Организации: Intl. Ctr. in Mathematical Modelling, MSI, University of Vaxjo, Sweden; Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., Technical University, Trekhsvyati-telskii Per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Khrennikov, A.Y., Intl. Ctr. in Mathematical Modelling, MSI, University of Vaxjo, Sweden; Loubenets, E.R., Moscow State Inst. Electron./Math., Technical University, Trekhsvyati-telskii Per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We show that the so-called quantum probabilistic rule, usually introduced in the physical literature as an argument of the essential distinction between the probability relations under quantum and classical measurements, is not, as it is commonly accepted, in contrast to the rule for the addition of probabilities of mutually exclusive events. The latter is valid under all experimental situations upon classical and quantum systems. We discuss also the quantum measurement situation that is similar to the classical one, described by the Bayes formula. We show the compatibility of the description of this quantum measurement situation in the frame of purely classical and experimentally justified straightforward frequency arguments and in the frame of the quantum stochastic approach to the description of generalized quantum measurements. In view of derived results, we argue that even under experiments upon classical systems the classical Bayes formula describes particular experimental situations that are specific for context-independent measurements. The similarity of the forms of the relation between the transformation of probabilities, which we derive in the frame of the quantum stochastic approach and in the frame of the approach, based on straightforward frequency arguments, underlines once more that the projective (von Neumann) measurements represent only a special type of measurement situations in quantum physics.
Ключевые слова автора: Bayes's formula; Interference of probabilities; Quantum probabilistic rule

Авторы: Bondarenko G.G., Fisher M.R., Kristya V.I., Prassitski V.V.
Название: Electrode material transport and re-deposition in high-intensity arc discharge lamps
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., B. Trekhsviatitelskiy Street 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. Univ., Bazhenov Street 4, Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Res. Inst. of Electron. Eng. Mat., Gagarin Street 1, Kaluga 248650, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., B. Trekhsviatitelskiy Street 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Fisher, M.R., Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. Univ., Bazhenov Street 4, Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. Univ., Bazhenov Street 4, Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Prassitski, V.V., Res. Inst. of Electron. Eng. Mat., Gagarin Street 1, Kaluga 248650, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A two-dimensional model of sintered electrode activator (in particular, barium) transport in the arc discharge lamp tube volume has been developed, based on a numerical solution of the non-stationary diffusion equation. The dependence of the barium atom flow density at the electrode rod tip on fill gas pressure and electrode dimensions has been calculated. It has been found that the main mechanism of activator transport to the rod tip is evaporation from the sintered body and diffusion through the gas. Evolution of tungsten rod emission characteristics caused by deposition of the evaporated material on its surface has been studied experimentally. © 2003 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Arc discharge lamp; Breakdown voltage; Electrode activator transport

Название: Asymptotics of kink-kink interaction for sine-Gordon type equations
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kulagin, D.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation; Omel'yanov, G.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a class of semilinear wave equations with a small parameter ε. The nonlinearity of F(u) is assumed to be such that the corresponding equation has an exact self-similar solution of kink type. For F(u), we obtain sufficient conditions for two kinks to interact (in the sense of the leading term of the asymptotics with respect to ε) in the same way as the kinks of the sine-Gordon equation.
Ключевые слова автора: Hugoniót-type condition; Kink-kink interaction; Semilinear wave equation with a small parameter; Sine-Gordon equation

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Smirnov I.A., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Abramov V.N.
Название: Analysis of the reversible character of radiation-induced conductivity in polymers
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Abramov, V.N., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The results of numerical simulation of the rise and decay of transient current in a virgin specimen of a model polymer upon continuous irradiation and in the irradiated specimen after its holding for a certain time are presented. The dependence of the annealing effect on the rest time was examined in detail. It was shown that long times are required for significant annealing, which strongly increase with a decrease in the disorder parameter α (for example, from 4 × 103 s at α = 0.5 to 107 s at α = 0.3). An analysis of irradiation in the intermittent mode showed that this technique does not provide any new information as compared with the classical continuous irradiation (contrary to the opinion existing in the literature) but predictably complicates the interpretation of experimental data; however, it may be successfully used to measure the time-average current.
Ключевые слова указателя: polymer; analytical parameters; article; conductance; irradiation; radiation; simulation; theoretical model

Краткое описание: In this paper, sufficient conditions for the existence of eigenvalues of a finitely perturbed Laplace operator in an infinite cylindrical domain and their asymptotics in the small parameter are given. Similar questions for tubes, i.e., deformed cylinders, are also considered.
Ключевые слова автора: Asymptotics of eigenvalues of the Laplace operator; Bound states in tubes; Finitely perturbed Laplace operator; Laplace operator; Laplace operator with Dirichlet condition

Название: Quantum magnetic algebra and magnetic curvature
Название источника: Journal of Physics A: Mathematical and General
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Physics, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Man., R3T 2N2, Canada
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Osborn, T.A., Department of Physics, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Man., R3T 2N2, Canada
Краткое описание: The symplectic geometry of the phase space associated with a charged particle is determined by the addition of the Faraday 2-form to the standard dp ∧ dq structure on ℝ2n. In this paper, we describe the corresponding algebra of Weylsymmetrized functions in operators q̂, p̂ satisfying nonlinear commutation relations. The multiplication in this algebra generates an associative * product of functions on the phase space. This * product is given by an integral kernel whose phase is the symplectic area of a groupoid-consistent membrane. A symplectic phase space connection with non-trivial curvature is extracted from the magnetic reflections associated with the Stratonovich quantizer. Zero and constant curvature cases are considered as examples. The quantization with both static and time-dependent electromagnetic fields is obtained. The expansion of the * product by the deformation parameter ℏ, written in the covariant form, is compared with the known deformation quantization formulae.

Название: Mechanism of High-Temperature Heat Capacity of Tungsten: Study of Relaxation Processes
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yakunkin, M.M., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It is experimentally shown that, in addition to fast relaxation, a slow relaxation process controlled by vacancy diffusion contributes to the high-temperature heat capacity Cp of tungsten. To account for the existence of contributions from two relaxation processes to Cp, it is suggested to consider the finite time required for the equilibrium density of transient complexes to set in. © 2004 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Kolesnikov V.A., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Transport of radiation-induced charge carriers in poly(N-vinylcarbazole) and a molecularly doped polycarbonate
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skiǐ per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Frumkin Inst. of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskiǐ pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation

Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skiǐ per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kolesnikov, V.A., Frumkin Inst. of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskiǐ pr. 31, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skiǐ per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It was demonstrated that the transport of holes (majority charge carriers) in poly(N-vinylcarbazole) and in the molecularly doped polycarbonate at room temperature is nonequilibrium (dispersive) within the entire experimentally accessible range of observation times (from tens of microseconds to several seconds) as evidenced by time-of-flight and radiation-induced conductivity techniques. If the time of flight is preceded by the appearance of a shoulder (decelerated current decay but without achieving a plateau) on time-of-flight curves, then on radiation-induced conductivity curves of the transient current, a similar transition follows the multiple trapping theory. The dispersion parameter is rather large for both polymers (0.6-0.7 at room temperature) and agrees well with the results from time-of-flight measurements of hole drift mobility in poly(N-vinyl-carbazole) and its charge-transfer complexes dating back to the mid-1970s.
Ключевые слова указателя: poly(n vinylcarbazole); polycarbonate; polymer; unclassified drug; article; complex formation; conductance; ion transport; quantum theory; radiation; room temperature; temperature dependence

Краткое описание: Solutions to basic non-linear limit spectral equation for matrices RT R of increasing dimension are investigated, where R are rectangular random matrices with independent normal entries. The analytical properties of limiting normed trace for the resolvent of RT R are investigated, boundaries of limit spectra found, and upper estimates of spectral density are obtained. © 2004 Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.

Краткое описание: In this paper, we prove a new theorem concerning representation of discrete time martingales, which is based on solving a specially chosen problem of optimal control with random sequences. We establish a relationship between the solution of the Bellman equation and the martingale representation. We illustrate the results with an example of calculating a European type option.

Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskii per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation

Vuzovskii per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, S.Yu., Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Tudorovskii, T.Ya., Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We construct asymptotic solutions of quantum nonrelativistic equations in nanotubes that can be regarded as quantum waveguides. We reduce the initial equations to one-dimensional equations describing the effective dynamics of a quasiparticle along the nanotube axis (for each of the transverse quantization subbands). In contrast to the classical problem, excluding quantum restrictions leads to additional contributions by virtue of the effect of dimensional quantization. We discuss how the trap, reflection, "instability" of fast longitudinal modes and other effects can be described in the examined model of the nanotube.

Cheremushkinskaya 25, 117218, Moscow, Russian Federation; S, A.L., Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitelsky per. 1-3/12, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The work presents experimental research of the influence of a pulse of high-temperature dense plasma on materials, which as are supposed, will be used in future thermonuclear power stations. The experiments were made on 4kJ Plasma Focus installation. Such type of installations is capable to form pulse of axial plasma flows moving with velocity approximately 108 cm/s and plasma density is about 1018 cm3. Pure vanadium was chosen in our researches, because it can be used as a basic element at the creation of low-activated alloys. We found that due to a pulse irradiation of vanadium by deuterium plasma, shock waves arises, which result in super-deep penetration of deuterium into a volume of the studied sample. This process is accompanied with the change of vanadium structure, the occurrence of pores in it, and changes of its mechanical properties. The break-away of vanadium particles from the backside surface of the sample and forming of craters were also observed.
Ключевые слова автора: Material science; Plasma focus; Superdeep penetration of deuterium

Краткое описание: The charging of filled polymer composites (rubber blends) by irradiation with 75- and 120-keV electrons at 100-120 K in vacuum was studied using the split Faraday cup. The experimental results were compared with those of 1D-numerical calculations with allowance for the depth distribution of absorbed dose and current density of injected electrons as determined in Monte Carlo simulation. It was shown that a good fit of the experimental to the calculated data is obtained if the intrinsic conductivity of a composite, as well as its radiation-induced conductivity depending on the electric field strength, is taken into account.
Ключевые слова указателя: rubber; absorption; article; conductance; electric field; electricity; electron beam; electron transport; irradiation; low temperature; mathematical computing; Monte Carlo method; polymerization; vacuum

Краткое описание: The radiation-induced conductivity of polymer composites based on polyisoprene rubber filled with finely divided oxides of various chemical natures was studied in the continuous irradiation mode. It was shown that the radiation conductivity is closely related to the molecular mobility of the rubber. It was found that a change in the character of thermal motion of fragments of rubber macromolecules, which is caused by interaction with the filler, could considerably enhance the radiation-induced conductivity of a polymer composite.
Ключевые слова указателя: filler; oxide; polymer; rubber; article; composite material; conductance; macromolecule; molecular dynamics; radiation; thermal analysis

The explicit form of the respective multidimensional Goncharov density and its generalizations are obtained.

Краткое описание: Using an intrinsic dynamical Schrödinger-type equation, exact associative non-commutative products of functions over a plane with nonstandard connection are constructed. For one of these products, an operator representation is found. The left regular representation of the generators of the algebra is evaluated, and the weak asymptotics of the quantum products in the sense of the theory of deformation quantization is presented.

Авторы: Sadovnichii D.N., Tyutnev A.P., Milekhin Yu.M.
Название: Bulk charging of polymer films under electron irradiation
Название источника: European Space Agency, (Special Publication) ESA SP
Организации: Fed. Ctr. of Dual-Use Technol. Soyuz, Academician Zhukov, 42, 140090 Dzerzhinsky, Moscow Region, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
