Inst. of Electron./Math., Bol. Trechsvyatitel. per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Milekhin, Yu.M., Fed. Ctr. of Dual-Use Technol. Soyuz, Academician Zhukov, 42, 140090 Dzerzhinsky, Moscow Region, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Theoretical as well as experimental studies of electron charging of polymer dielectrics have been conducted using the split Faraday cup technique. Monte-Carlo calculations of the depth distribution of the radiation driven current and the dose rate have been performed for monoenergetic electrons in 0.04-9 MeV energy range and also for the geosynchronous substorm electron spectrum (as obtained by SCATHA spacecraft). Spatial as well as temporal variations of the space charge density and the electric field strength have been found numerically in ID approximation. Laboratory experiments consisted in irradiation of the polymer slab by 0.06-1 MeV single energy electrons at room temperature in vacuum. It has been shown that the asymptotic decay of the rear electrode current depends on the exponent in the power law dependence of the radiation induced conductivity on the dose rate ubiquitously encountered in polymers.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electric charge; Electric fields; Electrodes; Electron irradiation; Monte Carlo methods; Bulk charging; Plastic films

Сокращенное название источника: Eur Space Agency Spec Publ ESA SP

Авторы: Sadovnichii D.N., Tyutnev A.P., Milekhin Yu.M.
Название: Bulk Charging of Polystyrene by Electrons in Vacuum
Организации: Soyuz Fed. Ctr. of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140090, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation

Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Milekhin, Yu.M., Soyuz Fed. Ctr. of Dual Technologies, ul. Akademika Zhukova 42, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140090, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A theoretical analysis was performed on the buildup of space charge in PS films upon their irradiation by a nonpenetrating electron beam in vacuum. Unlike previous calculations, both the kinetics of establishment of radiation-induced conductivity during irradiation and its field effects were taken into account. Injection current and dose rate distributions in the bulk of the polymer were calculated using the Monte Carlo method. The space-time distribution of the space charge density and electric field strength were determined by numerical simulation in terms of the one-dimensional approximation. The main consequences of the effects of field and kinetic properties of radiation-induced conductivity on the field generation dynamics and the charge density upon electron irradiation were revealed. It was shown that the decay of the transient current, which nearly follows the hyperbolic law, in the electron-beam irradiation of PS in vacuum is due to the specifics of kinetic behavior of radiation-induced conductivity in the polymer and its dependence on the electric field strength.
Ключевые слова указателя: polystyrene; article; calculation; data analysis; electric conductivity; electric field; electricity; electron; electron beam; irradiation; kinetics; Monte Carlo method; radiation dose; simulation; theoretical model; theory; vacuum

Название: Constructive filtering algorithms for delayed systems with uncertain statistics
Название источника: Journal of Dynamic Systems, Measurement and Control, Transactions of the ASME
Организации: Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State Univ., Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State Univ., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Ahmedova, N.K., Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State Univ., Moscow, Russian Federation; Kolmanovskii, V.B., Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Matasov, A.I., Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State Univ., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A stochastic optimal guaranteed estimation problem for dynamic delayed systems with uncertain statistics is considered. The solution of this problem reduces to a complex nonsmooth extremal problem. To obtain an approximate solution, the nonsmooth problem is replaced by a smooth one. Constructive filtering algorithms are obtained from an approximate solution of the smooth problem under the assumption that the delay is small in comparison with the observation time. Estimates for the nonoptimality levels of the proposed filtering algorithms are derived.
Ключевые слова указателя: Algorithms; Approximation theory; Delay control systems; Optimal control systems; Statistical methods; Uncertain systems; Constructive filtering algorithms; Uncertain statistics; Signal filtering and prediction

Краткое описание: The selection spatial harmonics in pseudoperiodic waveguides depending on frequency is studied. Selection method is based on coordinated variation of the step and phase distribution of elements along the waveguide, which provides the constant phase velocity of one spatial harmonic and destroys other spatial harmonics. The possibility of application of pseudoperiodic folded waveguide for creation of powerful broadband TWTs is indicated.

Авторы: Kolmanovskii V., Koroleva N., Maizenberg T., Mao X., Matasov A.
Название: Neutral stochastic differential delay equations with Markovian switching
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Mining University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Statistics, University of Strathclyde, Glasgow G1 1XH, United Kingdom; Department of Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow Stt. Univ., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kolmanovskii, V., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Koroleva, N., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Maizenberg, T., Moscow Mining University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Mao, X., Department of Statistics, University of Strathclyde, Glasgow G1 1XH, United Kingdom; Matasov, A., Department of Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow Stt. Univ., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Neutral stochastic differential delay equations (NSDDEs) have recently been studied intensively (see Kolmanovskii, V.B. and Nosov, V.R., Stability and Periodic Modes of Control Systems with Aftereffect; Nauka: Moscow, 1981 and Mao X., Stochastic Differential Equations and Their Applications; Horwood Pub.: Chichester, 1997). Given that many systems are often subject to component failures or repairs, changing subsystem interconnections and abrupt environmental disturbances etc., the structure and parameters of underlying NSDDEs may change abruptly. One way to model such abrupt changes is to use the continuous-time Markov chains. As a result, the underlying NSDDEs become NSDDEs with Markovian switching which are hybrid systems. So far little is known about the NSDDEs with Markovian switching and the aim of this paper is to close this gap. In this paper we will not only establish a fundamental theory for such systems but also discuss some important properties of the solutions e.g. boundedness and stability.
Ключевые слова автора: Brownian motion; Generalized Itô's formula; Hybrid system; Markov chain

Краткое описание: A theoretical analysis of radiation-induced conductivity in polymers with complex trap energy distribution in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model was performed. Model parameters determined previously for poly(ethylene terephthalate) by measuring its radiation-induced conductivity were used in numerical calculations. The results were obtained in both small-signal pulse mode and continuous irradiation mode including the steady-state conditions. The approach proposed makes it possible to satisfactorily describe the time course of the effective mobility virtually over the entire range of observation time.

Название: A new paradigm for constructing children-oriented Web-sites of art museums
Организации: Stud. Culture, Ecol., For. Languages, Moscow Children Teenagers Pal. C., Kossygin str. 17, 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation; Dept. Math. Methods Prog. Info. P., Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B.Tryochsvyatitelsky 1-3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fomichova, O.S., Stud. Culture, Ecol., For. Languages, Moscow Children Teenagers Pal. C., Kossygin str. 17, 119991 Moscow, Russian Federation; Fomichov, V.A., Dept. Math. Methods Prog. Info. P., Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B.Tryochsvyatitelsky 1-3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper describes the central ideas of a new approach to creating Web-sites of art museums; it is proposed to take into account the peculiarities of the child's cognitive-emotional sphere for constructing children-oriented Web-sites of art museums. The idea is that usual Web-sites are created to inform the users, to display the treasures, to show the gems of the collections in order to attract the attention of the audience. The way information is provided is based on the expected background of the possible users and on possible motivation. In case of children, everything is different: information acquisition is to be based on strong interest. It means that the child should be struck by the vision, then be emotionally touched and have enough time for establishing links between the images already existing in his/her conceptual picture of the world and new, just found images. In respond, the child will positively or negatively react to the acquired piece of information and inscribe his/her interpretation of the new found vision into his/her conceptual system, including his/her estimation of the vision. The significance of such Web-sites for creating cognitive foundations of sustainable development and the role of natural language interfaces are discussed.
Ключевые слова автора: Art Museum; Children-oriented Web-site; Natural language interface; Semantic representation; Sustainable development

Авторы: Belov V.V., Dobrokhotov S.Yu., Maksimov V.A.
Название: Explicit formulas for generalized action-angle variables in a neighborhood of an isotropic torus and their application
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Institute for Problems in Mechanics, RAS, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, S.Yu., Institute for Problems in Mechanics, RAS, Moscow, Russian Federation; Maksimov, V.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Different versions of the Darboux-Weinstein theorem guarantee the existence of action-angle-type variables and the harmonic-oscillator variables in a neighborhood of Isotropic tori in the phase space. The procedure for constructing these variables is reduced to solving a rather complicated system of partial differential equations. We show that this system can be integrated in quadratures, which permits reducing the problem of constructing these variables to solving a system of quadratic equations. We discuss several applications of this purely geometric fact in problems of classical and quantum mechanics.
Ключевые слова автора: Action-angle variables; Isotropic tori; Semiclassical asymptotic approximations

Название: Fractal analysis of digital systems: The structure and properties of the scale factor
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The structure and properties of the scale factor are explored. This might serve as a complementary characteristic to Hausdorff dimension in the fractal analysis of digital systems. The scale factor helps one reveal self-similarity in patterns of points and number sets created by partitioning a line segment of unit length with the aid of natural numbers. A resultant number set is related to musical notes. A variable pattern of numbers that are powers of 2 or 3 is discovered in a generalized finite sequence of natural numbers. The powers are shown to generate more sophisticated self-similar number sets.
Ключевые слова указателя: Approximation theory; Crystal lattices; Fractals; Mathematical models; Number theory; Set theory; Digital systems; Hausdroff dimensions; Scale factors; Microelectronics

Название: Noninjectivity of the Predual Bimodule of the Measure Algebra for Infinite Discrete Groups
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tabaldyev, S.B., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper, it is proved that the predual bimodule of the measure algebra of an infinite discrete group is not injective despite the fact that the measure algebra of an amenable group is amenable in the sense of Connes. Thus the well-known result of Khelemskii (claiming that, for a von Neumann algebra, Connes-amenability is equivalent to the condition that the predual bimodule is injective) cannot be extended to measure algebras. Moreover, for a discrete amenable group, we give a simple formula for a normal virtual diagonal of the measure algebra. It is shown that a certain canonical bimodule over the measure algebra is not normal.
Ключевые слова автора: Amenable Banach algebra; Connes-amenability; Injective bimodule; Locally compact group; Measure algebra

Название: Impenetrability condition for a degenerate point of a one-term symmetric differential operator of even order
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Orochko, Yu.B., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Let a(x) isin; C∞[0, h] and b(x) ∈ C ∞[-h, 0], h > 0, be real functions not vanishing on their definition intervals. For fixed p > 0 and q > 0 one considers the differential expressions sp+[f](x) = (-1) n(xp a(x)f(n))(n)(x), s q-[f](x) = (-1)n((-x)qb(x)f (n))(n)(x) of arbitrary even order 2n degenerate at the point x = 0. Let Hp+ and Hq- be the minimal symmetric operators induced by sp+[f](x) and sq-[f](x) in the Hilbert spaces L2(0, h) and L2(-h, 0), respectively. 'Sewing together' the differential expressions sp+[f](x) and sq-[f](x) at x = 0 one obtains a new differential expression spq[f](x), x ∈ [-h, h], which is degenerate at the same point, an interior point of [-h, h]. Under certain constraints on p and q the differential expression s pq[f](x) gives rise to a minimal symmetric operator Hpq in L2 (-h, h) which is a symmetric extension of the orthogonal sum Hq- ⊕ Hp+. The point x = 0 is called in this paper an interior barrier for spq[f](x). Conditions ensuring the equality HPq = Hq ⊕ Hp are found. It is natural to call an interior barrier an impenetrable interior interface if this equality holds and it is a penetrable interior interface if it fails. The main result of this paper is as follows: the point x = 0 is an impenetrable interior interface if p,q ≥ 2n - ≥ 1/2, and this condition is best possible in a certain sense.

Ctr. of Dual Technologies, Sovetskaya ul. 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140090, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The radiation-induced conductivity of cured and transformer-oil extended polybutadiene and polyisoprene rubbers was studied. It was shown that the extender ratio and degree of cure of a polymer system have a much greater effect on the radiation conductivity than the addition of donor-acceptor dopants trapping mobile charge carriers. It was concluded that the molecular mobility is the major factor determining the electron transport properties of the systems of interest.

Краткое описание: Adaptive algorithms for optimal identification of a restoration system are described, which permit correcting the coordinates of a linear dynamic system from a restricted set of observable coordinates in the presence of noise. The algorithms are based on the neural network's method. The estimations obtained converge to the optimal ones in the sense of the minimum mean square deviation from the exact value. © 2003 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

Название: Plasma and injection modification of the gate dielectric in MOS structures
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Technical University, 12 Malaya Pionerskaya, Moscow 113054, Russian Federation; Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, 4 Bazhenov St., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Zelenograd Res. Inst. Phys. Problems, Moscow 103460, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Technical University, 12 Malaya Pionerskaya, Moscow 113054, Russian Federation; Andreev, V.V., Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, 4 Bazhenov St., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Maslovsky, V.M., Zelenograd Res. Inst. Phys. Problems, Moscow 103460, Russian Federation; Stolyarov, A.A., Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, 4 Bazhenov St., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation; Drach, V.E., Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, 4 Bazhenov St., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It has been shown that both RF plasma and plasma-jet treatments led to the creation of electron traps in the bulk of SiO2 film. As a result, it is possible to increase the breakdown voltage of a metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) structure when the breakdown probability is significantly decreased. It has been found that injection treatment of MOS structures with thermal SiO2 film allows control of the statistical distribution of charge defects, and thus the mean charge injected into the dielectric to breakdown is increased. The modification of MOS devices having a gate dielectric of SiO2/phosphosilicate glass by Fowler-Nordheim (FN) electron injection taking place in high-fields was also studied. Constant-current FN electron injection from the silicon substrate and the metal electrode was used to modify the charge state of the MOS structure. © 2002 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: High field; Injection; Metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) structure; Plasma treatment
Ключевые слова указателя: Electric breakdown; Electron traps; Electron tunneling; Gates (transistor); Plasma jets; Silica; Thin films; Threshold voltage; Plasma treatment; MOS devices

Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Radiation-induced currents in polymer layers exposed to radiation on their outer side were theoretically analyzed under conditions when the role of secondary emission processes in establishing steady-state charging regimes is very insignificant (the potential of the open surface does not exceed one tenth of electron beam energy). The cases of both electron and hole conductivity of polymers were considered. The determining role of the frequency factor for the events of thermal detrapping of charge carriers in the choice of a model for describing the phenomenon in question was revealed. Previously published data on the issue are discussed and partly criticized.
Ключевые слова указателя: polymer; article; conductance; electron beam; energy; injection; radiation exposure; steady state; surface property; temperature; theoretical study

Краткое описание: The effect of electron irradiation on the equilibrium concentrations at an interphase interface in two-layer Mo-Ni samples is considered experimentally and theoretically. One of the causes of this effect is a change in the diffusion permeability of the interface during irradiation. Copyright © 2003 by MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Авторы организаций: Lysenko, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A study of the bispin is presented. The bispin is a semiconductor device that can convert incident light into a relaxation self-sustaining oscillation of electric current in the form of sharply peaked impulses, thus making both a photodetector and an electrical-pulse generator. Factors determining the peak current in different regimes of oscillation are investigated.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electric conductivity; Electric space charge; Energy conversion; Photocurrents; Photodetectors; Pulse generators; Relaxation processes; Semiconductor device testing; Bias voltages; Bispin; Light-to-current conversion; Transistors

Краткое описание: A model for the transfer of a material evaporated from electrodes in the discharge volume of a high-pressure gas discharge lamp is constructed. The flux density of the evaporated material depositing onto the walls of the discharge bulb and the end of an electrode base is calculated. The effect of the redeposition of the evaporated material on the emission properties of the base surface is experimentally studied. Copyright © 2003 by MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: Corrosion resistance of vanadium alloys in lithium upon neutron irradiation
Организации: Bochvar All-Russia Research Institute of Inorganic Materials, ul. Rogova 5, Moscow, 123060, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation; Baikov Institute of Metallurgy and Materials Science, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 49, Moscow, 117334, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Votinov, S.N., Bochvar All-Russia Research Institute of Inorganic Materials, ul. Rogova 5, Moscow, 123060, Russian Federation; Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation; Dedyurin, A.I., Baikov Institute of Metallurgy and Materials Science, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 49, Moscow, 117334, Russian Federation; Borovitskaya, I.V., Baikov Institute of Metallurgy and Materials Science, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 49, Moscow, 117334, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The corrosion resistance of aluminothermic vanadium and vanadium-based binary (with 10 and 35 at. % Ti) and ternary (V-Ti-Cr) alloys in lithium is studied upon neutron irradiation. Samples of the alloys sealed in lithium-filled ampules are irradiated with fast neutrons to a fluence of 1023 cm-2 at 350-830°C in a BOR-60 reactor. It is found that the concentration of interstitial impurities (oxygen and carbon) at the surface of vanadium alloys upon irradiation is higher than that in the alloys studied under static conditions. When the vanadium alloys operate under irradiation and attack by lithium used as a heat-transfer medium, a high contamination of the surface layers in the alloys with interstitial impurities and their effect on the physical and mechanical properties of the alloys it should be taken into account. Copyright © 2003 by MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: Unilineal descent organization and deep christianization: A cross-cultural comparison
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Korotayev, A.V., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The author studies variables that are usually regarded as the main causes of the decline of unilineal descent organization (statehood, class stratification and commercialization), along with a variable that has never been regarded as such a cause - deep Christianization. He finds that the traditionally accepted causes of the decline of unilineal descent organization are less significant (ρ = -.26 for the statehood; ρ = -.18 for class stratification, and ρ = -.23 for commercialization) than deep Christianization (φ = ρ = -.7). He also shows that the presence of unilineal descent groups correlates negatively with communal democracy and is especially strong for complex traditional societies (φ = -.49; γ=-.84). Because the communal democracy correlates positively with the supracommunal one, the Christianization of Europe might have contributed to the development of modern democracy by helping to destroy unilineal descent organization in this region.
Ключевые слова автора: Christianity; Political evolution; Social evolution; State; Unilineal descent

Название: Radiative decay of the massive neutrino in magnetized plasma
Название источника: Journal of Physics G: Nuclear and Particle Physics
Организации: Department of Theoretical Physics, Moscow Inst. for Phys./Technology, Dolgoprudny 141700, Russian Federation; Department of Physics, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Ternov, A.I., Department of Theoretical Physics, Moscow Inst. for Phys./Technology, Dolgoprudny 141700, Russian Federation; Éminov, P.A., Department of Physics, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Within the framework of one-loop approximation of the standard model, the probability of radiative decay of the massive Dirac neutrino νi → νj + γ in a dense medium was calculated in an intensive, external, constant magnetic field. It was found that in the case of a degenerate electron gas (important for astrophysical applications), the decay rate essentially increases due to the influence of an ultrastrong magnetic field.
Сокращенное название источника: J. Phys. G Nucl. Part. Phys.

Название: Status of women, female contribution to subsistence, and monopolization of information: Further cross-cultural comparisons
Организации: Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Anthropology, Stt. Univ. of New York-New Paltz, New Paltz, NY, United States
Авторы организаций: Korotayev, A.V., Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Cardinale, J., Department of Anthropology, Stt. Univ. of New York-New Paltz, New Paltz, NY, United States
Краткое описание: Although the statement that female status correlates negatively with cultural complexity is generally true, the real relation between these two groups of variables is much more complicated. Some important female status variables are characterized by significant positive correlation with cultural complexity within its certain ranges. There are some grounds for attributing this correlation to the rise of female status brought about by the transition to agriculture. On the other hand, contrary to the currently prevalent view, female contribution should be regarded as a significant positive predictor of some important dimensions of female status. The absence of significant correlation between cultural complexity and monopolization of information among societies of low midrange complexity (8-15 on Murdoch's scale) can be connected to the rise of female status with the transition to agriculture.
Ключевые слова автора: Cultural evolution; Female status; Gender

Название: "Early state" in cross-cultural perspective: A statistical reanalysis of Henri J. M. Claessen's database
Организации: Center of Social Anthropology, Russian Stt. Univ. for Humanities, Moscow, Russian Federation; Sociology Faculty, Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, D.M., Center of Social Anthropology, Russian Stt. Univ. for Humanities, Moscow, Russian Federation; Korotayev, A.V., Sociology Faculty, Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The authors reanalyze Claessen's data set on the "Early States." Though Claessen's Early State typology is largely justified, we suggest some corrections and amendments to his typologization and his model of Early State evolution. We show that the development of personal ownership of land correlates rather weakly with the political development of the Early State, and that political development might be accompanied by the strengthening of communal ownership. We also examine the correlation between Early State political development and ruler sacralization. Though this correlation is insignificant for the whole sample, its insignificance is accounted for by two distinct evolutionary patterns. The pattern observed in the "axial age" zone is characterized by a strong negative correlation between political development and ruler sacralization, while the pattern observed throughout the rest of the world is characterized by a strong positive correlation between the two variables. The authors discuss possible causes of this difference.
Ключевые слова автора: Early State; Land ownership; Ruler sacralization

Авторы: Sadovnichii D.N., Tyutnev A.P., Khatipov S.A., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Space charge buildup upon electron-beam irradiation of an epoxy compound in vacuum
Организации: Soyuz Fed. Ctr. of Convertible Tech., Sovetskaya ul. 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast 140056, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Karpov Inst. of Physical Chemistry, Russian Federal Research Center, ul. Vorontsovo pole 10, Moscow 103064, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sadovnichii, D.N., Soyuz Fed. Ctr. of Convertible Tech., Sovetskaya ul. 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast 140056, Russian Federation; Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Khatipov, S.A., Karpov Inst. of Physical Chemistry, Russian Federal Research Center, ul. Vorontsovo pole 10, Moscow 103064, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The effect of electron energy on the space charge buildup in an epoxy compound upon its irradiation in vacuum was studied using the split Faraday cup technique. The depth distribution of the dose rate and the charge deposition rate of 40-2000-keV electrons were obtained using Monte Carlo simulation. It was shown that the asymptotic decay of back-electrode current is determined by the dose rate power index in the power-law dose rate dependence of radiation-induced conductivity, which is typical of many polymeric materials. The radiation charging process is described by a universal law for 40-300-keV electrons, whereas no universal relationship is observed at higher energies.
Ключевые слова указателя: epoxide; article; conductance; electrode; electron; electron beam; irradiation; Monte Carlo method; radiation; technique; vacuum

Название: Uniform Stimulation Systems
Организации: Russian School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karavaev, A.P., Russian School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Even if the managers are well aware of the abilities of their subordinates, they often have to use uniform systems of labor remuneration, that is, to fix the payments to the employees so that they are defined uniformly exceptionally by the results of their work, rather than directly by their abilities. The present work studied the properties of uniform systems of labor remuneration in the active systems consisting of a principal and several subordinated agents. Realization of identical actions by various agents was considered in detail. Relationship between the stimulation function and the function of action, which is understood as the dependence of the vector of actions chosen by the agent on its abilities, was studied.
Ключевые слова указателя: Control systems; Economic and social effects; Functions; Health; Managers; Mathematical models; Personnel; Personnel training; Problem solving; Theorem proving; Active systems (AS); Labor remuneration; Stimulation function; Professional aspects

Название: Pseudoperiodic waveguides as slow-wave systems for broadband powerful TWTs
Название источника: 4th IEEE International Vacuum Electronics Conference, IVEC 2003 - Proceedings
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12, Bol. Trekhsvyatitelsky per., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12, Bol. Trekhsvyatitelsky per., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Papers [1,2] suggest a new class of electrodynamics systems ("pseudoperiodic" waveguides) for which it is possible to control the spectrum of spatial harmonics and modes including their efficient selection in the process of amplifying and generating powerful microwave oscillation in devices with oversize systems with a large number of modes. The essence of the principle of selection consists in employing electrodynamics systems with nonperiodic spacing of its elements and a specified relation between the step Lq and the fieldphase of the elements, which makes it possible to select one spatial harmonic or mode and suppress the others. The elements in question may be slots in a comb-type structure (Fig.l,?), diaphragms in a round waveguide, cavities and electromfield interaction gaps in CCS etc. A planar logarithmic spiral or synchronous spirals considered in [3] represent examples of pseudoperiodic systems. In logarithmic spirals all the higher-number spatial harmonics are suppressed whereas in synchronous spirals Fig. lb there exists only one higher-number spatial harmonic. Planar spiral systems are used as ultrawide-band antennas [4] and they can be employed as slowwave structures for TWT [ 5 ]. Generally, one can apply the considered principle of selection to any type SWS. © 2003 IEEE.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electrodynamics; Harmonic analysis; Microwave oscillators; Vacuum technology; Waveguides; Logarithmic spiral; Microwave oscillation; Planar spirals; Slow-wave systems; Spatial harmonic; Type structures; Ultra wide-band antennas; Traveling wave tubes
Спонсоры: IEEE Electron Devices Society
Издатель: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Inc.

Сокращенное название источника: IEEE Int. Vac. Electron. Conf., IVEC - Proc.

Название: About one of the properties of the ansatz of Hirota's method for quasi-linear equations
Название источника: Nuovo Cimento della Societa Italiana di Fisica B
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Volosov, K.A., Moscow Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: By using the new invariant properties of the ansatz of Hirota's method, which were recently discovered (see the main text), we prove that the classes of linear fractional solutions to some nonlinear equations are closed. This allows us to construct new solutions for a chosen class of dissipative equations. This algorithm is similar to the method of "dressing" the solutions of integrable equations. The equations thus obtained imply a "compatibility " condition and resemble a nonlinear Lax pair with variable coefficients. So we propose a method for constructing such pairs. To construct solutions of a more complicated form, we propose to use the "property of zero denominators and factorized brackets," which has been discovered experimentally. The expressions thus constructed are said to be "hidden quasi-invariant." They allow us to find true relations between the functions contained in the ansatz, to correct the ansatz, and to construct a solution. We present some examples of new solutions constructed following this approach. Such solutions can be used for majorizing in comparison theorems and for modeling phase processes and process in neurocomputers. A program for computing solutions by methods of computer algebra is written. These techniques supplement the classical methods for constructing solutions by using their group properties. In the paper we prove the new precise singular solutions of a model of shallow-water equations exist. It is given at the end of the paper. This solution is probably related to the problem of predicting the motion of typhoons. This problem is actual.
Сокращенное название источника: Nuovo Cimento Soc. Ital. Fis. B

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Kundina Y.F., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Charge carrier transport in disordered solids: Dispersive versus Gaussian
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol Treehsvyatitel. per, 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol Treehsvyatitel. per, 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Kundina, Y.F., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol Treehsvyatitel. per, 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol Treehsvyatitel. per, 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol Treehsvyatitel. per, 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We present a critical review of numerous time-of-flight and radiation-induced conductivity measurements in disordered solids as well as of the theoretical models used to explain them. Recent experiments employing both techniques simultaneously resulted in conflicting conclusions about charge carrier transport in molecularly doped polymers. Whereas the latter method gives a consistent representation of it as a highly non-equilibrium phenomenon of yet unspecified duration (dispersive process), the former is notorious for a number of ambiguous results, some of which are still present, and it is also known to generate the Gaussian disorder model predicting the prevalent steady-state mobility (Gaussian transport). A way to reconcile these seemingly contradictory data has been suggested. This consists of taking due account of surface effects arising from the presence of surface regions (layers) in the dielectric sample with somewhat inferior electronic properties compared with the bulk. Preliminary calculations lend credit to this idea. It is argued that the time-of-flight method should be supplemented by some bulk excitation technique, which allows us to minimize or even remove surface effects. The methodological basis of the former method should be revisited. On the weight of the available information, preference should be given to the dispersive rather than the Gaussian transport but a major problem still exists.
Ключевые слова автора: Charge carriers; Disordered solids; Gaussian or dispersive transport; Theory
Ключевые слова указателя: Calculations; Charge carriers; Dielectric materials; Electric conductivity; Electron mobility; Electron transport properties; Mathematical models; Molecular structure; Polymers; Charge carrier transport; Disordered solids; Gaussian disorder model; Gaussian transport; Time-of-flight method; Solids

Название: A note on the convergence of policy iteration in Markov decision processes with compact action spaces
Организации: Department of Operations Research, Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Golubin, A.Y., Department of Operations Research, Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The undiscounted, unichain, finite state Markov decision process with compact action space is studied. We provide a counterexample for a result in Hordijk and Puterman (1987) and give an alternate proof of the convergence of policy iteration under the condition that there exists a state that is recurrent under every stationary policy. The analysis essentially uses a two-term matrix representation for the relative value vectors generated by policy iteration procedure.
Ключевые слова автора: Average reward; Markov decision processes; Optimality equation; Policy iteration

Краткое описание: This paper describes the pseudoperiodic folded waveLuide, which can be used for powerful broadband TWTs. Schematically, such waveguide is shown in Fig.1. For this waveguide, a general principle of pseudoperiodic waveguide operation [ l ] is used. It is a coordinated variation of the step and other parameters of the waveguide element which provides selection of spatial harmonics and an increased bandwidth. © 2003 IEEE.

Название: Oil and gas in the capitals
Организации: EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sapir, J., EHESS-Paris, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The impacts of expected Middle Eastern war on the the Russian oil and gas market is discussed. Russian oil companies are being deeply involved in the oil-for-food program in Iraq which accounts for 35% of Iraqi oil exports. Russian decision makers also feel that Iraq may just be Stage One in the Bush process, Stage Two being Iran.
Ключевые слова указателя: Economic and social effects; Industrial economics; International trade; Natural gas; Oil companies; Crude petroleum

Название: On Fourier Series in Eigenfunctions of Elliptic Boundary Value Problems
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation; Amosov, B.A., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a general elliptic formally self-adjoint problem in a bounded domain ρ Rn with homogeneous boundary conditions under the assumption that the boundary and coefficients are infinitely smooth. The operator in L2(Ω) corresponding to this problem has an orthonormal basis fulg of eigenfunctions, which are infinitely smooth in However, the system fulg is not a basis in Sobolev spaces Ht(Ω) of high order. We note and discuss the following possibility: for an arbitrarily large t, for each function uϵ Ht one can explicitly construct a function u0ϵ Ht(Ω) such that the Fourier series of the difference u-u0 in the functions ul converges to this difference in Ht(Ω). Moreover, the function u(x) is viewed as a solution of the corresponding nonhomogeneous elliptic problem and is not assumed to be known a priori; only the right-hand sides of the elliptic equation and the boundary conditions for u are assumed to be given. These data are also sufficient for the computation of the Fourier coefficients of u-u0. The function u0 is obtained by applying some linear operator to these right-hand sides. © 2003, Heldermann Verlag. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Elliptic boundary value problems; Fourier expansions in eigenfunctions; Sobolev spaces; unconditional convergence

Название: Factors of sexual freedom among foragers in cross-cultural perspective
Организации: School of History, Political Science and Law, Russian State University, State University Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Oriental Institute, Center for Civilizational and Regional Studies, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Center for Civilizational and Regional Studies, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Korotayev, A.V., School of History, Political Science and Law, Russian State University, State University Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation, Oriental Institute, Center for Civilizational and Regional Studies, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Kazankov, A.A., Center for Civilizational and Regional Studies, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Among the negative predictors of sexual freedom, cultural complexity always has been mentioned as most important. However, regression analysis revealed the existence of a reverse trend within the interval between 11 and 22 points of Murdock's Cumulative Scale of Cultural Complexity. This suggests that it is senseless to try to find a general set of regularities regarding the correlation between cultural complexity and sexual freedom. One would expect to find different sets of regularities for simple, medium-complexity, complex, and supercomplex cultures. In this article we begin with a summary analysis of research conducted on simple societies, suggesting a model of relationships between cultural complexity and female premarital sexual freedom among foragers. We suggest that the underlying variable in this model is foraging intensification.
Ключевые слова автора: Cultural evolution; Female status; Gender; Hunter-gatherers; Sex

Название: Internet tools for supporting of lay stakeholders in the framework of the democratic paradigm of environmental decision making
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Russian Academy of Sciences, Dorodnicyn Computing Center, Vavilova str., 40, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lotov, A.V., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation, Russian Academy of Sciences, Dorodnicyn Computing Center, Vavilova str., 40, Moscow, 119991, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper describes the concept of Internet tools that may help implementing a democratic paradigm of environmental decision making, which is based on the desire to involve lay stakeholders into the process of decision making. It is clear that lay stakeholders usually have minimal knowledge on the ways how to solve environmental problems. The gap among knowledge and actions of lay stakeholders may be extremely dangerous. In this paper we propose visualization-based Internet tools that can help lay stakeholders to study the environmental problems and base their actions on a better understanding of the issues. The tools are based on multi-criteria exploration of the whole variety of possible environmental decision alternatives that helps to understand the feasibility frontiers and individual selecting several preferred feasible decision alternatives. We argue that such Internet tools can be mastered by computer-literate lay stakeholders and used by them in the process of preparation to political actions related to the final choice. © 2004 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
Ключевые слова автора: E-democracy; Internet; Lay stakeholders; Multiple criteria decision analysis; Visualization

Название: Nonlinear commutation relations: Representations by point-supported operators
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Novikova, E.M., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We present a class of non-Lie commutation relations admitting representations by point-supported operators (i.e., by operators whose integral kernels are generalized point-supported functions). For such relations we construct all operator-irreducible representations (up to equivalence). Each representation is realized by point-supported operators in the Hilbert space of antiholomorphic functions. We show that the reproducing kernels of these spaces can be represented via hypergeometric series and the theta function, as well as via their modifications. We construct coherent states that intertwine abstract representations with irreducible representations.
Ключевые слова автора: Coherent state; Hypergeometric series; Irreducible representation; Nonlinear commutation relations; Point-supported operator; Riemann theta function

Название: Diffeomorphisms of the circle and the Beurling-Helson theorem
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lebedev, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider the algebra A(T) of absolutely convergent Fourier series on the circle T. According to the Beurling-Helson theorem, the condition ∥e inψ∥ A = O(1), n ∈ ℤ, implies that ψ is trivial: ψ(t) = mt + α. We construct a nontrivial diffeomorphism ψ of T onto itself such that ∥e inψ∥ A = O(γ(|n|) log |n|), where γ(n) is an arbitrary given sequence with γ(n) → +∞. By analogy with a conjecture due to Kahane, it is natural to suppose that this rate of growth is the slowest possible.

Название: Anti-Vandermonde systems and plane trees
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kochetkov, Yu.Yu., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Some special systems of polynomial equations (anti-Vandermonde systems) and the definition fields of their solutions are studied. In the case of four variables it is proved that a definition field is an extension of a real quadratic field of degree 12.
Ключевые слова автора: Algebraic fields; Galois theory; Polynomial algebra

Название: A property of the ansatz of Hirota's method for quasilinear parabolic equations
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Volosov, K.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: By using the recently discovered new invariant properties of the ansatz of R. Hirota's method, we prove that the classes of linear fractional solutions to some nonlinear equations are closed. This allows us to construct new solutions for a chosen class of dissipative equations. This algorithm is similar to the method of "dressing" the solutions of integrable equations. The equations thus obtained imply a "compatibility " condition and are known as a nonlinear Lax pair thus variable coefficients. So we propose a method for constructing such pairs. To construct solutions of a more complicated form, we propose to use the "property of zero denomiators and factorized brackets," which has been discovered experimentally. The expressions thus constructed are said to be "quasi-invariant." They allow us to find true relations between the functions contained in the ansatz, to correct the ansatz, and to construct a solution. We present some examples of new solutions constructed following this approach. Such solutions can be used for majorizing in comparison theorems and for modeling phase processes and process in neurocomputers. A program for computing solutions by methods of computer algebra in written. These techniques supplement the classical methods for constructing solutions by using their group properties.
Ключевые слова автора: "dressing" method; Ansatz; Dissipative equation; Hirota's method; Invariant solution; Quasilinear parabolic equation

Авторы: Danilov V., Omel'Yanov G., Rozenknop D.
Название: Calculations of the hurricane eye motion based on singularity propagation theory
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Danilov, V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Omel'Yanov, G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Rozenknop, D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We discuss the possibility of using calculating singularities to forecast the dynamics of hurricanes. Our basic model is the shallow-water system. By treating the hurricane eye as a vortex type singularity and truncating the corresponding sequence of Hugoniot type conditions, we carry out many numerical experiments. The comparison of our results with the tracks of three actual hurricanes shows that our approach is rather fruitful. © 2002 Southwest Texas State University.

Название: Theory of K-calculuses as a powerful and flexible mathematical framework for building ontologies and designing natural language processing systems
Название источника: Lecture Notes in Computer Science (including subseries Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics)
Организации: Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Information Technologies, K.E. Tsiolkovsky Russian State Technological University, MATI, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fomichov, V.A., Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Technical University, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation, Department of Information Technologies, K.E. Tsiolkovsky Russian State Technological University, MATI, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The necessity of developing more powerful and convenient formal means (in comparison with the widely used ones) for describing structured meanings of natural language (NL) texts and building ontologies is grounded. The basic principles of an original mathematical approach to this problem are outlined; this approach is given by the the theory of K-calculuses and K-languages (the KCL-theory) elaborated by the author. The considered examples of building semantic representations of the NL-texts, of constructing definitions of concepts, and of finding an answer to a question of the end user pertain to biology, medicine, ecology, and business. The advantages of the KCL-theory in comparison with Discourse Representation Theory, Theory of Conceptual Graphs, and Episodic Logic are stated. It is reported about a number of successful applications of the KCL-theory to the design of NL-processing systems. The metaphor "a kitchen combine" is used for underlining that the KCL-theory provides a broad spectrum of new opportunities for the design of NL-processing systems and building ontologies. © Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg 2002.

Краткое описание: The bandwidth characteristics of rectangular microstrip antenna elements were investigated with the use of the model of an equivalent transmission line resonator and the theory of synthesis of electrical filters on the basis of low-pass prototypes. The compact expressions allowing to calculate relative band-width of microstrip antennas with multi-sectional filter-type matching circuits mounted at their inputs were obtained. The expression for account of theoretically limiting band-width of microstrip antenna elements is presented. The example of synthesis of a matching circuit realized on a basis of the three-section band-pass filter is given. © 2002 Begell House, Inc.

Краткое описание: Multilayer Langmuir-Blodgett (LB) films with X-ray contrast in between the neighbouring bilayers is proposed as an object for the investigation of the interlayer diffusion. Yttrium and lead stearates are chosen to form such kind of films. A double-section LB trough was used for deposition. X-ray reflectivity measurements are used to examine the formatted LB films. X-ray reflectivity data have verified that highly ordered LB films with alternating of yttrium stearate and lead stearate bilayers are obtained. Sharp Bragg peaks occur up to 11th order. Size of the corresponding one-dimensional elementary unit cell is about 100 Å (yttrium stearate bilayer+lead stearate bilayer). A system of well-defined Kiessig fringes between the Bragg peaks is also observed. From the positions of the Kiessig fringes, the thickness of the films (from 200 to 1000 Å) was calculated. These values absolutely correspond to the number of the deposition cycles multiplied on the monolayer thickness. © 2002 2002 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

Название: Non-Archimedean Calculus in the Mathematical Modeling of Digital ICs
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shcheglov, E.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A non-Archimedean approach to the mathematical modeling of physical processes is reviewed. The method of combined non-Archimedean Calculuses is discussed. It enables one to construct linear models of certain physical processes. The network modeling of physical phenomena is described. Universal relations between the parameters and variables of a generalized network are given. The interaction between networks representing different classes of physical phenomena is addressed. Also covered are non-Archimedean number systems and non-Archimedean spectral analysis.

Название: Modification of metal-oxide-semiconductor devices by electron injection in high fields
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Trekhsviatitelskiy per., Moscow 103460, Russian Federation; Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Kaluga Branch, 4, Bazhenov St., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: The modification of metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) devices having Si/SiO2/phosphosilicate glass/Al structure by Fowler-Nordheim (FN) tunnelling electron injection taking place in high fields is studied. The constant current FN electron injection from silicon substrate and metal electrode was used to modify the charge state of the MOS structure. The parameters characterizing the change of charge state in the MOS structures during the modification have been monitored by means of time dependence of voltage shift applied to a sample during the injection. It was found that the changes in the range of threshold voltage in MOS devices, which resulted from the electron injection, could reach values up to 6 V, while the range is extended with the growth of the concentration of phosphorus in the PSG layer. However, the value of the injected charge must not exceed the level of 0.1 mC/cm2 during the adjustment of the threshold voltage, so as to provide acceptable surface state density. © 2002 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

Название: Instability Conditions of the Stationary Nonconducting State for the Bispin
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lysenko, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A theoretical study of the bispin is presented. The bispin is a microelectronic device that can convert light into a relaxation self-sustaining oscillation of electric current, thus making both a photodetector and a pulse generator. In doing so, the bispin switches between a conducting and a nonconducting state. This study ascertains the conditions for the stationary nonconducting state of the device to become unstable in two types of transition to the oscillatory state.

Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Res. Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo 8, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation

Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Zinchenko, V.F., Res. Institute of Instrumentation, promzona Turaevo 8, Lytkarino, Moscow oblast, 140080, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Steady-state currents flowing through planar polymer layers under irradiation with 15-50 keV electrons were studied experimentally and theoretically. The ultimate range of electrons was somewhat below the layer thickness. The Monte Carlo method was used to determine the basic transport characteristics of fast electrons in polymers (maximum range, depth distribution of absorbed dose and forward current). It was shown that significant steady-state currents (1 to 10% of the electron beam current) were observed only if the thickness of blocking (unirradiated) layer did not exceed 5 μm. The magnitude of these currents was almost unaffected by the polymer type (polymers with minimum radiation-induced conductivity and polymers with electron or hole conductivity were examined). It was found that conventional theories of conductivity of dielectrics failed to explain the observed experimental data. Additional arguments in favor of the hypothesis of "streamer" mechanism of injection currents through an unirradiated polymer layer were obtained. It is emphasized that the radiation-induced heating of polymer samples can play an important role in the phenomenon under study, acting as an undesirable technical factor, that strongly distorts obtainable experimental data.
Ключевые слова указателя: polymer; absorption; article; conductance; dielectric constant; electron transport; heating; hypothesis; radiation; steady state; theoretical study

Краткое описание: The corrosion resistance in a steam-water medium, strength, and ductility properties of a number of ternary deformable vanadium-based alloys (10-20 at. % Ti and 6-10 at. % Cr) and cast vanadium alloys with wide ranges of titanium and chromium contents (5-30 at. %) were studied. Optimum compositions of the alloys having the best set of properties were determined. These alloys were recommended for application in fusion reactors with water as a heat-transfer liquid at temperatures as high as 300°C. Copyright © 2002 by MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Ecole Centrale de Lille, France
Авторы организаций: Kolmanovskii, V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Matasov, A., M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Space Research Institute (IKI), Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Borne, P., Ecole Centrale de Lille, France
Краткое описание: The optimal mean-square filtering problem for linear hereditary dynamic systems with nonzero initial conditions is considered. In contrast to the resolved classical problem with zero initial conditions, the filtering problem under consideration reduces to a nonclassical linear-quadratic optimal problem. The solution of the latter problem is unknown. We replace this non-classical problem by a simplified classical one, which has a known solution. The solution of this approximate problem is used instead of the solution for the exact original problem. By applying the duality theory we obtain an estimate for the nonoptimality level of the simplified solution. It is essential that this estimate can be computed without exactly solving the initial complex filtering problem.

Краткое описание: In 1998 we administered a survey to 740 Russian chief executive officers (CEOs), which enabled us to raise the question of the current human resource management (HRM) practices in Russian industrial companies. In October-December 2000 we administered another survey among 735 Russian CEOs. This time we observed a major drive towards some modern instruments of HRM policies. However, an additional survey, devoted to the source of innovations in HRM, revealed that most HRM innovations are implemented on a trial and error basis, without reference to international practices.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Kundina Yu.F., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: On the transport of excess charge carriers in polymers
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kundina, Yu.F., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The general aspects of the transport of excess charge carriers in polymers are considered. Published data on transient radiation-induced conductivity of polymers, including the model polymer poly(vinylcarbazole), are analyzed. It was shown that these data provide evidence of the nonequilibrium (dispersive) transport of charge carriers over the entire experimentally accessible range of observation time (from tens of nanoseconds to tens of minutes at room temperature). Using poly(vinylcarbazole) as an example, it was found that the dispersive transport of holes is also supported by time-of-flight measurements, provided, however, that special precautions are taken to exclude undesirable methodological effects. The generally accepted treatment of charge transport as a quasi-equilibrium phenomenon for which the plateau on the time-of-flight current transient is treated in terms of the Gaussian disorder model requires substantial revision. More detailed analysis over a broader time interval, especially for long times, and the involvement of data on radiation-induced conductivity in molecularly doped polymers in consideration evidently show the dispersive nature of charge carrier transport in such polymer systems as well. The formation of the plateau on the time-of-flight curve seems to be due to the effect of the near-surface polymer layer whose role in the radiation-induced conductivity is reduced to a minimum because of the bulk generation of charge carriers. The transport parameters are given for some polymers and the drift displacements of the majority carriers in them are calculated for several time intervals. Reasons for the unique photoelectric properties of poly(vinylcarbazole) are discussed.

Краткое описание: A simplified theory of the electrification of polymer films, which permits estimation of the internal electric fields of films irradiated by monoenergetic electrons simulating real streams of plasma electrons during magnetic substorms at a geosynchronous orbit, is suggested. To determine the depth behavior of the forward current and the dosage rate in the irradiated polymer, numerical calculations are made by the Monte Carlo technique. The appearance of electrostatic discharges in thin (5 μm) mylar films is shown to be very probable in the orbit's shadow sector under magnetic substorm conditions.

Название: Symplectic areas, quantization, and dynamics in electromagnetic fields
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Man. R3T 2N2, Canada
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation, Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Man. R3T 2N2, Canada; Osborn, T.A., Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Man. R3T 2N2, Canada
Краткое описание: A gauge invariant quantization in a closed integral form is developed over a linear phase space endowed with an inhomogeneous Faraday electromagnetic tensor. An analog of the Groenewold product formula (corresponding to Weyl ordering) is obtained via a membrane magnetic area, and extended to the product of N symbols. The problem of ordering in quantization is related to different configurations of membranes: A choice of configuration determines a phase factor that fixes the ordering and controls a symplectic groupoid structure on the secondary phase space. A gauge invariant solution of the quantum evolution problem for a charged particle in an electromagnetic field is represented in an exact continual form and in the semiclassical approximation via the area of dynamical membranes. © 2002 American Institute of Physics.

Краткое описание: We develop the general quantum stochastic approach for the description of quantum measurements continuous in time. The framework that we introduce encompasses the various particular models for continuous-time measurements considered previously in the physical and the mathematical literature.

Краткое описание: The expressions are submitted, allowing one to make transformation E-plane waveguide for the tasks containing 5 components of an electromagnetic field (for example Hx, Hy, Hz, Ey, Ez), to the scalar 2D task containing 3 unequal zero components of an electromagnetic field (Hx, Ey, Ez). At such transformation the magnitude appropriate to magnetic permeability becomes frequency dependent. It corresponds to dielectric permeability of plasma, if plasma frequency corresponds to cutoff frequency of a wave Hm0. This fact has allowed use for the analysis in time domain E plane waveguide facility earlier developed for effective programs in 2D electromagnetic analysis. The example of the analysis in time domain of the filter constructed on the basis of a rectangular waveguide with variations of the geometrical sizes in E plane is given. © 2002 IEEE.

Краткое описание: An algorithm for analysis and optimization of coupled cavity chains containing selective absorbers is described. The algorithm is based on the partial regions method and calculates dispersion, interaction impedance and attenuation constants in cavity and slot passbands and neighboring stopbands. Selective absorbers are considered as dielectric resonators excited by the cavity field. The optimization is performed by Monte-Carlo and modified Newton methods. The results of analysis and optimization are presented. © 2002 Saratov State Tech Univ.

Название: Optimization of the characteristics of computational processes in scalable resources
Организации: Moscow Stt. Pwr. Inst.(Tech. Univ.), Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Toporkov, V.V., Moscow Stt. Pwr. Inst.(Tech. Univ.), Moscow, Russian Federation; Toporkova, A.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this work, the scalableness of resources is taken to mean the possibility of the prior change in the obtained dynamic characteristics of computational processes for a certain basic set of processors and the communication medium in an effort to optimize the dynamics of software applications. A method is put forward for the generation of optimal strategies - a set of the versions of the fulfillment of programs on the basis of a vector criterion. The method is urgent for the effective use of resources of computational clusters and metacomputational media and also for dynamic control of processes in real time on the basis of the static scaling.
Ключевые слова указателя: Computer software; Dynamic programming; Program processors; Real time systems; Scalable computing systems; Computational methods

Название: Optimal and admissible programs of credit control
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tokarev, V.V., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The study of optimal credit policy of a developing enterprise was continued with the aim of establishing and analyzing the finite formulas for the final boundary problem of the maximum-principle procedure. Advisability of the pulse crediting as opposed to the continuous crediting and no-credit development, as well as the advantages of the optimal relay payment of debt as compared with the admissible uniform payment were estimated from the point of view of enterprise. The qualitative features stemming from the nonlinearity of the enterprise production function were discussed. Considerations on managing credits in an unstable economic environment were presented.
Ключевые слова указателя: Boundary conditions; Economics; Industry; Credit control; Optimal control systems

Название источника: International Journal of Mathematics and Mathematical Sciences
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 Trekhsvyatitel�sky Lane, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Tomsk Polytechnic University, 30 Lenin Ave, 634034 Tomsk, Russian Federation; Tomsk State University, 36 Lenin Ave, 634050 Tomsk, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 Trekhsvyatitel�sky Lane, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Trifonov, A.Y.U., Tomsk Polytechnic University, 30 Lenin Ave, 634034 Tomsk, Russian Federation; Shapovalov, A.V., Tomsk State University, 36 Lenin Ave, 634050 Tomsk, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The general construction of semiclassically concentrated solutions to the Hartree type equation, based on the complex WKB-Maslov method, is presented. The formal solutions of the Cauchy problem for this equation, asymptotic in small parameter □ (□→0), are constructed with a power accuracy of O (□ N/2), where N is any natural number. In constructing the semiclassically concentrated solutions, a set of Hamilton-Ehrenfest equations (equations for centered moments) is essentially used. The nonlinear superposition principle has been formulated for the class of semiclassically concentrated solutions of Hartree type equations. The results obtained are exemplified by a one-dimensional Hartree type equation with a Gaussian potential. © 2002 Hindawi Publishing Corporation. All rights reserved.

Краткое описание: The gain-phase distributions of an electromagnetic field and horn antenna radiation patterns for planar tasks, with the horn antenna in a combination with various close located objects, are submitted. The problem was solved in the time domain, then by means of Fourier transformation was translated into the frequency domain. The problem solution in time domain allows one to analyze objects with sizes of 500×500 wavelength with a digitization step of 1/20 wavelength (100 million units of a grid) on a personal computer with a 2 Gb operative memory. An example of the analysis of distortions of the radiation patterns by phased array obstacles and objects is given. © 2002 IEEE.

Название: Duality theory in filtering problem for discrete volterra equations

Lomonosov Moscow State University, Vorobiovy Gory, Moscow, Russian Federation; Space Research Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Profsouznaya, 84/32, Moscow, GSP-7, Russian Federation

Profsouznaya, 84/32, Moscow, GSP-7, Russian Federation; Matasov, A.I., Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Vorobiovy Gory, Moscow, Russian Federation, Space Research Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Profsouznaya, 84/32, Moscow, GSP-7, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The filtering problem for discrete Volterra equations is a nontrivial task due to an increasing dimension of the equivalent single-step process model. A difference equation of a moderate dimension is chosen as an approximate model for the original system. Then the reduced Kalman filter can be used as an approximate but efficient estimator. Using the duality theory of convex variational problems, a level of nonoptimality for the chosen filter is obtained. This level can be efficiently computed without exact solving the full filtering problem. Copyright © 2002 IFAC.
Ключевые слова автора: Discrete-time systems; Duality; Filtering problems

Название: Interrelation between the properties and kinetic processes in materials
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Festival'naya 17-138, Moscow 125195, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gubenko, A.Ya., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Festival'naya 17-138, Moscow 125195, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: On the basis of investigations of the growth rate and electrophysical properties in discrete ranges of temperature and concentration in which phase transition occur, an interrelation between the growth kinetics and properties of the newly formed solid phase was established. This interrelation was shown to be caused by the presence of a local equilibrium at the solid-liquid interface and by the character of interatomic interactions in the melt and in the solid phase. © 2001 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

Название: Coherent transforms and irreducible representations corresponding to complex structures on a cylinder and on a torus
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We study a class of algebras with non-Lie commutation relations whose symplectic leaves are surfaces of revolution: a cylinder or a torus. Over each of such surfaces we introduce a family of complex structures and Hubert spaces of antiholomorphic sections in which the irreducible Hermitian representations of the original algebra are realized. The reproducing kernels of these spaces are expressed in terms of the Riemann theta function and its modifications. They generate quantum Kähler structures on the surface and the corresponding quantum reproducing measures. We construct coherent transforms intertwining abstract representations of an algebra with irreducible representations, and these transforms are also expressed via the theta function. ©2001 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Coherent transform; Complex structure; Irreducible representation; Kähler manifold; Riemann theta function; Symplectic manifold

Название: The two-element system optimum maintenance tills the first fail
Организации: Department of Operation Research, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitelskij per., 3/12, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shnourkoff, P.V., Department of Operation Research, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitelskij per., 3/12, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper considers the problem of the optimum maintenance of the system with two different elements and one restoring device. A semi-Markov process with discrete and continuous set of states describes the stochastic system model. For given process equations of Markov renewal have formed and solved by dint of time distributive functions of faultless work till the first system's failed at different initial conditions in Laplace transformations terms. Evident offerings have received for corresponding mathematical expectation of random durations till the first system fail. Thus the optimum maintenance problem is reduced to searching the extreme value of given function of two real variables.
