Название: On polynomial automorphisms of affine spaces
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii, 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Popov, V.L., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii, 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In the first part of this paper we prove some general results on the linearizability of algebraic group actions on An. As an application, we get a method of construction and concrete examples of non-linearizable algebraic actions of infinite non-reductive insoluble algebraic groups on An with a fixed point. In the second part we use these general results to prove that every effective algebraic action of a connected reductive algebraic group G on the n-dimensional affine space An over an algebraically closed field k of characteristic zero is linearizable in each of the following cases: 1) n = 3; 2) n = 4 and G is not a one- or two-dimensional torus. In particular, this means that GL3(k) is the unique (up to conjugacy) maximal connected reductive subgroup of the automorphism group of the algebra of polynomials in three variables over k. © 2001 RAS(DoM) and LMS.

Краткое описание: This article considers the physical properties of cells. On the basis of these properties, an electrodynamic model was constructed in terms of equivalent networks. This model makes it possible to study how external influences act upon a cell. For example, it can be employed to analyze cell behavior at different doses of pharmaceuticals, alpha emission, beta radiation, gamma rays, and electromagnetic fields.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Nikitenko V.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Peculiarities of non-langevin recombination of charge carriers in condensed phase
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Physical Engineering (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Nikitenko, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Physical Engineering (Technical University), Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Evolution of isolated ion pairs in space and time is studied by analysing Smoluchowski's equation with time-dependent kinetic coefficients inherent in dispersive charge-carrier transport. The boundary condition on a recombination sphere of radius R is formulated in a general form that allows diverse recombination regimes, in which the rate constant for bimolecular recombination kr varies from zero to its Langevin value, to be simulated. Time dependences of the transition current in the case of stepwise generation of isolated pairs in a weak electric field at kr = 0 are calculated. At reasonably large values of radius R (≈3 - 4 nm) the geminate nature of charge carriers affects only little the transition current curve. © 2001 OPA (Overseas Publishers Association) N.V.

Название: Atomic force microscopy investigation of morphology of TiO2 films
Название источника: Surface Investigation X-Ray, Synchrotron and Neutron Techniques
Организации: A. V. Shubnikov Inst. of Cristal., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tolstikhina, A.L., A. V. Shubnikov Inst. of Cristal., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. of Electron./Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The study of the morphology of the surface of TiO2 films by atomic force microscopy (AFM) is presented. The films were deposited on silicon by gas-phase oxidative pyrolysis and high-frequency ionic-plasma sputtering. Two-dimensional functions of correlation roughness were calculated, and based on them the homogenity of the film surface relief and sizes of correlation zones were also evaluated.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Sadovnichii D.N., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Transfer of excess charge carriers in poly(vinylcarbazole) and polymers doped on a molecular level
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Soyuz Federal Center of Dual Technologies, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Sadovnichii, D.N., Soyuz Federal Center of Dual Technologies, Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The whole collection of phenomena associated with transfer of holes (main charge carriers) in poly(vinylcarbazole) and revealed by radiation-induced conduction studies and time-of-flight method is for the first time interpreted in a consistent way within the framework of a modified Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model at the heart of which are the concepts of a transfer band, energy scatter of structural traps as a result of variation of the size of their integral parts - microscopic voids of free fluctuation-induced volume, and a frequency factor modulated by rotational diffusion of hop centers. It is shown that the best fit of the model to experiment is achieved with a truncated exponential energy distribution of traps which implies that the effective mobility decays by a power law over a fairly long period of time (from 100 μs to ∼1 s at 300 K). In attempting to account for the time history of the effective mobility at very short times (≤1 μ) and its dependence on temperature under the nonequilibrium (dispersion) transport conditions, based on the disorder model, H.Bässler ran into severe problems of a fundamental nature. A comprehensive comparison of the available models for transfer of excess charge carriers in polymers doped on a molecular level is currently hampered by the dearth of authentic data on rotational diffusion of dopant molecules in vitrified matrices. The underlying principles of the time-of-flight method surveyed at length in this study call into question the possibility of detecting quasi-equilibrium transport in polymers doped on a molecular level at room and nearly room temperatures. There is good reason to believe that the results of measurements are "buried" to a considerable extent in methodical factors. © 2001 OPA(Overseas Publishers Association) N.V.

Название: Fractal Analysis of Anisotropic Surfaces
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Surface structure is characterized in terms of the fractal dimension and the topothesy. It is highlighted that the calculations of the topothesy reported in the literature yield totally unrealistic values of this quantity: they vary from 10-3 m (the earth's surface) to 10-7 nm (ground parts of mechanisms). In the context of scanned-probe microscopy (SPM), it is advisable to adopt another definition of the topothesy. Instead of the cutoff wavelength, which is proportional to the length of the specimen, the definition involves the radial wavelength, which can be evaluated by applying the Fourier transform to the SPM micrograph [1].

Краткое описание: A rational biomechanical design for tooth models with ceramic inserts is proposed. Stressed-state parameters are estimated and, based on the Schleicher - Nadai fracture criterion, the shape and size of inserts for reliable performance of tooth models are proposed. The data obtained are of interest for practical medicine and can be used in stomatology for dental prosthetics.

Название: Radiation-induced conductivity of poly(ethylene terephthalate): Theoretical model and its applications
Организации: Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Kundina, Y.F., Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Doronin, A.N., Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. of Electro./Math., Bolshoi Trechsvyatite. pereulol 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A theoretical model describing radiation-induced conductivity in polymers generally and in poly(ethylene terephthalate) (PET) in particular and based on the multiple trapping formalism in terms of hopping conduction has been presented. The physical meanings of the main parameters used in the model are also briefly discussed. An express method to determine these parameters for PET has also been given. Experimental data relating to pulse and continuous irradiation are used to assess charging effects in thin (<10 μm) Mylar films under simulated substorm conditions at geosynchronous orbit. It has been shown that punchthrough discharges are likely to occur only in penumbra conditions at low temperatures (<-50 °C). We also discuss a tentative approach to the development of high-performance polymers as far as their photo- and radiation-induced conductivity is concerned.
Ключевые слова указателя: Electric charge; Electric conductivity; Irradiation; Mathematical models; Radiation effects; Thin films; Geosynchronous orbits; Radiation induced conductivity; Polyethylene terephthalates
Название конференции: Joint Conference: 8th International Symposium on Materials in a Space Environment / 5th International Conference on Protection of Materials and Structures from the Space Environment

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Sadovnichii D.N., Kundina Yu.F., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Bimolecular Recombination of Excess Charge Carriers in Polymers
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Soyuz Fed. Ctr. Convertible Technol., Sovetskaya ul. 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Sadovnichii, D.N., Soyuz Fed. Ctr. Convertible Technol., Sovetskaya ul. 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; Kundina, Yu.F., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Bimolecular recombination of excess charge carriers in polymers was theoretically analyzed in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Vaisberg model. Used in computer-assisted numerical calculations were the model parameters determined previously for poly(N-vinylcarbazole), polystyrene, and poly(ethylene terephthalate) by measuring their radiation-induced conductivity. The obtained results make it possible to choose irradiation conditions that provide the small signal regime used in laboratory tests to determine model parameters for polymers of interest.

Название: Smooth equivalence and linearization of reversible systems
Организации: Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Samovol, V.S., Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For reversible systems of ordinary differential equations, we consider the problems of local smooth equivalence and local smooth linearization by transformations preserving the corresponding linear automorphisms of these systems. ©2001 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Local smooth equivalence; Rectification; Reversible system; Stable manifold; Sternberg-Chen theorem; Unstable manifold

Название: Normal vibrations in near-conservative self-excited and viscoelastic nonlinear systems
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Kharkov Polytechnical University, 21 Frunze Str., 61002 Kharkov, Ukraine; Department of Mathematical Modelling, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Mikhlin, Yu.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Kharkov Polytechnical University, 21 Frunze Str., 61002 Kharkov, Ukraine; Morgunov, B.I., Department of Mathematical Modelling, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A perturbation methodology and power series are utilized to the analysis of nonlinear normal vibration modes in broad classes of finite-dimensional self-excited nonlinear systems close to conservative systems taking into account similar nonlinear normal modes. The analytical construction is presented for some concrete systems. Namely, two linearly connected Van der Pol oscillators with nonlinear elastic characteristics and a simples two-degrees-of-freedom nonlinear model of plate vibrations in a gas flow are considered. Periodical quasinormal solutions of integro-differential equations corresponding to viscoelastic mechanical systems are constructed using a convergent iteration process. One assumes that conservative systems appropriate for the dominant elastic interactions admit similar nonlinear normal modes.
Ключевые слова автора: Iterations; Nonlinear normal modes (NNMs); Power series; Self-excited nonlinear systems; Viscoelastic nonlinear systems
Ключевые слова указателя: Integrodifferential equations; Mathematical models; Nonlinear systems; Oscillators (mechanical); Perturbation techniques; Plates (structural components); Viscoelasticity; Nonlinear normal modes; Self-excited nonlinear systems; Viscoelastic nonlinear systems; Vibrations (mechanical)

Название: Artifacts in Atomic Force Microscopy
Организации: Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gainutdinov, R.V., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation; Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The origin of artifacts in atomic force microscopy is discussed. They are classified by basic distinct features. Various solutions to this problem are suggested using the literature data. Metrological issues of the problem are touched upon.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Keshtov M.L., Kundina Yu.F., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Charge Carrier Transport in Phenylated Poly(naphthoylenebenzimidazole)
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Nesmeyanov Inst. Organoelement C., Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Vavilova 28, Moscow, 117813, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Keshtov, M.L., Nesmeyanov Inst. Organoelement C., Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Vavilova 28, Moscow, 117813, Russian Federation; Kundina, Yu.F., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Charge carrier transport in pure and phenylated poly(naphthoylenebenzimidazole) was compared by measurements of transient radiation-induced conductivity. Irradiation with single 100-μs pulses of 55-keV electrons was carried out in vacuum at room temperature. Contrary to expectations, the phenylation deteriorated the transport properties of a polymer: the delayed radiation-induced conductivity in phenylated poly(naphthoylenebenzimidazole) was almost 50 times lower than in the initial polymer, with the dispersion parameter decreasing from 0.4-0.25 to ≤0.05. As a result, the drift mobility of charge carriers falls by a few orders of magnitude. The mechanism of such behavior still remains unclear.

Название: Quantum surfaces, special functions, and the tunneling effect
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., 3/12 B.Trekhsvyat. per, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., 3/12 B.Trekhsvyat. per, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The notion of quantum embedding is considered for two classes of examples: quantum coadjoint orbits in Lie coalgebras and quantum symplectic leaves in spaces with non-Lie permutation relations. A method for constructing irreducible representations of associative algebras and the corresponding trace formulas over leaves with complex polarization are obtained. The noncommutative product on the leaves incorporates a closed 2-form and a measure which (in general) are different from the classical symplectic form and the Liouville measure. The quantum objects are related to some generalized special functions. The difference between classical and quantum geometrical structures could even occur to be exponentially small with respect to the deformation parameter. This is interpreted as a tunneling effect in the quantum geometry.
Ключевые слова автора: Geometric quantization; Hypergeometric functions; Irreducible representations; Kahlerian geometry; Poisson manifolds; Symplectic leaves; Theta-functions; Trace formulas

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Keshtov M.L., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Rusanov A.L., Sezonov Yu.I.
Название: Radiation-Induced Conductivity of Phenylated Polyphenylene
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Nesmeyanov Inst. Organoelement C., Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Vavilova 28, Moscow, 117813, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Keshtov, M.L., Nesmeyanov Inst. Organoelement C., Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Vavilova 28, Moscow, 117813, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Rusanov, A.L., Nesmeyanov Inst. Organoelement C., Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Vavilova 28, Moscow, 117813, Russian Federation; Sezonov, Yu.I., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The electric conductivity of phenylated polyphenylene induced by a 1-ms radiation pulse was studied. It was shown that the radiation-induced conductivity of this polymer is significantly lower compared to polystyrene or poly(p-xylylene) (a delayed component was almost 100 times smaller than that for PS). This seems to be due to a significant decrease in the concentration of hopping centers in the phenylated polymer, in which the hopping centers are groups of rings (possibly, a whole monomer unit) rather than individual benzene rings.

Название: Public management in Russia: Changes and inertia
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Jakobson, L., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Public sector reforms in Russia are typically half-hearted attempts at privatization. At the same time, there are attempts to bring about bureaucratization in a Weberian sense by increasing the role of formal rules. Given the Russian tradition of disloyalty to rules, however, all attempts to establish some sort of Rechtsstaat (law and order) are likely to fail in the short run. It is essential for the government to build social capital through more public consultation and improved accountability to the public. But the development of civil society in Russia will take time. In the short term, creating new kinds of management teams could be the next best approach to solving the resource and management problems in the public sector. © 2001 Elsevier Science Inc.

Название: Digital Simulation of Fractal Measurements
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The principles of digital signal processing are extended for the existing methods of fractal measurements in terms of Hausdorff-Bezikovich and Mandelbrojt dimensions. Fractal dimension as a rational number G1/G2 or the ratio of residues GR1/GR2 of two equations of measurement (instrument-response equations) is represented in the form of an equivalent digital model of the ratio F1/F2 of two sampling rates in some linear digital system. It is shown that such a system is described by generalized convolution, which, in turn, is represented as a cascade connection of interpolators and decimators with integer-valued conversion coefficients. For error-free processing of fractal dimension, it is necessary to convert a rational number to an integer and use Farey fractions in terms of unimodular and multimodular arithmetic. The Farey fractions can then be used as references points in metrological scales.

Авторы: Belov V.V., Dobrokhotov O.S., Dobrokhotov S.Yu.
Название: Isotropic tori, complex germ and Maslov index, normal forms and quasimodes of multidimensional spectral problems
Организации: Moscow State Institute OF Electronics AND Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow State Institute OF Electronics AND Mathematics, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, O.S., Moscow State Institute OF Electronics AND Mathematics, Russian Federation; Dobrokhotov, S.Yu., Moscow State Institute OF Electronics AND Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: More than twenty years ago V. P. Maslov posed the question under what conditions it is possible to assign to invariant isotropic lower-dimensional tori of Hamiltonian systems sequences of asymptotic eigenvalues and eigenfunctions (spectral series) of the corresponding quantum mechanical and wave operators. In the present paper this question is answered in terms of the quadratic approximation to the theory of normal forms. We also discuss the quantization conditions for isotropic tori and their relation to topological, geometric, and dynamical characteristics (Maslov indices, rotation (winding) numbers, eigenvalues of dynamical flows, etc.). ©2001 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Complex germ; Hamiltonian system; Invariant Lagrangian torus; Isotropic torus; Maslov canonical operator; Maslov index; Quantization condition

Название: Ethical dimension of Russian and American entrepreneurs
Название источника: Journal of Small Business and Enterprise Development
Организации: Weatherhead School of Management, Case Western Reserve University, United States; School of Management, State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Hirsrich, R.D., Weatherhead School of Management, Case Western Reserve University, United States; Gratchev, M.V., School of Management, State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Given today's hypercompetitive global economy, it is important to understand the ethical attitudes and standards of entrepreneurs in the US as well as in the other parts of the world. This study of ethical attitudes and standards is grounded in theory and previous research. One hundred and sixty-five entrepreneurs from the US and 159 entrepreneurs from Russia were surveyed using a measuring instrument containing binary response questions, scenarios and comprehensive demographic information. The study confirmed our expectations and indicated that entrepreneurs in the US and Russia are different with respect to their ethical codes and attitudes. © 2001, MCB UP Limited
Ключевые слова автора: Attitudes; Entrepreneurs; Ethics; Russia; USA

Авторы: Bondarenko G.G., Kristya V.I., Prassitski V.V.
Название: Calculation of ion sputtering yield of solid sample with cylindrical cavities and rectangular trenches on the surface
Название источника: Japanese Journal of Applied Physics, Part 1: Regular Papers and Short Notes and Review Papers
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Trekhsviatitelskiy per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow Technical State University, 4 Bazhenov st., Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation; Research Institute of Electronic Engineering Materials, 1 Gagarin st., Kaluga, 248650, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Trekhsviatitelskiy per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Kaluga Branch, Bauman Moscow Technical State University, 4 Bazhenov st., Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation; Prassitski, V.V., Research Institute of Electronic Engineering Materials, 1 Gagarin st., Kaluga, 248650, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Analytical expressions which determine the probability of sputtered atom escaping from a cylindrical cavity and a rectangular trench on the target surface bombarded by an ion beam are obtained for sputtered atoms cosine and over-cosine angle distributions. It is shown that the sputtering yield can be substantially reduced by creation a relief of cylindrical cavities on the sputtered surface.
Ключевые слова автора: Cylindrical cavity; Ion sputtering yield reduction; Rectangular trench; Target surface relief
Ключевые слова указателя: Ion beams; Ion bombardment; Probability; Targets; Ion sputtering yield reduction; Sputtering

Название: On the signs of pulses in the problems of optimal control with fixed ends of the trajectories
Организации: State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tokarev, V.V., State University - Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For the problems of optimal control with fixed boundary values of the phase coordinates, a scheme for establishing the signs of pulses in the procedure of the Pontryagin maximum principle was proposed. It lies in passing from the original optimization problem to an equivalent problem where the boundary conditions like equalities are replaced by inequalities that do not improve the performance index and putting down the transversality conditions. An example from the mechanics of space flight illustrated operability of this scheme. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: On asymptotic equivalence of the solutions of some Volterra difference equations
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kolmanovskii, V.B., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Conditions for boundedness, stability in the first approximation, and asymptotic equivalence of the solutions of discrete-time Volterra equations were presented. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: Unsteady self-similar convection from a point source of heat and passive tracer in a neutral atmosphere
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Elec. Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Vulfson, A.N., Moscow State Inst. Elec. Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An integral model of an unsteady vertical convective plume is proposed which includes a universal equation of the rise of the upper boundary of a convective front as a function of the strength of a point heat source. A class of self-similar solutions is considered for heat and tracer sources produced by burning whose strength varies instantaneously and also by power and exponential laws. Analytical and numerical solutions of self-similar equations are obtained. The modeling results are compared with experimental profiles of vertical velocity and temperature on the plume centerline.
Ключевые слова указателя: atmospheric plume; convective system; heat source; hydrodynamics; tracer; vertical migration

Название: On limit periodicity of the solutions of some Volterra systems
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kolmanovskii, V.B., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For systems of Volterra equations, the periodicity conditions were established in direct terms of the coefficients of the equations under consideration and their resolvents. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Название: Quasi-Feller extensions of Markov chains and existence of dual chains
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shur, M.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The author presents a revised and detailed version of his theorem on the existence of Feller extensions of Markov chains; to this end the broader notion of quasi-Feller extension is used. The existence of Markov chains dual to the chains with Borel space of states is derived from this result. Chains irreducible in the Orey sense are studied in most detail. For example, it is proved that for such chains the quasi-Feller extension can be chosen recurrent or Liouville if the original chains possess these properties. ©2001 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Dual; Feller and quasi-Feller extensions; Invariant measures; Irreducible; Liouville chains; Markov chain; Recurrent

Название: Spectral Problems for the Dirac System with Spectral Parameter in Local Boundary Conditions
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a spectral boundary value problem in a 3-dimensional bounded domain for the Dirac system that describes the behavior of a relativistic particle in an electromagnetic field. The spectral parameter is contained in a local boundary condition. We prove that the eigenvalues of the problem have finite multiplicities and two points of accumulation, zero and infinity and indicate the asymptotic behavior of the corresponding series of eigenvalues. We also show the existence of an orthonormal basis on the boundary consisting of two-dimensional parts of the four-dimensional eigenfunctions.

Название: Investigation of electric field at the cathode with fractal structure of the surface
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitelsky per. 3-12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitelsky per. 3-12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Rodionov, A.N., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, B. Trekhsvyatitelsky per. 3-12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A more detailed investigation of the electric field for some 2D fractal structures of the cathode surface was presented. To calculate the electric field a modified computer program based on “zooming” algorithm was used. Under consideration is the electric field gain, the field distribution on the tip surface of the diode with fractal cathode. © 2001 Published by Elsevier Science Ltd.
Ключевые слова указателя: Algorithms; Computer simulation; Electric field effects; Fractals; Gain control; Mathematical models; Carbon field emitter arrays; Field emission cathodes

Название: Design of a modified controller in the state space
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Zotov, M.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A controller of an object that is designed in the space of states generally consists of two blocks: an observer and a block implementing a control law. The combination of the two blocks to form a unified block (modified controller) permits reducing the computational and the algorithmic complexity of processing the measurable information. Optimality criteria with small parameters are set up, which offer the possibility of designing a modified controller, leaving out the procedure of design of an observer. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Авторы: Chumachenko E., Tsepin M., Tchekine A., Panina O.
Название: Calculation of structural characteristics evolution during superplastic forming of shells by SPLEN-O application computer program set
Название источника: Journal of Materials Science and Technology
Организации: Dep. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chumachenko, E., Dep. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tsepin, M., Dep. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tchekine, A., Dep. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Panina, O., Dep. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The application of commercial computer program set SPLEN-O based on finite elements method (FEM) for the simulation of superplastic forming (SPF) technology of shells is described. The changes in characteristics of ultrafine-grained (UFG) structure during deformation are taken into account in the function of viscosity and solving algorithm. Some examples are shown to illustrate the possibilities of FEM simulation for the prediction of grain-size numerical data at different SPF stages of shells.

Авторы: Ponomarev D., Ghose K., Saksonov E.
Название: Optimal polling for latency–throughput tradeoffs in queue–based network interfaces for clusters
Название источника: Lecture Notes in Computer Science (including subseries Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics)
Организации: Dept. of Computer Science, State University of New York, Binghamton, NY, United States; Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Ponomarev, D., Dept. of Computer Science, State University of New York, Binghamton, NY, United States; Ghose, K., Dept. of Computer Science, State University of New York, Binghamton, NY, United States; Saksonov, E., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a networking subsystem for message–passing clusters that uses two unidirectional queues for data transfers between the network interface card (NIC) and the lower protocol layers, with polling as the primary mechanism for reading data off these queues. We suggest that for accurate mathematical analysis of such an organization, the values of the system’s states probabilities have to be taken into consideration, in addition to the well–known mean–value estimates. A single server single queue polling system with server’s “vacations” is then articulated via an M/G/1 queueing model. We present a method for obtaining the values of system’s states probabilities in such a scheme that can be used to identify “sweet spots” of the polling period that result in a reasonable compromise between the message passing latency and the overall system’s throughput. © Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg 2001.
Ключевые слова указателя: Data transfer; Interfaces (computer); Message passing; Telecommunication networks; Mathematical analysis; Network interface cards; Polling system; Primary mechanism; Protocol layers; Queueing model; Single queues; Single server; Queueing theory
Спонсоры: Association of Computer Machinery;International Federation of Information Processing
Название конференции: 7th European Conference on Parallel Computing, Euro-Par 2001

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Kundina Y.F., Nikitenko V.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: On the involvement of geminate pairs in radiation-induced conductivity of polystyrene
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Engineering Physics, Kashirskoe sh. 31, Moscow, 115409, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kundina, Y.F., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Nikitenko, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Engineering Physics, Kashirskoe sh. 31, Moscow, 115409, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Basic parameters of the generalized Rose-Fowler-Weisberg theory were experimentally determined for polystyrene. The obtained data were used to comprehensively analyze the evolution of geminate pairs in this polymer. It was shown that the generation of the prompt component of radiation-induced conductivity occurs by the trapping mechanism with two charge carrier states involved, the quasi-free and trapped. This generation under equilibrium transport conditions (diffusivity and mobility of carriers are constant) reportedly ensured by the geminate recombination itself was not observed in a real experiment. With allowance for dispersive transport of holes (the major carriers), the lifetime of geminate pairs were found to be as long as a few hundred of milliseconds at 300 K. The published data on the formation and decay kinetics in doped polystyrene upon its pulse radiolysis or photolysis were thoroughly analyzed. It was shown that, at ultrashort times before localization of generated carriers, the contribution of electrons to the observed conductivity prevails, although the basic contribution is made by holes in later times. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".
Ключевые слова указателя: article; conductance; diffusion; dispersion; electron; photolysis; radiation; radiochemistry; radiolysis; transport kinetics

Название: Modification of the Maxwell's equations for the electromagnetic analysis in the time domain mode

For the axisymmetric devices the three-dimensional (3D) LC-grid transforms into the 2D LC-grid in radial cross section of devices with the subsequent transition to a flat R-grid. Название: Unimproving extension and the structure of extremals in control of the credit
Организации: State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tokarev, V.V., State University, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A diagram of the replacement of thee initial problem of optimal control with boundary conditions by an equivalent problem with boundary inequalities, which is put forward earlier for the prior definition of signs of pulses from the maximum principle, is used for optimizing a value of the credit and the program of its payment by a developing enterprise to the bank-creditor. For the problem extended by this method, a qualitative analysis of extremals in the procedure of the maximum principle is carried out. The number and the sequence of optimal modes are established for the distribution of the profit of the enterprise, which involves its own development and the payment of the debt to the bank with different relations between the profitability of the enterprise, the bank percent for the credit, and the contract date of the debt payment. © 2001 MAIK "Nauka/Interperiodica".

Организации: Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Kaluga Branch, Bazhenov st., 4, Kaluga, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bolshoy Trehsvyatitelskiy per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: The investigation of charge state change of MOS structure after the injection of charges of different values was carried out in this study using the controlled current stress technique. The following structure charge state relaxation was studied. The new technique of investigation of MOS structures charge state after the high-field stress was proposed. This stress is based on the controlled current stress, applied to the sample, allowing directly after injection to monitor the structure charge state without sample re-switching in wide range of electric fields of different polarities, from the injection field to the structure short circuit. The technique approbation during the investigation of MOS structures with thermal silicon dioxide after injection of charge of different values had been carried out. It was found out that relaxation time of positive charge, created by tunnel injection of electrons from silicon in thermal SiO2 film, had field dependence, decreasing with external field rise. © 2001 IEEE.

Краткое описание: This article deals with the corporeal and informational images of human beings. These images can be represented by key biological structures, such as biocells, nerve fibers, and acupuncture points. These structures are shown to transmit and process informational signals by means of electromagnetic (field) waves, An experimental setup is designed to study biological structures in the millimeter-wave range.

Краткое описание: Non-steady-state radiation-induced conductivity of poly(methyl methacrylate) was studied at room and elevated temperatures. It was shown that the conductivity is due to electric polarization of geminate pairs. The evolution of geminate pairs was rationalized in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Weisberg generalized model. The conclusions by the model were compared with the results of previous studies on the kinetics of formation and decay of geminate pairs upon pulse radiolysis or flash photolysis of doped poly(methyl methacrylate).

Название: Nonlinear Analysis of a Carcinotrode: A BWO with an Automodulation of the Cathode Emission
Название источника: Journal of Communications Technology and Electronics
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitelski per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitelski per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Backward-wave oscillators (BWOs) in which the cathode current is modulated by RF field transferred from the tube output to the cathode by means of a feedback (carcinotrodes) have been considered. Additional electrodes or waveguide structures providing a feedback between the slow-wave system and the cathode are used. The particular form of cathode feedback depends on the type of the slow-wave system used and the cathode. In some cases, the cathode can be placed into a slow-wave system. As a result of emission modulation, a RF current arises at the cathode, and, at a high output power, electron bunches are created that enter a strong RF field of the backward wave when they come into a slow-wave system. Therefore, when the phase of these bunches relative to the field is correctly chosen, they will give up their energy to the field with high efficiency, which exceeds the efficiency of the ordinary BWO. For designing the carcinotrode characteristics, an approximate nonlinear theory and numerical simulation have been developed. The possibility of increasing the efficiency considerably, for example, from 15% in a conventional BWO up to 35% and more, is shown. It has also been shown that it is possible to produce a circuit feedback providing a wide band for the electron to change the frequency in the carcinotrode.

Название: Slow wave structures application for oil monitoring
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 Bolshoj Trechsvjatitelskyi Lane, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yelizarov, A.A., Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 Bolshoj Trechsvjatitelskyi Lane, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper presents new measuring technology based on the application of Slow-Wave Structures (SWS). The use of SWS for RF-measurement transducers makes it possible quite efficiently to monitor and measure parameters of various industrial processes and materials. Difficulties arise when monitoring and measuring parameters of oil-liquids such as the conductivity or the continuity of flow. This is caused by the strong screening action of the monitored oil-liquid on electromagnetic field of the slowed wave in the helical sensitive elements (HSE). As the conductivity increases, the screening become even stronger, and this leads to a reduction in the sensitivity and measurement accuracy. The solution of such problems requires the creation and modeling of more complex designs of sensitive elements in which the screening action is weakened. Such an effect can be achieved by matching the field of a hybrid slowed wave to the medium being monitored, utilizing HSE based on layered magnetic and dielectric structures with a smooth variation of the electrodynamic parameters.
Ключевые слова автора: Helical sensitive element; Oil monitoring; Slow wave structure
Ключевые слова указателя: Dielectric properties; Electric conductivity measurement; Electrodynamics; Electromagnetic waves; Lubricating oils; Mathematical models; Monitoring; Sensitivity analysis; Helical sensitive element; Oil monitoring; Slow wave structures; Transducers

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Sadovnichii D.N., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: The effect of molecular motions on the transport of excess charge carriers in polymers
Название источника: Vysokomolekularnye Soedineniya. Ser.A Ser.B Ser.C - Kratkie Soobshcheniya
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3112, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Soyuz Federal Center of Double-Purpose Technologies, ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3112, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Sadovnichii, D.N., Soyuz Federal Center of Double-Purpose Technologies, ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3112, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3112, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Effect of the molecular mobility of polymers, occurring in the glassy or rubberlike state, on the transport of excess charge carriers in these systems is considered. The nonspherical character of the wavefunctions of molecular orbitals in the hopping centers, the presence of a free fluctuation volume, the short-range order in the arrangement of hopping centers, and the retarded rotation of molecular groups are factors justifying the application of a multiple trapping model. According to this model, the transport of excess charge carriers takes place in the charge-transfer band in the presence of traps distributed within a broad energy interval. The main parameters of charge transfer in a number of polymers are presented. An analysis of these data leads to a conclusion that the translational mobility of segments in polymers in the rubberlike state plays no significant role in the charge carrier transfer.

Название: Convection Regime of the Development of an Impulse-Buoyant Transient Jet Submerged in a Homogeneous Fluid
Организации: Institute of Oil and Gas Problems, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Gubkina 3, GSP-1, Moscow, 117735, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Vul'fson, A.N., Institute of Oil and Gas Problems, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Gubkina 3, GSP-1, Moscow, 117735, Russian Federation; Borodin, O.O., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii p. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An intergral model of a transient vertical impulse-buoyant jet is suggested. The model contains a universal equation describing the propagation of the upper boundary of the convection front depending on the strength of the point source of buoyancy and momentum. The convective regime of jet propagation is considered, which includes a class of self-similar solutions corresponding to the buoyancy sources, whose strength varies with time following power and exponential laws. The obtained numerical solutions are compared with available experimental data on the profiles of vertical velocity and buoyancy on the jet axis.

Название: Space Surface Parameters Determined from Fourier Transforms in Atomic Force Microscopy
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117133, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117133, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A tabular analytic method for calculating space surface parameters of different materials is suggested. It uses Fourier transforms obtained with an atomic force microscope. Examples of calculation are given for periodic space structures and surfaces with different degrees of anisotropy and periodicity. It is shown that space parameters, namely, texture direction and texture direction index and also radial wavelength and radial wavelength index, allow anisotropy characterization and periodicity determination at a nanometer scale.

Название: On behaviour of W-Cu composition as a candidate divertor material under irradiation by high intensive hydrogen plasma
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Tech. Univ., Bolshoy T., Moscow, Russian Federation; All-Russ. Electrotechnical Institute, Krasnokazarmennaya Ul. 12, 111250, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Eng. Physics Institute, Tech. Univ., Kashirskoe S., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Tech. Univ., Bolshoy T., Moscow, Russian Federation; Udris, Y.Y., All-Russ. Electrotechnical Institute, Krasnokazarmennaya Ul. 12, 111250, Moscow, Russian Federation; Yakushin, V.L., Moscow Stt. Eng. Physics Institute, Tech. Univ., Kashirskoe S., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The behaviour and erosion of tungsten, copper and W-Cu composition under irradiation by high intensive hydrogen plasma have been investigated. The erosion coefficients of these materials have been determined. The importance of copper redeposition in the mechanism of sputtering and erosion of W-Cu composition has been emphasized. It has been supposed that the process of tungsten recrystallization and cracking under pulse irradiation by thermal hydrogen plasma was radiation-induced.
Ключевые слова указателя: Composition effects; Crack propagation; Hydrogen; Irradiation; Plasmas; Recrystallization (metallurgy); Sputter deposition; Hydrogen plasmas; Pulse irradiations; Thermal hydrogen plasmas; Tungsten alloys

Название: Russia: Collapse and recovery
Организации: Centre for International Macroeconomics, Economics Department, University of Oxford, Moscow, United Kingdom; Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Henry, B., Centre for International Macroeconomics, Economics Department, University of Oxford, Moscow, United Kingdom, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Gavrilenkov, E., Centre for International Macroeconomics, Economics Department, University of Oxford, Moscow, United Kingdom, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The financial collapse in Russia in the summer of 1998 was a profound shock to the efforts to reform the Russian economy. It was also thought that it would seriously worsen the short- and medium-term outlook for growth and inflation. In this article, Brian Henry and Evgeny Gavrilenkov argue that the most recent data show that the more pessimistic of these views were probably misplaced; modest but significant growth has been evident since the collapse without substantial increases in inflation. The real improvements, in so far as they are simply the results of devaluation and the beneficial effects of the increase in the world oil price, could prove to be temporary, although there are more hopeful indicators with the recent increases in investment. But to ensure sustainable recovery, fundamental improvements in the structure of the economy, especially in the areas of industrial and financial restructuring, are needed. Meanwhile, they argue that it would be very beneficial for medium-term prospects if progress is made on the twin problems of external debt reduction and tax reform.
Ключевые слова указателя: capital market; financial crisis; inflation; market conditions; Russian Federation

Название: Normal model for distribution-free multivariate analysis
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsviatitelskii 3 / 12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Serdobolskii, V.I., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsviatitelskii 3 / 12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It is shown that standard quality functions of n-dimensional regularized linear multivariate procedures can be accurately estimated under the assumption that of populations normality if n is so large that it is comparable in magnitude with sample size. The correction terms are estimated from above and their upper estimates are obtained with accuracy up to absolute constants. © 2000 Elsevier Science B.V.
Ключевые слова автора: Large dimension; Multivariate analysis; Normal model

Название: Stable Quasimodes of the Schrödinger Operator with Homogeneous Potential
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Maksimov, V.A., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per., Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For a Schrödinger operator with one-parameter family of homogeneous potentials Vεe(x), stable quasimodes with respect to ε are constructed by means of the complex WKB method (the Maslov complex germ theory). These quasimodes are related to stable straightline librations A of the corresponding Hamiltonian system which can be nonintegrable in the classical sense. It is shown that, for these quasimodes, the strong stability zones coincide with those of the system in normal variations over Λ. For this reason, the Krein-Gelfand-Lidskii index, together with the Maslov index, determines the semiclassical spectrum of the quantum problem. This result is illustrated by the model of quartic potential, which is well known in physics.

Название: On the separation of spectra in the analysis of Berezin Kernels
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Neretin, Yu.A., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The problem of restricting a highest weight representation of the group U(p, q) to the subgroup O(p, q) is considered. This restriction has an intricate spectrum that contains representations of different types. We construct a decomposition of this representation into reducible representations each of which has a single-type spectrum. Some integrals over classical groups are also calculated; these integrals generalize those of Hua. ©2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Название: Optimal control problems in the theory of smart structures
Организации: Department of Operations Research, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Department of Mechanical Engineering, Dalhousie University, PO Box 1000, Halifax, NS B3J 2X4, Canada
Авторы организаций: Golubin, A.Y., Department of Operations Research, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., B. Trechsvjatitelsky per., 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Kalamkarov, A.L., Department of Mechanical Engineering, Dalhousie University, PO Box 1000, Halifax, NS B3J 2X4, Canada
Краткое описание: The methods of optimal control are applied to the problems of the theory of smart structures. Two optimization problems in the theory of smart structures are formulated and solved. These problems are concerned with the damping of mechanical oscillations by controlling the rigidity of the structure and applied force. The optimal controls are obtained in the form of optimal syntheses. In the first problem, the optimization criterion is to minimize the time required to transfer the system to a required state. The recurrent formula for the segments constituting the switching curve is derived. The second optimization problem is concerned with reduction of energy of oscillations by controlling the coefficient of rigidity of the structure. The objective of optimal control is to transfer the system to a given lower energy level in a minimal time. An explicit expression for all the segments of the switching curve is obtained.
Ключевые слова указателя: Control system analysis; Control system synthesis; Damping; Optimal control systems; Oscillations; Problem solving; Rigidity; Structural analysis; Switching curve theory; Intelligent structures

Название: Ontological mathematical framework for electronic commerce and semantically-structured web
Организации: Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Technical University, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Dept. of Information Technologies, K.E.Tsiolkovsky Russ. State T., MATI, Orshanskaya 3, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fomichov, V.A., Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Technical University, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation, Dept. of Information Technologies, K.E.Tsiolkovsky Russ. State T., MATI, Orshanskaya 3, 121552 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Formalizing conversation of intelligent agents (IAs) which realize Electronic Commerce (EC) includes such aspects as representing knowledge, goals, intentions, and actions of IAs, representing contents of messages (including arbitrary protocols of negotiations) and communicative acts. A common mathematical framework is suggested for all these purposes. This framework is the theory of restricted K-calculuses and K-languages (RKCL-theory), published by the author in Informatica, 1996, No. 1, 1998, No. 4. The suggested mathematical framework possesses all expressive possibilities of the Semantic Language published in 1999 in Geneva by the Foundation for Intelligent Physical Agents (FIPA SL) and of FIPA Agent Communication Language (FIPA ACL). Besides, this framework provides many advantages in comparison with FIPA SL. One of the principal advantages is that a collection of 10 rules is suggested such that one is able to construct the representations of the contents (or structured meanings) of arbitrary natural language discourses and, as a consequence, to construct the representations of arbitrarily complicated goals, actions, and negotiation protocols proceeding from elementary informational items and applying these rules. As a result, the RKCL-theory allows for building compound designations of arbitrary entities considered in the field of EC: sets, finite sequences, relationships, concepts, and structured meanings of texts. That is why the described framework is called an ontological framework. It is shown that the expressive power of restricted standard K-languages exceeds the expressive power of the Resource Description Framework (RDF) and RDF Schema Specification Language elaborated in 1998-1999 by the WWW-Consortium. It is suggested to use the RKCL-theory as a reference-point and a tool for developing more powerful and flexible conceptual formalisms for the advanced, semantically-structured Web.
Ключевые слова указателя: Artificial intelligence; Computational grammars; Data communication systems; Electronic commerce; Integral equations; Knowledge representation; Natural language processing systems; Network protocols; Text processing; Agent communication language; Integral formal semantics; Multi agent systems; Resource description framework; Restricted K calculuses; Universal conceptual metagrammar; World Wide Web

Название: Barter in the Russian economy: Classifications and implications (evidence from case study analyses)
Организации: Inst. for Ind. and Market Studies, State Univ.-Higher School of Eco., Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Yakovlev, A., Inst. for Ind. and Market Studies, State Univ.-Higher School of Eco., Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article addresses Russia's barter economy. Using interview data, it examines the mechanics of barter settlements and classifies the main types of non-monetary transactions. The major reason for barter is lack of a competitive monetary system. In the 1990s barter represented a specific vehicle to perform settlements. Barter itself is not a way to evade taxes or to defraud enterprises of assets. But barter changed the motivation of enterprises and led to systematic distortion of accounting data. The low transparency of the barter economy creates barriers for investment and restructuring. The barter economy is an insider's economy. The lack of affiliated entity regulation and mechanisms for disclosure of transactions with related parties stimulates insiders to criminal application of barter and monetary surrogates. Barter has become a profitable business for a number of important economic agents including financial intermediaries affiliated with top managers of the biggest privatised enterprises and government agencies.
Ключевые слова указателя: bargaining; economic conditions; national economy; Russian Federation

Название: Asymmetric information and the Russian individual savings market
Организации: Inst. for Indust. and Market Studies, Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, ul. Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Avdasheva, S., Inst. for Indust. and Market Studies, Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, ul. Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation; Yakovlev, A., Inst. for Indust. and Market Studies, Stt. Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, ul. Myasnitskaya 20, Moscow 101987, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The article considers the influence of informational imperfections on the performance of the Russian financial market. The focus is on the individual savings market, which exhibits inefficiencies, including those associated with the market power of a dominant agent-Sberbank. Reinforcement of Sberbank's dominance on the market in the period 1994-98 (before the August default combined with financial crisis) is explained as a consequence of asymmetric information about the probability of bankruptcy of a new bank. Under asymmetric information a new private bank has to provide specific quality signals in order to attract depositors. Two major lines of inquiry are the criteria for choosing forms of savings, including that of a bank in which to deposit money, by Russian citizens, and banks' advertising strategies to confirm the factual risk of default. Within the conceptual framework of a game with separating equilibrium, we analyse the behaviour of the agents on both supply and demand sides in the market. We find that there is evidence of using advertising as a tool of quality signalling at a certain phase of the Russian individual savings market's development.
Ключевые слова указателя: banking; financial market; savings; Russian Federation

Название: A Generalization of the second quantization method to the case of special tensor products of fock spaces and quantization of free energy
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The many-particle Schrödinger operator in Fock spaces is averaged by a method that is a generalization of the averaging given in the author's paper [2]. This provides a new representation of the Schrödinger equation, which is a direct generalization of the second quantization representation. The resulting correspondence between symbols and operators permits one to quantize entropy as well as free energy. © 2000 Plenum Publishing Corporation.

Краткое описание: Transients in a BISPIN device, a novel ADC for optoelectronic circuits, are studied. Off-to-on state switching under a fixed light intensity and a pulse supply voltage is considered.

Название: Radiative decay of a massive Dirac neutrino in neutron stars
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Éminov, P.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Ternov, A.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Levchenko, K.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Vshivtsev, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The probability of radiative decay of a massive Dirac neutrino in a magnetized plasma is calculated. For a degenerate electron gas and a superstrong magnetic field, which are important for astrophysical applications, the probability of the process has the same order of magnitude as the rate of decay in the superstrong magnetic field without regard for the influence of the medium. It is also shown that the decay rate significantly increases compared to the free process in the degenerate electron gas. ©2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Название источника: Siberian Russian Student Workshops on Electron Devices and Materials, EDM 2000
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bolshoy Trekchsvjatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Mukhanov, V.E., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bolshoy Trekchsvjatitelsky per. 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Wide opportunities for silicon on insulator (SOI/SOS) technologies in commercial applications (satellite communications, personal communications, atomic engineering etc.) recently have given rise to intensive research based on these technologies. This is due to the advantages of SOI structure in comparison to conventional structures. These advantages include higher performance and radiation hardness. Also, SOS technology is less expensive in comparison to GaAs technology. The article presents the results of MOSFET device modeling for digital VLSI ICs with SOS structure. The modeling was carried out in two stages: modeling of semiconductor device structures (device-level modeling) and circuit modeling of basic logic cells (circuit-level modeling).

It is shown that on the basis of the 12-parametric algorithm one can generate 2 variants of the 6-parametric algorithms: with usage of a half of the nodes or a half of the ports. A new more efficient 3-parametrical algorithm is found on the basis of combination of ideas of the mentioned algorithms, where a half of the ports and a half of the nodes are used. © 2000 IEEE.

Краткое описание: It is shown that the action regarded for a rather long time by experts as a possible example disproving the conjecture on the existence of fixed points for reductive algebraic group actions on affine spaces is not an action on an affine variety, and therefore provides no example of this kind. Moreover, it is shown that the actions naturally related to the original one provide no examples of this kind as well. ©2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Название: Atomic Force Microscopy for Designing Micro- And Nanoelectronic Devices. Part 2
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, 117333, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: Recent advances in atomic force microscopy and its practical use in fabricating the component basis for micro- and nanoelectronics are reviewed. New designs of cantilevers and sensors (selectively sensitive devices) are considered. The advancements and trends and in atomic force microscopy-based nanolithography are discussed.

Название: Semiclassical, trajectory-coherent, quasi-energy states for the one-dimensional schrödinger equation

Краткое описание: On the basis of the complex WKB-Maslov method, semiclassical. trajectory-coherent, quasi-energy states are constructed for the one-dimensional Sclirödinger equation with the potential corresponding to the well-known classical Duffing equation with a time-periodic driving force. Classical objects required to construct semiclassical quasi-energy states are determined by converging series in powers of a small parameter included in the potential. Leading terms of these series are calculated. ©2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electron. Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Effect of the molecular mobility of macromolecules, occurring in the glassy or rubberlike state, on the transport of excess charge carriers in polymer systems is considered. The nonspherical character of the wavefunctions of molecular orbitals in the hopping centers, the presence of a free fluctuation volume, the shortrange order in the arrangement of hopping centers, and the retarded rotation of molecular groups are factors justifying the application of a multiple trapping model. According to this model, the transport of excess charge carriers takes place in the transfer band in the presence of traps distributed within a broad energy interval. The main parameters of charge transfer for a number of polymers are presented. An analysis of these data leads to the conclusion that the translational mobility of segments in polymers in the rubberlike state plays no significant role in the charge carrier transport.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Vannikov A.V., Kundina Y.F., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Electron transport of holes in molecularly doped polycarbonate and its radiation-induced conductivity
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Frumkin Institute of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskiipr. 31, Moscow, 117071, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Vannikov, A.V., Frumkin Institute of Electrochemistry, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskiipr. 31, Moscow, 117071, Russian Federation; Kundina, Y.F., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The salient features of charge transport in a typical molecularly doped polymer (polycarbonate + 30 wt % DEH hydrazone) were studied by time-of-flight and nonsteady-state radiation-induced conductivity measurements. It was shows that the mobility of holes (major carriers) is due to dispersive transport in the temperature range 296-353 K covering the glass transition temperature at an observation time of up to a few seconds. The appearance of a plateau on the current transient, presumably manifesting the establishing of quasiequilibrium (Gaussian) transport, is the artifact of the time-of-flight technique when the charge carrier generation takes place at the sample surface. All of the obtained results can be satisfactorily rationalized in terms of the Rose-Fowler-Weisberg model with a uniform set of parameters of the model. Such an approach is compatible with the basic concepts of the radiation chemistry of condensed phase (the Onsager theory and the Langevin recombination mechanism), structural features of a disordered medium (transport zone, structural traps), and rotational diffusion of small molecules or their molecular groups in vitrified polymers.
Ключевые слова указателя: polycarbonate; article; conductance; electron transport; molecule; radiation; temperature

Авторы: Klimov K.N., Sestroretsky B.V., Soldatov S.V.
Название: Analysis of planar structures with arbitrary distribution of permittivity in the time-domain mode
Название источника: International Conference on Mathematical Methods in Electromagnetic Theory, MMET
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bolshoy Trechsvytitelsky lane 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Lavochkin Association, Leningradskay st. 24, Moscow Area, Chimki-2, Russian Federation; Russian Research Center Kurchatov Institute, Nuclear Fusion Institute, Kurchatov sq. 1, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Klimov, K.N., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bolshoy Trechsvytitelsky lane 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Sestroretsky, B.V., Lavochkin Association, Leningradskay st. 24, Moscow Area, Chimki-2, Russian Federation; Soldatov, S.V., Russian Research Center Kurchatov Institute, Nuclear Fusion Institute, Kurchatov sq. 1, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The algorithm of the electromagnetic analysis in the time-domain mode of planar structures with arbitrary distribution of permittivity (ε>ε0, ε<ε0, ε=0, ε<0) is stated. A 2-parametric algorithm and expressions for Rτ-elements of the equivalent circuit of volume of space are presented. The given expressions also allow one to form a thin (1 layer of a grid) absorbing wall for a flat wave and eigen wave rectangular waveguide Hm0. The accuracy of the method is appreciated. The technique is implemented in the Rt-H planar analyzer program. The characteristics obtained with the program are described which allows one to analyze an area of 150x90 of wavelengths (5.4·106 of nodes of a grid) on the Pentium-II computer (128 Mb, 433 MHz) in 7.5 hours. © 2000 IEEE.
Ключевые слова автора: Admittance; Electromagnetic analysis; Electromagnetic scattering; Electromagnetic waveguides; Equivalent circuits; Filling; Impedance; Permittivity; Rectangular waveguides; Time domain analysis
Ключевые слова указателя: Algorithms; Electric admittance; Electric fields; Electric impedance; Equivalent circuits; Filling; Permittivity; Rectangular waveguides; Waveguides; Absorbing walls; Arbitrary distribution; Electromagnetic analysis; Electromagnetic scattering; Electromagnetic waveguides; Pentium; Planar structure; Time domain; Time domain analysis
