Название: Thermal ion emission from alkali-metal vanadium bronzes
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol’shoi Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Institute of Solid-State Chemistry, Ural Division, Russian Academy of Sciences, Pervomaiskaya ul. 91, Yekaterinburg, 620219, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kudrina, L.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol’shoi Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Svedlov, N.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol’shoi Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Petrov, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol’shoi Trekhsvyatitel’skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Surat, L.L., Institute of Solid-State Chemistry, Ural Division, Russian Academy of Sciences, Pervomaiskaya ul. 91, Yekaterinburg, 620219, Russian Federation; Leonidov, I.A., Institute of Solid-State Chemistry, Ural Division, Russian Academy of Sciences, Pervomaiskaya ul. 91, Yekaterinburg, 620219, Russian Federation; Fotiev, A.A., Institute of Solid-State Chemistry, Ural Division, Russian Academy of Sciences, Pervomaiskaya ul. 91, Yekaterinburg, 620219, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The ion emission properties of M(x)V2O5 (M = Li, Na, K, Cs) bronzes were studied at temperatures from 480 to 700°C in applied fields of up to 20 kV/cm. The results were used to evaluate the activation energies of alkali-metal-ion emission from the vanadium bronzes. The emission properties of the bronzes were found to correlate with their diffusion properties. The mechanisms of ion emission from vanadium bronzes are discussed.
Ключевые слова указателя: alkali metal; alloy; bronze; cesium; lithium derivative; potassium derivative; sodium derivative; unclassified drug; vanadium derivative; article; high temperature; ion transport; reaction analysis; temperature dependence; thermodynamics

Название: Discrete conduction paths in ferroelectric and electret materials
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kozlovskii, V.Kh., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It is shown that conduction along discrete paths (Grotgus chains) is incapable of ensuring complete neutralization of the polarization charge in ferroelectrics, which leads to the formation of a domain structure. The theory of unsteady-state remanent polarization yields underrated values of the surface-charge density for long-time electrets. A model is proposed in which the bulk of an electret is thought of as a continuous conducting medium containing nonohmic inclusions (requiring a nonzero force for charges to be set in motion) and sandwiched between thin layers pierced with conduction paths. © 1999 MAHK "Hayka/Interperiodica".

Название: Examples of degenerate symmetric differential operators with infinite deficiency indices in L2(ℝm)
Название источника: Royal Society of Edinburgh - Proceedings A
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Orochko, Y.B., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For an unbounded self-adjoint operator A in a separable Hilbert space H and scalar real-valued functions a(t),q(t),r(t),t ∈ ℝ, consider the differential expression -(|t|pa(t)f′(t))′ + g(t)f(t) + r(t)Af(t) acting on H-valued functions f(t),t ∈ ℝ, and degenerating at t = 0. Let Sp denote the corresponding minimal symmetric operator in the Hubert space LH2 (ℝ) of H-valued functions f(t) with H-norm ∥f(i)∥ square integrable on the line. The infiniteness of the deficiency indices of Sp, 1/2 < p < 3/2, is proved under natural restrictions on a(t),r(t),q(t). The conditions implying their equality to 0 for p ≥ 3/2 are given. In the case of a self-adjoint differential operator A acting in H = L2 (ℝn), the first of these results implies examples of symmetric degenerate differential operators with infinite deficiency indices in L2(ℝm), m = n + 1.

Название: A reflection formula for the helmholtz equation with the neumann condition
Организации: Department of Mathematics and Econometrics, Higher Economic School, Moscow State University, Myasnitskaya ul. 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Savina, T.V., Department of Mathematics and Econometrics, Higher Economic School, Moscow State University, Myasnitskaya ul. 20, Moscow, 101000, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A reflection formula is proposed for the two-dimensional Helmholtz equation subject to the Neumann condition. In contrast to the classical Schwarz symmetry principle, the formula has a nonlocal (integral) form. Copyright © 1999 by MAHK "Hayxa/Interperiodica".

Авторы: Kouzaev Guennadi A., Chernyi Vladimir V., Al-Shedifat Faisal
Название: Subpicosecond components for quasioptical spatial electromagnetic signal processing
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kouzaev, Guennadi A., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Chernyi, Vladimir V., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Al-Shedifat, Faisal, Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper presents new results in the field of super high-speed signal processing. For this purpose we suggested to write digital information into spatial structures (topology) of electromagnetic field pulses. It allows to use passive circuits for fulfillment spatial logical operations. Main physical effects in solids and micron circuits, which influence on time delay of signals, are considered. In accordance to the physical passive circuits of micron size allow to process spatially modulated signals with time delay less than one picosecond. This fact is confirmed by theoretical modeling transients in strip transmission circuits elements and in logical components for spatial signal processing. It is considered theoretical results of modeling several logical circuits for spatially-modulated signal processing and experimental technique for their researches. The best field of application of the new circuits is quasi-holographic circuits for parallel signal processing. The considered results are interesting in the field of super high-speed applications, microwave-optical engineering, terahertz technique.
Ключевые слова указателя: Computer simulation; Electromagnetic fields; Integrated circuits; Logic circuits; Modulation; Passive networks; Digital information; Logical components; Parallel signal processing; Quasi holographic circuits; Spatially modulated electromagnetic field signals; Strip transmission circuit elements; Subpicosecond electronic components; Digital signal processing
Спонсоры: SPIE

Название: Dynamics of a free boundary in a binary medium with variable thermal conductivity
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Omel'yanov, G.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We construct an asymptotic solution of the phase field system with variable thermal conductivity different in domains occupied by different phases. We show that, depending on relations between parameters characterizing the substance, the dynamics of the free interface between the phases is determined by solutions of the classical or modified Stefan problems. ©2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.
Ключевые слова автора: Classical stefan problem; Fluid or solid phase; Free boundary problem; Modified Stefan problem; Phase field system; Phase transition of the first kind

Название: Mechanism of radiation-induced conductivity in polyethylene and polytetrafluoroethylene
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A critical review of the theoretical concepts regarding possible contributions of the segmental mobility to the radiation-induced electric conductivity of polyethylene and polytetrafluoroethylene is presented. A simple procedure is proposed for evaluating the local (within the nearest points of an entanglement network) translational diffusion of polymeric segments from the data on the temperature-frequency dependence of the maximum of dielectric or mechanical losses upon α-relaxation transition. The estimates obtained indicate that the contribution from the translational diffusion of active segments to the transport of charge carriers is very insignificant and completely disagrees with the experimental results. © 1999 MAK "Hayka/Interperiodica".

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D.
Название: Non-Langevin recombination and dose effects in the radiation-induced conductivity of polymers
Название источника: Vysokomolekularnye Soedineniya. Ser.A Ser.B Ser.C - Kratkie Soobshcheniya
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The features of radiation-induced conductivity under both continuous irradiation and strong pulse action is analyzed theoretically for polymers (PTFE and LDPE) exhibiting a non-Langevin mechanism of the bulk recombination. Recombination in the "encounter pairs" occurring only during the exposure is demonstrated to be the dominant recombination process in this case. After the maximum conductivity for continuous exposure has been reached, the transition to the decay law t-1 is observed immediately in the course of exposure, what is connected to the formation of radiation-induced traps (mainly the radical products of radiolysis). The effect of preliminary irradiation consists in a decrease in the nonstationary radiation-induced conductivity measured in the small-signal mode only during the exposure. The decay of the delayed component upon termination of the radiation pulse is almost unaffected; only at the observation times ≥0.1 s the decay can be accelerated due to the appearance of radiation traps generated by preliminary irradiation.

Название: A self-similarity theory of steady-state convective plume from a point source of heat and passive tracer in a stable atmosphere
Организации: Institute of Oil and Gas Problems, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Vulfson, A.N., Institute of Oil and Gas Problems, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Borodin, O.O., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An integral hydrothermodynamic model and methods of similarity and dimension theory are used to describe the rise of a steady-state convective plume from a point source of heat and passive tracer in a stable atmosphere. Within the framework of a numerical model, the atmospheric stability is shown to have virtually no influence on the dynamic parameters in the lower part of the plume and to substantially affect the dynamics of its upper part. Algebraic relationships are found between vertical velocity, bouyancy and the radius of the plume in its arbitrary cross section, and the vertical extent of the plume as a function of source strength and stratification. The energy distribution degrees of freedom is constructed depending on the height of plume cross section. The results are interesting in connection with environmental pollution monitoring because they allow one to compute the strength of heat and pollutant sources given the temperature and concentration at a specified distance from the source.
Ключевые слова указателя: atmospheric plume; numerical model; pollutant source

Авторы: Arutyunov P.A., Tolstikhina A.L., Demidov V.N.
Название: A system of parameters for analysis of the roughness and microrelief of the surface of materials by scanning probe microscopy
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; A. V. Shubnikov Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., A. V. Shubnikov Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation; Demidov, V.N., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A system of metric and fractal parameters for analysis of the roughness and local structure of the surface of different materials by scanning probe microscopy is substantiated. The parameters, many of which are included in international standards, are defined in terms of classical statistics, spectral analysis, and fractal geometry. The paper consists of two sections. The first section is concerned with a general characterization of the metric (amplitude, functional, spatial) and fractal parameters, and the second section gives experimental data and numerical results illustrating the use of certain parameters for morphological analysis of the surface of different materials. © 2000 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Название: Assessment criteria - An overview
Организации: Chemical Division, HSE
Авторы организаций: Wilson, D., Chemical Division, HSE
Краткое описание: The various technical criteria used to assess the Control of Major Accident Hazards (COMAH) safety reports are discussed. Information about technical parameters and equipment used for the safety installation need to be assessed to identify the performance of risk reduction measures. The safety and reliability feature of the construction of the plant and associated equipment is another factor to be considered during the evaluation of the report. The safety report should identify the procedures that are necessary to enable maintenance activities to be carried out safely to prevent major accidents.
Ключевые слова указателя: Accidents; Control systems; Hazardous materials; Health hazards; Inspection; Plant shutdowns; Process control; Risk assessment; Risk management; Safety devices; Emergency shutdown; Process design; Remedial actions; Accident prevention

Название: Control of major accident hazards regulations 1999 (COMAH)
Организации: Chemical Division, HSE
Авторы организаций: Wilson, D., Chemical Division, HSE
Краткое описание: The objectives of Control of Major Accident Hazards (COMAH) Regulations 1999 are discussed. The main aim of COMAH is to identify accident prone sites involving dangerous substances, prevent major accidents to people and environment involving dangerous substances and limit the consequences of any that do occur. COMAH consolidates and enhances the existing legislative regime in the UK for preventing and mitigating major accidents. Environmental factors, safety management systems and the demonstration of safety and environmental protection are the main factors considered in the COMAH regulation.
Ключевые слова указателя: Chemical industry; Explosives; Hazardous materials; Health hazards; Laws and legislation; Occupational risks; Personnel; Strategic planning; Emergency services; Environmental restoration; Information exchange; Accident prevention

Название: Atomic Force Microscopy for Fabricating Micro- and Nanoelectronic Devices. Part 1
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Recent advances in atomic force microscopy (AFM; hereafter, this abbreviation will also stand for "atomic force microscope") and its role in fabricating micro- and nanoelectronics components are reviewed. Two basic fields of application of this method are presented: panoramic examination of surface image and surface modification. Emphasis is on AFM metrological capabilities. New designs of cantilevers and sensors (selectively sensitive elements) are considered. AFM achievements and trends in the area of nanolithography are discussed.

Название: An averaging method for the quantum many-body problem
Организации: Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow State Institute for Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A new averaging formula for many-particle Schrödinger operators permits one to apply the method of nonstandard characteristics provided that the mean number of particles is a large parameter. For the characteristic equation, which generalizes the corresponding Cooper-Bardeen-Schrieffer-Bogolyubov equation, a Lax pair is written out. ©1999 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Название: Spiral in a Screen with Capacitive Conductance in Azimuthal Direction
Название источника: Journal of Communications Technology and Electronics
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Pchel'nikov, Yu.N., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shumskaya, L.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An approximate dispersion equation for a slow wave is obtained in a composite spiral line consisting of a spiral surrounded by a screen with a capacitive conductance in the azimuthal direction. The dispersion characteristics of a slow-wave system (SS) are calculated at different values of the lumped capacitance. It is shown that the application of an azimuthally conducting screen with capacitive gaps broadens the amplification band of a traveling-wave tube (TWT) without reducing the efficiency of interaction of an electron flow with a wave in the longitudinal direction.

Название: Digital Processing of Fractal Measurements in Finite Fields
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Fractal phenomena begin to play a significant role in electron devices of sizes less than 100 nm. Fractal measurements are mapped onto a set of rational numbers as the Hausdorff-Besikovich dimension. In [1-5], two problems were considered: the representation of the instrument-response law as the digital equivalent (for direct measurements) in terms of unimodular arithmetic and writing of the same equation in terms of multimodular arithmetic by representing an integer in a mixed-radix system of calculation. These two problems are extended to fractal measurements, where a desired value is determined in terms of fractal geometry. It is shown that the fundamental idea in error-free processing of fractal measurements is to map rational operands in the form of order-N Farey fractions [1] into a set of integers Q, perform arithmetic operations in a ring (Q, +, -), and then map the integer-valued results into associated rational numbers.

Название: Development of the Two-Flux Kubelka-Munk Model for Solution of ID Problems of Light Propagation in Scattering Biological Tissues and Media
Название источника: Optics and Spectroscopy (English translation of Optika i Spektroskopiya)
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Rogatkin, D.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A simple modification of the two-flux Kubelka-Munk model for the solution of 1D problems of the theory of radiation transfer in biological tissues and media is considered. The results are compared with the exact solution and experimental data for the substantiation of the applicability of the model to the problems of noninvasive laser diagnostics in medicine.

Авторы: Bondarenko G.G., Kristya V.I., Prassitsky V.V., Khabibulin R.I.
Название: Calculation of a flux of sputtered atoms coming back on the target surface under its heterogeneous sputtering in a glow discharge plasma
Название источника: Surface Investigation X-Ray, Synchrotron and Neutron Techniques
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Prassitsky, V.V., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Khabibulin, R.I., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Concentrations and fluxes of sputtered atoms in glow discharge between the plane target-cathode and anode have been calculated for the case when the flux density of sputtered atoms leaving the target changes periodically along its surface. The conditions at which 'smoothing' of the transversal heterogeneity of the concentration of spattered atoms occurs have been determined, and their back flux on the target is considered to be homogeneous.

Название: Spectral Problems for the Lamé System with Spectral Parameter in Boundary Conditions on Smooth or Nonsmooth Boundary

Авторы организаций: Agranovich, M.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., MGIEM, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Amosov, B.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., MGIEM, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Levitin, M., Department of Mathematics, Heriot-Watt University, Riccarton, Edinburgh EH14 4AS, United Kingdom
Краткое описание: The paper is devoted to four spectral problems for the Lamé system of linear elasticity in domains of ℝ3 with compact connected boundary S. The frequency is fixed in the upper closed half-plane; the spectral parameter enters into the boundary or transmission conditions on S. Two cases are investigated: (1) S is C∞; (2) S is Lipschitz.

Название: A single peak of the Rosensweig instability
Название источника: Journal of Magnetism and Magnetic Materials
Организации: ITP, Otto-von-Guericke Universität, Postfach 4120, 39016 Magdeburg, Germany; Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsyatitel'ski pereulok 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Engel, A., ITP, Otto-von-Guericke Universität, Postfach 4120, 39016 Magdeburg, Germany; Lange, A., ITP, Otto-von-Guericke Universität, Postfach 4120, 39016 Magdeburg, Germany; Langer, H., ITP, Otto-von-Guericke Universität, Postfach 4120, 39016 Magdeburg, Germany; Mahr, T., ITP, Otto-von-Guericke Universität, Postfach 4120, 39016 Magdeburg, Germany; Chetverikov, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsyatitel'ski pereulok 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A single peak formed on the free surface of a ferrofluid subject to an overcritical magnetic field is investigated both theoretically and experimentally with respect to its static and dynamic properties. Using a pertubation analysis up to fifth order in the surface deflection the static profile of the surface in the non-linear regime is obtained for the one-dimensional situation. If the static magnetic field is superimposed with an oscillating part an intricate pattern of subharmonic response of the peak is found experimentally. A simple, analytically tractable model is introduced which displays qualitative agreement with the experimental results. © 1999 Published by Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова автора: Non-linear oscillation; Rosensweig-instability; Surface profile
Ключевые слова указателя: Ferromagnetic materials; Magnetic fields; Mathematical models; Oscillations; Perturbation techniques; Stability; Surfaces; Ferrofluid; Nonlinear oscillation; Rosensweig instability; Surface profile; Magnetic fluids

Название: Permanent crisis in Russia: Selected problems of macroeconomic performance
Организации: Bureau of Economic Analysis, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Institute of Economic Research, Hitotsubashi University, Kunitachi, Tokyo 186-8603, Japan
Авторы организаций: Gavrilenkov, E., Bureau of Economic Analysis, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation, Institute of Economic Research, Hitotsubashi University, Kunitachi, Tokyo 186-8603, Japan
Краткое описание: It is tempting to attribute Russia's shattered stabilization to external factors, namely the fall of oil prices and changed attitudes toward emerging markets. But fundamental distortions thwart the Russian economy. The financial crisis in Southeast Asia and the drop in energy prices only hastened the failure of stabilization. The paper reviews the failed stabilization program and discusses imbalances in Russia's transformation, including tax collection, capital flight, demonetization, and the collapse of investment.
Ключевые слова автора: Capital flight; Demonetization; Fiscal imbalance; Tax collection

Название: Two Oscillation Conditions in a BISPIN-Based Converter
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lysenko, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A BISPIN device is a new element of semiconductor electronics. It combines the properties of a photodetector and a self-oscillator in such a way that an incident light flux is converted into a regular train of current or voltage pulses. Under certain conditions, the pulse-repetition rate is proportional to the light flux. This article touches upon mechanisms and conditions for oscillation occurrence in the BISPIN devices.

Название: Asymptotically dominating estimation of expectation value vectors
Название источника: Theory of Probability and its Applications
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsvyatitelskii, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Serdobolskii, V.I., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsvyatitelskii, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The problem of quadratic risk minimization is solved for the componentwise shrinkage estimation of expectation value vectors for normal vectors with independent components and unit variance. An unimprovable shrinkage function is found, and a shrinkage estimator of the expectation value vector is constructed unimprovable with accuracy to terms that are small for large dimension and large sample size.
Ключевые слова автора: Dominating estimators; Large dimension; Shrinkage estimator

Название: A brief history of the representative theory of measurement
Организации: Higher School of Economics (State University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tolstova, Yu.N., Higher School of Economics (State University), Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The problem of measurement and its uses in sociological studies are considered. The characteristics of measurement in sociology are discussed in comparison to measurement in technology and the natural sciences. The main stages in the establishment and development of the representative theory of measurement are analyzed. Problems awaiting solution are emphasized. © 1999 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.

Краткое описание: The results of the investigation of growth processes of diamond-like carbon films by in situ and ex situ X-ray monitoring of reflectivity at the wavelength 1.54 Å are presented. Diamond-like carbon films were obtained by RF-plasma-enhanced chemical vapour deposition. The growth rate, thickness, density and roughness of films were calculated from the time dependence of reflectivity during deposition process.

Название: Self-organization as a means to suppress and control defect formation in silicon
Название источника: Materials Science and Engineering B: Solid-State Materials for Advanced Technology
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Kuuslnena 25-62, Moscow 125252, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gubenko, A.Y., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, ul. Kuuslnena 25-62, Moscow 125252, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: It was established that in any phase changes in Si (realized by self-organization), there arises an oscillating sequence of specific microstates. Along ascending and descending branches of the oscillations, the concentrations of thermal donors (TDs) and other defects change in the opposite directions with changes in the parameters of state. This feature of self-organization makes it possible to obtain silicon with low densities of defects.
Ключевые слова указателя: Crystal defects; Single crystals; Self-organization; Thermal donors; Semiconducting silicon

Авторы организаций: Neretin, Y.A., Chair of Mathematical Analysis, Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Bol'shoi Triohsviatitel'skii 3/12, Moscow 109082, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We introduce the space of skew-symmetric functions depending on an infinite number of variables and give a simple interpretation of the boson-fermion correspondence.

Название: Investigation of physical principles and characte-ristics of gyrodevices with emission modulation
Название источника: Proceedings - International University Conference "Electronics and Radiophysics of Ultra-High Frequencies"
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12, Bol. Trekhsvyatitelskjy per., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12, Bol. Trekhsvyatitelskjy per., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper a new type of device in considered - the gyroresonating device with modulation of electron emission. In conventional gyrodevices electron bunching occurs due to the relativistic changing of electron mass. However, if in a gyrotron or gyroklystron the cathode in placed in a RF field of the resonator, this will result in emission modulation and the electron bunches will be created right on the cathode. The emission modulation is especially effective in devices with field emission. A flat diode model with a magnetic slanting static field is used to investigate the interaction of electron bunches with electromagnetic RF field. This model describes in a unified way the conventional diode, the gyroresonance mode and the flat magnetron with a transverse RF field. Neglecting the space charge allowed to obtain analytical solutions and compare the efficiency of beam-field interaction in the above cases. © 1999 IEEE.
Ключевые слова указателя: Cathodes; Electrodes; Electron emission; Electrons; Field emission cathodes; Gyroscopes; Magnetrons; Modulation; Particle beam bunching; Beam-field interaction; Diode modeling; Electron bunch; Electron bunching; Emission modulations; Gyroresonance; Physical principles; Static fields; Field emission displays
Издатель: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Inc.
Название конференции: 1999 International University Conference Electronics and Radiophysics of Ultra-High Frequencies""
Сокращенное название источника: Proc. - Int. Univ. Conf. Electron. Radiophys. Ultra-High Freq.

Название: Effect of the structural state of the melt on the properties of silicon crystals
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., ul. Kuusinena 25-62, Moscow 125252, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gubenko, A.Ya., Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., ul. Kuusinena 25-62, Moscow 125252, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Changes in the degree of supercooling and in the accompanying changes in the structure of the melt layer adjoining the growing silicon crystal was shown to result in changes in the properties of the crystal. Crystals of high quality were grown from the melt with a disordered structure. The formation of such a structure can be realized by introducing a special modifying impurity which initiates some phase transformations that lead to melt disordering.
Ключевые слова указателя: Crystal growth from melt; Crystal impurities; Crystal structure; Phase transitions; Supercooling; Disordered structure; Local equilibrium; Semiconducting silicon

Название: Hugoniot-type conditions and weak solutions to the phase-field system
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., B.Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Mathematics, Moscow State University, Vorobiovi Gori, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Danilov, V.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., B.Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Omel'yanov, G.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., B.Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Radkevich, E.V., Department of Mathematics, Moscow State University, Vorobiovi Gori, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a new concept of weak solutions to the phase-field equations with a small parameter ε characterizing the length of interaction. For the standard situation of a single free interface, this concept (in contrast with the common one) leads to the well-known Stefan- Gibbs-Thomson problem as ε → 0. For the case of a large number M(ε) M(ε) → ∞ as ε → 0) of free interfaces, which corresponds to the 'wave-train' interpretation of a 'mushy region', this concept allows us to obtain the limit problem as ε → 0.

Название: Simulation of heavy ion energy distribution function in the cathode sheath of noble gas mixture glow discharge
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskiy per., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Bauman Moscow State Tech. University, Kaluga branch, 4 Bazhenov st., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 B. Vuzovskiy per., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Bauman Moscow State Tech. University, Kaluga branch, 4 Bazhenov st., Kaluga 248600, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A one-dimensional model kinetic equation for the energy distribution function of heavy ions in the cathode sheath of gas mixture glow discharges is suggested, taking into account charge exchange collisions of heavy ions with heavy atoms and momentum transfer collisions of heavy ions with light atoms. An approximate analytical solution of the kinetic equation is found and a procedure of its numerical solution is developed. It is shown that heavy ion-light atom momentum transfer collisions can substantially influence the heavy ion energy distribution function and the cathode sputtering rate in gas mixtures.

Название: Medical application of slow electromagnetic waves
Название источника: Proceedings - International University Conference "Electronics and Radiophysics of Ultra-High Frequencies"
Организации: MTS Systems Corporation, 3001 Sheldon Drive, Gary, NC, United States; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Trechsvjatitelsky line, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Pchelnikov, Yu.N., MTS Systems Corporation, 3001 Sheldon Drive, Gary, NC, United States; Yelizarov, A.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Trechsvjatitelsky line, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The development and realization of microwave radiators, based on slow-wave structures (SWS) application, has shown that the application of slow electromagnetic waves is extremely promising in different areas of medicine. A novel family of RF applicators and microwave radiators is offered and designed. An artificial ear with antenna on coupled spirals and coagulating scalpels with coupled combs on metal and dielectric blades were developed. This paper, based on analysis of the physical properties of slow electromagnetic waves and the laws of electrodynamics, presents the main features of SWS-based applicators and radiators which enable new application of RF and microwaves in medicine. © 1999 IEEE.

Название: Avoiding health risks from drinking water in Moscow: An empirical analysis
Организации: Dept. of Agric. and Rsrc. Economics, University of Connecticut, U-21, Storrs, CT 06269, United States; Ctr. Environ. and Nat. Rsrc. Econ., Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Larson, B.A., Dept. of Agric. and Rsrc. Economics, University of Connecticut, U-21, Storrs, CT 06269, United States; Gnedenko, E.D., Ctr. Environ. and Nat. Rsrc. Econ., Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Casual observation suggests that many households in Moscow boil water, settle water in pans for some periods (e.g., overnight) before consuming, filter water, and buy bottled water. To date, there has been little empirical analysis of such avoidance behavior. Based on a recently completed survey of 615 households in Moscow, this paper investigates the types and amounts of avoidance measures that are used by households in Moscow to adjust drinking water quality. Survey results show that this is clearly the case: over 88 per cent of the sample boil water regularly due to concerns about water quality; 23 per cent filter water regularly; over 30 per cent settle water regularly; and about 13 per cent buy bottled water regularly. On the other hand, residents are generally content with their cold water supply and quality of delivery. Based on a microeconomic model of household avoidance behavior, logit regression results show how avoidance decisions relate to income, opinions of water quality, and location in the city. It is expected that this analysis from Moscow can also be used as a guide for future studies in other cities in Russia to evaluate opinions of quality, avoidance measures, and citizens willingness to support public infrastructure projects designed to improve water supply. Copyright © 1999 Cambridge University Press.

Авторы: Bondarenko G.G., Andreev V.V., Loskutov S.A., Stolyarov A.A.
Название: Method of metal-insulator-semiconductor structure interface analysis
Организации: Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., B. Trekhsvyatitelsky St. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, Bazhenov St. 4, Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation

University, Kaluga Branch, Bazhenov St. 4, Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation; Loskutov, S.A., Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, Bazhenov St. 4, Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation; Stolyarov, A.A., Bauman Moscow Stt. Tech. University, Kaluga Branch, Bazhenov St. 4, Kaluga, 248600, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The method of metal-insulator-semiconductor (MIS) structure interface analysis, based on applying a direct current pulse of preset amplitude to a MIS structure, is proposed. The variation of the voltage across the MIS structure is recorded while the current flows. The method allows measurement of interface characteristics such as the interface states density, the flat band voltage, the surface potential value for a given bias and the potential barrier height on the injection interface. In addition, the method enables us to determine the charge degradation parameters of the MIS structure under and after high-field stressing.

We then extend the theory to cope with the robust stability of uncertain semi-linear stochastic differential delay equations. We shall also give several examples to illustrate our theory. © 1998 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

Название: Determination of the surface potential of a dielectric layer on a target bombarded by an ion beam
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Bazhin, A.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Korzhavyǐ, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Kristya, V.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Aitov, R.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The electric field at the surface of a charge spot created by an ion beam on a dielectric coating of a target is calculated. An expression is obtained which relates the surface potential of the insulator to the potential of the collector corresponding to saturation of the collector secondary-electron current. It permits determination of the potential drop across the oxide layer of a cold cathode without introducing complications in the construction of the experimental apparatus. © 1998 American Institute of Physics.

Название: Natural inferences in semiotic models
Название источника: IEEE International Symposium on Intelligent Control - Proceedings
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Plesniewicz, Gerald S., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: An approach to semiotic modeling make use of concept-oriented languages. We consider methods of inference in semiotic models formulated in the CONCEPT, a concept-oriented semiotic modeling language which is under development in MSIEM. Our special interest is in drawing natural inferences that are close enough to ones which may be observed in human reasoning. One sort of natural inferences is related to default reasoning. We adapt to our aims one default reasoning method due to A. Hautamaki. Other sort of natural inference is related to natural logical deduction. We outline an original method for obtaining natural proofs in CONCEPT using the productions associated with CONCEPT statements.
Ключевые слова указателя: Artificial intelligence; Computer simulation languages; Concept-oriented languages; Semiotic models; Computational linguistics

Название конференции: Proceedings of the 1998 IEEE International Symposium on Intelligent Control, ISIC
Сокращенное название источника: IEEE Int Symp Intell Control Proc

Название: Experimental study of the temporal characteristics of a switch for topologically modulated signals
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kuzaev, G.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Aspects of an experimental study of the temporal characteristics of switches for topologically modulated signals are considered. A microwave resistive switch card serves as the experimental model. The clock frequency of the generator of topologically modulated pulses developed is chosen such that the ratio of the wavelength at the clock frequency to the dimensions of the standard switch card is equal to 104. It is concluded on the basis of the virtual absence of distortions of the input pulses switched by the device and the application of scaling to the experimental results that a switch of micron dimensions is effective for microsecond pulses, confirming the previously obtained theoretical data. © 1998 American Institute of Physics.

Авторы: Erninov P.A., Zhukovskii K.V., Levchenko K.G.
Название: Associated production of Higgs bosons with Z bosons by charged leptons in strong external fields
Название источника: Journal of Experimental and Theoretical Physics
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Erninov, P.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Zhukovskii, K.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Levchenko, K.G., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The probabilities of the associated production of a Higgs boson with a Z boson by a charged lepton in the field of a plane electromagnetic wave of arbitrary intensity and in a constant crossed field are obtained. The behavior of the cross section of the process as a function of the particle energies and the external field intensity is investigated for various values of the Higgs boson mass. It is shown that there is a logarithmic increase in the photoproduction cross section at superhigh energies up to a value significantly exceeding the cross section of the reaction e+ + e-→Z+H, which is presently regarded as the most probable channel for the production of Higgs bosons. © 1998 American Institute of Physics.

Краткое описание: Let S be a smooth projective surface, let K be the canonical class of 5 and let H be an ample divisor such that H · K < 0. We prove that for any rigid sheaf F (Ext 1 (F, F) = 0) that is Mumford-Takemoto semistable with respect to H there exists an exceptional set (E 1,..., E n) of sheaves on S such that F can be constructed from {E i} by means of a finite sequence of extensions. © 1999 Kluwer Academic/Plenum Publishers.
Ключевые слова автора: Exceptional sheaves; Filtration; Projective surface; Rigid sheaves; Stable sheaves

Название: Theory of Restricted K-calcules as a Comprehensive Framework for Constructing Agent Communication Languages
Организации: Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Department of Discrete Mathematics, Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, Lomonosov Moscow State University, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Fomichov, V.A., Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation, Department of Discrete Mathematics, Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, Lomonosov Moscow State University, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: For the first time, a comprehensive and flexible mathematical framework for constructing agent communication languages (ACLs) is suggested. That framework is the theory of restricted K-calcules and K-languages, or the RKCL-theory, published in Informatica, 1996, No. 1. The essence of the new framework is as follows. 10 operations on formal representations of conceptual structures are suggested. The contents of arbitrary messages and arbitrary communicative acts may be represented by the strings built out of primitive conceptual items by means of these 10 operations. The RKCL-theory possesses the expressive possibilities exceeding the expressive possibilities of the ACL published in October 1997 in Geneva by the international Federation of Intelligent Physical Agents (FIPA). The main advantages are, in particular, the possibilities to represent arbitrarily complicated goals (actions) and structured meanings of arbitrary discourses in natural language. The new framework enables us both to define syntax of ACLs and to formalize their semantics. The paper suggests also a little modified variant of the RKCL-theory without changing the expressive power of that theory.
Ключевые слова автора: Agent communication language; Communicative act; Electronic commerce; FIPA ACL; Integral formal semantics; Internet; Multi-agent system; Natural language; Ontology; Restricted K-calculus; Restricted standard K-language; Semantic representation; Semantics; Syntax

Название: Technological sensors on slow electromagnetic waves
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: MTS Systems Corporation, 3001 Sheldon Drive, Cary, NC 27513, United States; Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 Trechsvjatevsky Lane, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Pchelnikov, Y.N., MTS Systems Corporation, 3001 Sheldon Drive, Cary, NC 27513, United States; Yelizarov, A.A., Moscow State Inst. Electron. Math., 3/12 Trechsvjatevsky Lane, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: New methods for physical and technological parameters measurements are demonstrated. These methods are based on slow-wave structures application as sensitive elements and are using the dependence of phase velocity in slow-wave structure upon parameters of medium and the distance between slow-wave structure's conductors and between a slow-wave structure and other conductive surfaces. The phase velocity alteration leads to a sensitive element resonant frequency alteration which can be converted into a measuring generator frequency alteration. The peculiarities and advantages of slow-wave structure-based sensitive elements are considered. The possibility of the new method application in microelectronics and other brands of Industry are shown. The practical realization of the mentioned above method have confirmed its sensitivity, accuracy and simplicity. It is shown that the use of sensitive elements based on the slow-wave structures is extremely promising in different technological processes and scientific research. Resistivity, permittivity, and permeability, thickness, continuity, linear and angular displacement, vibration, and many other physical and geometric parameters can be measured with high accuracy.
Ключевые слова автора: Electromagnetic parameters monitoring; Equivalent parameters; Sensitive element; Slow-wave structure; Slowed electromagnetic wave; Surface resistivity

The conditions of solvability of strictly hyperbolic systems of quasilinear equations of the first order in the Maslov algebras are obtained.

Название: Weak solutions to the phase field system
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B. Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State University, Dept. of Math, Vorobiovi Gori, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Danilov, V.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B. Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Omel'yanov, G.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B. Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Radkevich, E.V., Moscow State University, Dept. of Math, Vorobiovi Gori, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider a new concept of weak solutions to the phase field equations with a small parameter ε characterizing the length of interaction. For the standard situation of a single free interface, this concept (in contrast to the common one) leads to the well-known Stefan-Gibbs-Thomson problem as ε → 0. For the case of a large number M(ε) (M(ε) → ∞ as ε → 0) of free interfaces, which is related to the "wave-train" interpretation of a "mushy region", this concept allows us to obtain limiting problems as ε → 0.
Ключевые слова автора: Limiting problem; Mushy region; Wave-train; Weak solution

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Sadovnichii D.N.
Название: Methodological problems of determining the mobility of excess charge carriers in molecularly doped polymers
Название источника: Vysokomolekularnye Soedineniya. Ser.A Ser.B Ser.C - Kratkie Soobshcheniya
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Dzerzhinsk, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; SOYUZ Federal Center of Double-Purpose Technologies, ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Dzerzhinsk, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Dzerzhinsk, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Dzerzhinsk, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation; Sadovnichii, D.N., SOYUZ Federal Center of Double-Purpose Technologies, ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow Oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The room-temperature mobility of holes in a molecularly doped polymer (polycarbonate containing 30 wt % of hydrazone) was studied by methods of nonstationary radiation- induced electric conductivity, time-of-flight measurements, and pulsed monopolar carrier injection. It was established that the hole transport in the polymer system studied during short periods of time (hundreds of microseconds or a few milliseconds) after the pulsed generation of carriers occurs in a dispersion regime (with a dispersion parameter of ∼0.4). Then the effective mobility attains a plateau, and the transport regime changes from dispersion to Gaussian. The time-of-flight and stationary mobility values are strongly dependent on the strength of applied electric field. All three methods are virtually equally informative in studying the dispersion branch of the time variation of the effective mobility, while the Gaussian transport regime is more conveniently studied by the time-of-flight technique.

Авторы: Pospelov A., Tchernyi V., Girich S.
Название: Planetary rings new mission concept
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering

Авторы организаций: Pospelov, A., Volgograd State Technical University, 1048 N. Curson Ave., West Hollywood, CA, 90046, United States; Tchernyi, V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, LMIS, 3. Tryokhsvyatitelsky, 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Girich, S., Volgograd State University, Tvardovskiy Str. 5-64, Volgograd, 400081, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Using our concept it is become possible to explain many phenomena which have not been adequately understood earlier including some results of Voyager US missions. The superdiamagnetic model is based on the assumption that the planets' rings consist of the superconducting particles. The huge number of superconducting particles in the planet's magnetic field demonstrated behavior comparable to superdiamagnetic liquid film. The superdiamagnetic concept of the planets' rings makes it possible to add classical theories, and to resolve as yet unsolved problems as will shown below. Problems of planets' nngs. I Physical effect (distinctive parameter). Origin, dynamics and evolution of the rings. / Meissner-Ochsenfeld effect: display of perfect diamagnetism by superconducting particles. Existence of the temperature border in ring's systems distribution in Solar system (belt of asteroids). I Existence of superconducting transition temperature (Ta). Great flattening of the rings' systems. Sharp edges and rings' discontinuities. / Phenomenon of pushing out the diamagnetic substance out of the areas with greater density of magnetic flux. Thin structure of the Saturn's rings. / Phenomenon of forming the periodic structures in the diamagnetic liquid film when influenced by the normal magnetic field. Existence of the planetcentrical dust flows of submicron particles in rings' systems. I Disappearance of diamagnetic properties at superconducting particles with dimensions similar to London's depth of magnetic field penetration (-10 -10 cm). Variable azimuth brightness of the Saturn's A ring particles (it is required to draw the orientation hypotheses). / Orientation of elongated diamagnetic particles normally to the lines of force of the magnetic field. Forming and development of spokes in the Saturn's B ring. I Push-out of superconducting particles from a plane of rings or their reorientation by magnetic anomaly. High reflection and low brightness of the ring particles in the radiofrequency range. / Existence of critical frequency (-10 Hz), above which electromagnetic waves are absorbed and below which ones are fully reflected. Own wide band pulse radiation of the Saturn's rings within the range 20.4 kHz -40.2 MHz. / Non-stationary Josephson effect: generation of electromagnetic waves by Josephson's contact (with frequency 4,83594.1014 Hz/V). Frequency anomalies in the thermal radiation of the Saturn's rings in the spectrum range 100 mm -1 cm. I Existence of energetic slit (-10 eV) in energetic spectrum of superconductor electrons. Color differentiation of Saturn's rings in small scales. / Dependence of pushing out force, acting on adulterated superconductor in magnetic field, from volume of superconducting phase. Phenomenon of anomalous inversion reflection of radiowaves (>1 cm) with circular polarization. I Expected effect at reflection of radiowaves (>3 mm) with circular polarization from superconductors. Distribution of particles by the sizes in the Saturn's rings in the radial direction (is not established). I Magnetic separability of superconducting powders as a function of their size and the strength and range of the applied magnetic field. Existence of the atmosphere of unknown origin at rings of Saturn. / Levitation of gas molecules at the expense of forces of diamagnetic push-out, induced in superconducting particles by molecular magnetic moments. Existence of waves of density and bending waves in Saturn's rings. / Excitation of parametrical fluctuations by ponderomotive forces at a tangential direction of an external magnetic field to a free surface of a diamagnetic liquid.

Краткое описание: The characteristics of a RAP crystal (RbHC8H4O4), metal-carbon multilayer X-ray mirror and diamond-like carbon (DLC) X-ray mirror are compared. The advantages of DLC mirrors in resolution power are described. Temperature and radiation on the reflectivity and bandwidth of Bragg peak for diamond-like mirrors are studied. It is shown that the parameters of DLC mirrors after annealing in vacuum are stable up to 570°C. © 1998 Published by Elsevier Science S.A. All rights reserved.

Название: Development of an expert system for interpreting electron diffraction patterns
Организации: Institute of Crystallography, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tolstikhina, A.L., Institute of Crystallography, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation; Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Klyshinskii, E.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A laboratory prototype of the expert system Electron for the automatic interpretation of electron diffraction patterns has been described. A high-level language providing storage and processing of knowledge is developed as well as a user interface for work with images. The Electron expert system can play the part of a consultant and also serve as an electron diffraction textbook when teaching crystallography.

Авторы: Arutyunov P.A., Tolstikhina A.L., Demidov V.N.
Название: Roughness parameters measured with an atomic force microscope
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation; Demidov, V.N., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The sections of surfaces scanned by an atomic force microscope were functionally described in terms of the Hentlemann-Nazarov distribution, which covers a wide class of exponential distributions (Laplacian, Gaussian, trapezoidal, and uniform). The root-mean-square deviation for this distribution is surface roughness, which depends on the distribution type chosen. It is shown that surface roughness can be studied either within the Euclidean metric in terms of the moment method or within the Hausdorff dimensional representation in terms of fractal geometry. These approaches, being independent of each other, have specific features and areas of application of their own. Algorithms to evaluate roughness parameters, autocorrelation function, and spectral power density are presented. The surface characteristics for polySi, SiO2, and cellulose films at wavelengths from 5 to 5 × 105 nm were obtained. It was demonstrated that the autocorrelation function reflects roughness scale variety and begins to depend on surface relief as the scale reduces.

Краткое описание: Laboratory meltings of low activation austenitic and ferritic steels (Fe0.1C12Cr20Mn1W0.2V and Fe0.1C9Cr1W0.15Ta) were done in an inductive furnace. The panoramic analysis of the charge materials and steels were made by means of spark mass-spectrometry. Series of calculations of activation parameters for steels composing from hypothetically pure, isotopically enriched macrocomponents and for real materials were conducted. The possible metallurgical technologies of industrial production of the low activation steels in the Russian Federation including processes of initial charge materials purification are considered. © 1998 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

Название: Some thermodynamic features of ideal systems with nonlinear interaction
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Radio Eng., E., Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Barashev, V.P., Moscow Stt. Inst. Radio Eng., E., Moscow, Russian Federation; Belov, V.V., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow Technical University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Vshivtsev, A.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Radio Eng., E., Moscow, Russian Federation; Kisun'ko, A.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Radio Eng., E., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The thermodynamic properties of two two-dimensional systems are investigated comparatively. One system corresponds to a bound state of a two-dimensional harmonic oscillator, and the other corresponds to a nonlinear anharmonic oscillator. The spectrum for the harmonic oscillator is presented; for the nonlinear oscillator, the WKB spectrum and the wave functions are first calculated. The Ω-potential behavior is essentially different at high temperatures. This difference may possibly be observed by investigating the temperature dependence of the heat capacity in planar anisotropic media.

Название: Influence of high heat flux loading and irradiation on some promising candidate materials for the divertor structure
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoy Vusovskiy per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; All Russ. Electro Tech. Institute, Bolshoy Vusovskiy per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: The sputtering of a number of materials due to an intense polyenergetic flux of hydrogen particles has been investigated. The irradiation of pure tungsten, copper, aluminium, titanium, aluminium-lithium alloys, stainless steel and tungsten-copper composition has been carried out at particle flux densities of 1017-1018 cm-2 s-1 and at fluences of 1020-1022 cm-2. Furthermore, W-Cu composition has been subjected to the effect of high-current plasma pulses for simulating the disruption heat loads in a thermonuclear reactor. © 1998 Elsevier Science S.A. All rights reserved.

Название: Advances in quantization: Quantum tensors, explicit star-products, and restriction to irreducible leaves
Организации: Moscow Inst. of Electoronics/Math., B. Trekhsvyat. per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M., Moscow Inst. of Electoronics/Math., B. Trekhsvyat. per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The notion of quantum vector fields and quantum tensors is investigated and applied for explicit calculation of the Weyl star-product over Poisson manifolds, as well as, of the Wick star-product and the reproducing measure over (pseudo) Kählerian manifolds. Quantum phase space structure over Poisson manifolds is discussed and used for the derivation of explicit formulas for irreducible representations of the star-product algebra. The quantum restriction of the star-product onto irreducible leaves is described. Some interesting geometrical constructions (for instance, a series of higher order differential invariants over Kählerian manifolds) are obtained as corollaries of quantum calculations.
Ключевые слова автора: Differential invariant; Irreducible representation; Quantization; Star-product

Краткое описание: A new streak tube with the photocathode of 4×40 mm size is designed for the detection of dynamic spectra with a time resolution down to 2 ps and spatial resolution up to 35 Ip/mm. The four-electrode design is adopted for a tube electron-optical system. A fine mesh accelerating electrode is placed at a distance of ∼1 mm from the photocathode. A pair of deflecting electrodes are equipped with an electron trap, providing beam blanking. © 1998 Society of Photo-Optical Instrumentation Engineers.
Ключевые слова автора: Deflection electrodes; Electron trap; Four-electrode electron-optical system; Photocathode

Авторы: Chumachenko E.N., Arutyunov S.D., Gorbunova A.N., Lebedenko I.Yu., Koval'skaya T.V.
Название: Calculation of admissible amplitude of unevenness on the functional surfaces of special all-ceramic and metalloceramic structures
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; A. N. Semashko Moscow Med. Dent. I., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chumachenko, E.N., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation, A. N. Semashko Moscow Med. Dent. I., Moscow, Russian Federation; Arutyunov, S.D., Moscow Stt. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation, A. N. Semashko Moscow Med. Dent. I., Moscow, Russian Federation; Lebedenko, I.Yu., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation, A. N. Semashko Moscow Med. Dent. I., Moscow, Russian Federation; Koval'skaya, T.V., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation, A. N. Semashko Moscow Med. Dent. I., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The problem of rational designing of ceramic and metalloceramic dentures is considered. The evaluation of the stress-strain state and the solution of the boundary inhomogeneous elastoplastic problem are used for determining the critical values of the amplitudes of all-ceramic cusps. The effect of the basis of the inhomogeneous structure on the changes in the angles of critical loads at which the prosthesis functions reliably up to the appearance of irreversible phenomena (cleavage of the ceramics, basis fracture) is estimated.

Авторы: Gvozdev V.I., Murmuzhev B.A., Podkovyrin S.I.
Название: Optical-microwave modulators for data processing systems
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Inst. of Radio Eng. and Electronics, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Mokhovaya 18, Moscow, 103907, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gvozdev, V.I., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Murmuzhev, B.A., Inst. of Radio Eng. and Electronics, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Mokhovaya 18, Moscow, 103907, Russian Federation; Podkovyrin, S.I., Inst. of Radio Eng. and Electronics, Russian Academy of Sciences, ul. Mokhovaya 18, Moscow, 103907, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The component basis for super-high-speed information systems is reviewed, and the basic operating principles of optical-microwave modulators based on electrooptic, acoustic, magnetooptic, and other effects are discussed. The classification of bulk and integrated amplitude and phase optical-microwave modulators is given. The basic designs of super-high-speed optical switches are demonstrated.

Название: Design and electrophysical characteristics of force sensors in atomic force microscopy
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The design, electrophysical characteristics, and fabrication technology of foreign and domestic cantilevers - force sensors used in atomic force microscopy - are considered. An electromechanical sensor model from which the transformation characteristics are derived is suggested. Relations that specify the cantilever sensitivity to the design and electrophysical parameters are obtained. The concept of the ultimate state of a cantilever, which helps to predict its lifetime, is discussed.

Название: Integral Representations over Isotropic Submanifolds and Equations of Zero Curvature
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Vorobjev, Y., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In the phase space over a Riemann manifold we consider a submanifold 4 invariant with respect to a Hamilton flow, isotropic (i.e., the formpdqΛis closed), and stable with respect to the first variation equation. For semiclassical wave- functions of the quantum Hamiltonian we propose a very simple global ansatz with an oscillation front onΛ. This ansatz has a form of an integral alongΛfrom Gaussian packets framed by an "amplitude." The amplitude is a parallel section of a bundle of polynomials. The connection on this bundle is generated by a symplectic connection with zero curvature on the normal symplectic bundle overΛ. The coefficients of such a connection are calculated explicitly in terms of infinitesimal symmetries, and also in adiabatic approximation. We investigate topological and geometrical objects arising as corrections to the Poincaré-Cartan invariant in quantization rule onΛand calculate spectral series for the quantum Hamiltonian. © 1998 Academic Press.

Авторы: Tyutnev A.P., Saenko V.S., Pozhidaev E.D., Sadovnichii D.N.
Название: Methodological problems of determining the mobility of excess charge carriers in molecularly doped polymers
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; SOYUZ Fed. Ctr. Double-Purpose T., ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Tyutnev, A.P., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Saenko, V.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pozhidaev, E.D., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Sadovnichii, D.N., SOYUZ Fed. Ctr. Double-Purpose T., ul. Sovetskaya 6, Dzerzhinskii, Moscow oblast, 140056, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The room-temperature mobility of holes in a molecularly doped polymer (polycarbonate containing 30 wt % of hydrazone) was studied by the methods of nonstationary radiation-induced electric conductivity, time-of-flight measurements, and pulsed monopolar carrier injection. It was established that the hole transport in the polymer system studied during short periods of time (hundreds of microseconds or a few milliseconds) after the pulsed generation of the carriers occurs in a dispersive regime (with a dispersion parameter of ∼0.4). When the effective mobility attains a plateau, the transport regime changes from dispersive to Gaussian. The time-of-flight and stationary mobility values are strongly dependent on the strength of the applied electric field. All three methods are virtually equally useful in studying the dispersive branch of the time variation of the effective mobility, while the Gaussian transport regime is more conveniently studied by the time-of-flight technique.

Название: Phenomenological description of surface characteristics measured by the method of atomic force microscopy
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatskii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatskii per. 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The phenomenological surface characteristics (the maximum peak-to-peak value, surface roughness, skewness and kurtosis, scaling correlation function, power spectral density and energy spectrum, and coherence function) determined by the method of atomic-force microscopy are considered in terms of microgeometry and classical statistics. The algorithm is described for computing surface roughness and providing elimination of the measurement errors associated with probe setting and an increase of the scanned region. The numerical results characterizing the scaling properties of roughness and other surface characteristics are also considered. The problems encountered in the statistical analysis of the hierarchic structure of the surface roughness in the system "a point-a scanner zone-a wafer" are formulated.

Название: On stability of a class of neutral type functional differential equations
Организации: Departement of Cybernetics, Lab. de Mathématiques Appl., IPRA, Av. de l'Université, 64000 Pau, France; Departement of Cybernetics, Moscow Tech. Univ. Electronics Math., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: This paper deals with the study of stability and estimation of stability domain for a class of nonlinear integro-difference equations, which coincide with special class of neutral type functional differential equations. The new approach for stability study called the pattern equation method is proposed. © 1998 IMACS/Elsevier Science B.V.
Ключевые слова автора: Integro-difference equations; Neutral type equations; Stability
Ключевые слова указателя: Asymptotic stability; Difference equations; Estimation; Functions; Mathematical models; Functional differential equations; Neural type equations; Integrodifferential equations

Название: Stability of epidemic model with time delays influenced by stochastic perturbations
Организации: Istituto di Biomatematica, Universita di Urbino, I-61029 Urbino, Italy; Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., Department of Cybernetics, Bolshoy Vusovskii, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Donetsk State Academy of Management, Dept. Math., Info. and Computering, Chelyuskintsev, 163a, Donetsk 340015, Ukraine

Electronics and Math., Department of Cybernetics, Bolshoy Vusovskii, 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Shaikhet, L., Donetsk State Academy of Management, Dept. Math., Info. and Computering, Chelyuskintsev, 163a, Donetsk 340015, Ukraine
Краткое описание: Many processes in automatic regulation, physics, mechanics, biology, economy, ecology etc. can be modelled by hereditary equations (see, e.g. [1-6]). One of the main problems for the theory of stochastic hereditary equations and their applications is connected with stability. Many stability results were obtained by the construction of appropriate Lyapunov functionals. In [7-11], the procedure is proposed, allowing, in some sense, to formalize the algorithm of the corresponding Lyapunov functionals construction for stochastic functional differential equations, for stochastic difference equations. In this paper, stability conditions are obtained by using this procedure for the mathematical model of the spread of infections diseases with delays influenced by stochastic perturbations. © 1998 IMACS/Elsevier Science B.V.
Ключевые слова автора: Construction method; Lyapunov functionals; SIR-model; Stability conditions; Stochastic perturbations
Ключевые слова указателя: Algorithms; Convergence of numerical methods; Differential equations; Disease control; Epidemiology; Functions; Lyapunov methods; Perturbation techniques; Random processes; Epidemic model; Hereditary equations; Lyapunov functions; Mathematical models

Название: Physical basement for super-high speed processing spatially-modulated field signals
Организации: Dept. of Laser and Microwave Information Systems, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 3/12 B. Tryokhsvyatitelsky per., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kouzaev, G.; Nazarov, I.; Tcherkasov, A., Dept. of Laser and Microwave Information Systems, Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 3/12 B. Tryokhsvyatitelsky per., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This article examines the physical basis of the superfast VLSI components for processing spatially modulated electromagnetic field signals. The analysis of the main physical effects which are capable to influence on VLSI components speed is given. The possibility of fulfillment of subpicosecond analog and digital operations for spatially modulated signals with the help of passive microstrip micron-sized components is conducted The outcomes of subpicosecond switch simulation are discussed The integration concept for such elements in VLSI, constructed on principles ofa digital pseudo-holography is offered.
Ключевые слова указателя: Digital operation; Microstripes; Physical effects; Spatially modulated; Subpicosecond; Super-high speed; Electromagnetic fields
