Название: Application aspects of G-analysis
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bolshoi Trekhsviatitilskii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Serdobolskii, V.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bolshoi Trekhsviatitilskii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Recent developments of the general approach to multivariate analysis (G-analysis), where the dimension of variables n is large and comparable with the sample size N, are discussed. Its platform is a non-linear functional relation between the principle parts of spectral functions of true and sample covariance matrices. The remainder terms are small if all four moments of variables are bounded and a special average measure of quadratic forms is small. Three statistical problems are considered under the G-analysis approach (for normal populations): (1) estimating the mean of a random vector with independent components and variance 1, (2) discrimination of two populations with common unknown covariance matrix, and (3) linear regression in case of random predictors and random response. Regularized and generalized procedures are considered depending on an arbitrary a priori function of finite variation. Under the asymptotics n → ∞, N → ∞, n/N → y > 0, limit formulas are derived for quality functionals of these procedures. The extremum problems are partially solved. © 1998 VSP.

Название: Ownership and control in Russian privatised companies: new evidence from a repeated survey
Организации: Centre for Organisational Studies, State Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Malyi Gnezdnikovsky per. 4/2, 103009 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gurkov, I., Centre for Organisational Studies, State Univ. Higher Sch. of Economics, Malyi Gnezdnikovsky per. 4/2, 103009 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: As the mass privatisation in Russia is almost completed a serious analysis of the short and long-term implications of ownership transformation can commence. What has to be evaluated is whether the system of private property rights and the enforcement of these rights have created a perverse governance structure, which only serves to strengthen the position of special interest groups in exploiting the assets of the enterprise, or whether the reforms have created a variety of ownership structures which will allow effective turnaround strategies to be designed and implemented. This article presents and discusses the results of a longitudinal survey of 20 privatised companies in Russian industry. All of the companies surveyed were initially privatised by the so-called 'second' method of voucher privatisation, which transferred a controlling interest to the employees. The first results of the survey were presented in our previous article in this journal. In the present article we try to map the changes in decision-making structures and control arrangements that occurred in privatised companies in 1994-96. The article is organised as follows. In the first section we briefly recall the basic legal patterns of company restructuring in Russia. The second section gives an overview of the research methodology: the measures used and the principles of sample selection. The third section presents the main results of the longitudinal survey, especially the comparison between 1994, 1995 and 1996. Short conclusions are drawn in the last section.
Ключевые слова указателя: industrial ownership; industrial restructuring; ownership pattern; privatisation; Russian Federation

I.C.T.P., PO Box 586, 34100 Trieste, Italy; Danilov, V.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., B. Vuzovsky, 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Radkevich, E.V., Moscow State University, Department of Mathematics, Vorobiovi Gori, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The conserved phase field system with a small parameter in the n-dimensional case (n ≤ 3) is considered. An asymptotic solution, describing the free interface dynamics, is constructed and justified. As the small parameter tends to zero, the limiting solution satisfies the modified Stefan problem with corrected Gibbs-Thomson law.

Название: A strange application of Kolmogorov complexity
Организации: Technische Universität Berlin, FB Mathematik, Sekr. MA 8-1, Straße des 17. Juni 135, 10623 Berlin, Germany; Inst. of Prob. of Info. Transmission, 57th Moscow School, Moscow Mathematics Institute, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Hammer, D., Technische Universität Berlin, FB Mathematik, Sekr. MA 8-1, Straße des 17. Juni 135, 10623 Berlin, Germany; Shen, A., Inst. of Prob. of Info. Transmission, 57th Moscow School, Moscow Mathematics Institute, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper deals with two similar inequalities: 2K (〈A, B, C〉) ≤ K (〈A, B〉) + K (〈A, C〉) + O (log n), (1) 2K P (〈A, B, C〉) ≤ K P (〈A, B〉) + K P (〈A, C〉) + K P (〈B, C〉) + O (1), (2) where K denotes simple Kolmogorov entropy (i.e., the very first version of Kolmogorov complexity having been introduced by Kolmogorov himself) and KP denotes prefix entropy (self-delimiting complexity by the terminology of Li and Vitanyi [1]). It turns out that from (1) the following well-known geometric fact can be inferred: |V|2|Sxy| · |Syz| · |Sxz|, where V is a set in three-dimensional space, Sxy, Syz, Sxz are its three two-dimensional projections, and |W| is the volume (or the area) of W. Inequality (2), in its turn, is a corollary of the well-known Cauchy-Schwarz inequality. So the connection between geometry and Kolmogorov complexity works in both directions.
Ключевые слова указателя: Computer science; Mathematical techniques; Cauchy-Schwarz inequality; Geometric fact; Kolmogorov; Kolmogorov entropies; Kolmogorov complexity; Three dimensional space; Two-dimensional projection; Entropy

Название: Production, conversion, specificity of assets, and markets: Constraints for a global restructuring in Russia
Организации: Maître de Conférences, Université de Savoie, Fac. de Dritet d' Econ. de Chambery, BP 1104, 73000 Chambéry, France; Maître de Conférences, University of Savoy, Faculty of Law and Economics, Chambéry, France; Inst. for the Economy in Transition, Gazetnii Per., 5, 103918 Moscow, Russian Federation; Inst. for the Economy in Transition, Moscow, Russian Federation; GTD, Univ. Pierre Mendès France, Grenoble, France; Tacis - Kalimost Program, European Union, France; State University of Kaliningrad, Russian Federation; Grad. School of Business of Grenoble, France; Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Brunat, E., Maître de Conférences, Université de Savoie, Fac. de Dritet d' Econ. de Chambery, BP 1104, 73000 Chambéry, France, Maître de Conférences, University of Savoy, Faculty of Law and Economics, Chambéry, France, GTD, Univ. Pierre Mendès France, Grenoble, France, Tacis - Kalimost Program, European Union, France, State University of Kaliningrad, Russian Federation, Grad. School of Business of Grenoble, France; Malakhov, S., Inst. for the Economy in Transition, Gazetnii Per., 5, 103918 Moscow, Russian Federation, Inst. for the Economy in Transition, Moscow, Russian Federation, Higher School of Economics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The production units of the military-industrial complex operate under the constraints imposed by the general context of the transformation of the socioeconomic system in Russia. So conversion is closely linked to the global transformation: we are dealing with a process and an objective which are totally interlinked with the restructuring process of the whole of the industrial base. Conversion is also undertaken concomitant with the emergence of a decentralised but a more and more theoretical money-based commercial economy (step backwards of the money-based economy, high transaction costs, barter). There are indeed specific constraints associated with the defense sector but these cannot be isolated from a more global analysis so long as the situation in the country's institutions and operating systems remains precarious. The question of conversion in Russia cannot be dissociated from a reflection, on the one hand, concerning the nature and the specificity of the assets of the production units, and, on the other hand, concerning the very concentrated nature of military production activity located over such a vast territory.

Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Polyakov, K.L., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The influence of measurement errors on the exactness of the model identification of physical objects, and thus on the efficiency of their control, is considered. The class of D-robust estimations is introduced, for which the bias has the upper bound proportional to the intensity of distortions. The value of the proportionality coefficient defines the maximum possible bias and can be defined in advance in the design or in the choice of an algorithm. The spectral series and temperature distribution in quantum chaos are studied. This paper is based on mathematical investigations [2-11] and is written in a form intelligible to physicists. © 1998 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc.

Название: Stress - strain state of a blank in superplastic bulk forming under mutual influence of material rheology and contact friction
Организации: Dept. Math. Simulat. Physic-Mech. S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation; Lab. Superplastic Mat. Deformation, Moscow State Stl. and Alloys Inst., 117963, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chumachenko, E.N., Dept. Math. Simulat. Physic-Mech. S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation; Smirnov, O.M., Lab. Superplastic Mat. Deformation, Moscow State Stl. and Alloys Inst., 117963, Moscow, Russian Federation; Chumachenko, S.E., Lab. Superplastic Mat. Deformation, Moscow State Stl. and Alloys Inst., 117963, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Combined influence of rheological behaviour of blank material and blank - die contact friction in bulk forming on required pressure and strain distribution in the blank has been studied by means of FEM based computer simulation of upsetting a cylindrical blank. The required pressure is found to decrease significantly with increasing strain-rate sensitivity exponent ma of blank material at any value of friction coefficient. Influence of the latter on the required pressure is pronounced at lower values of ma and becomes very week for superplastic and Newtonian-viscous materials. The control of strain-rate regime has been used in isothermal bulk forming of a lid of VT3-1 titanium (α+β) alloy (Ti - 6%A1 - 2,5%Mo - 1,5%Cr - 0,5%Fe) to maintain superplastic state in possibly largest volume fraction of the blank. This approach provides the possibility to get the highest, for any particular case, efficiency of practical application of superplasticity in bulk forming with regard to required forming force and productivity of the process.
Ключевые слова автора: Bulk forming; Contact friction; Optimized tool velocity; Rheological behaviour
Ключевые слова указателя: Computer simulation; Finite element method; Friction; Rheology; Strain; Stresses; Superplasticity; Volume fraction; Blank material; Superplastic bulk forming; Forming

The effect of influence temperature and radiation on reflectivity and the bandwidth of Bragg peaks were investigated. Temperature stability in the range up to 400 C was studied. The valuation of the radiative stability of mirrors was evaluated. ©2004 Copyright SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering.

Краткое описание: A program for investigating planetary rings must include purposeful experiments to explore the superconductive material state of the rings. Our hypothesis of the superconductive material state of planetary rings makes it possible to add classical theories of planetary rings with a nonconflicting superdiamagnetic model. It solves many problems of planetary rings by considering the phenomena peculiar to superconductors during interaction with the magnetic field: (Table Presented). ©2005 Copyright SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering.

Организации: M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State Univ., Physics Department, Vorob'evy Gory, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Radio Engeneering, Electronics and Automation, prosp. Vernadskogo 78, 117454 Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation

Vernadskogo 78, 117454 Moscow, Russian Federation; Éminov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics/Math., Bol'shoi Trekhsvyatitel'skii, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Theoretical aspects of the propagation of photons, electrons, and neutrinos in external electromagnetic fields at finite temperature and density are considered. The photon polarisation operator and the radiative mass shifts and anomalous magnetic moments of the electron and the massive neutrino are investigated based on the finite temperature quantum field theory with the use of exact solutions of the relativistic equations of motion for particles in external fields of various configurations. The present approach permits using model results as reference ones for experimental data as well as presenting a wider choice of interpretations for the results obtained.

Название: Scanning probe (tunneling and force) microscopy in metrological problems of nanoelectronics
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Shubnikov Inst. of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Leninskii pr. 59, Moscow, 117333, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The phenomenological characteristics of surface in terms of microgeometry and classical statistics are determined with scanning probe microscopy. Parameters such as peak-to-peak value, surface roughness, skewness and kurtosis, scale correlation function, spectral density and energy spectrum, as well as coherence function, are considered. An algorithm for surface roughness estimation is described. It excludes measurement errors upon positioning a scanner probe and increasing the scan area. Numerical results that characterize the roughness scale and other surface parameters are presented. The problems of statistical analysis, as applied to the surface roughness within the point-scan area-wafer hierarchy, are formulated. Approaches to estimating the resolving power of scanning probe microscopy and methods for image reconstruction are discussed.

The extremal dependences of the concentrations of charge carriers and electron traps with energy Ec-0.24 eV on the oxygen flux are discussed. © 1997 American Institute of Physics.

Авторы: Gvozdev V.I., Petrov A.S., Tatarenko N.I.
Название: Information microwave electronics
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gvozdev, V.I., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Petrov, A.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Tatarenko, N.I., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A variety of problems concerning new areas of super-high-speed processing of massive data arrays and their transmission within local and global networks are considered. Electronics is classified by physical space-time material layers that exhibit electromagnetic properties. General principles and mechanisms underlying the generation of electromagnetic waves, primary data carriers in today's computer systems and communication, are presented. The component basis of analog-digital microwave electronics is analyzed. Miniaturization of the components constituting the information-system hardware by means of nanotechnology is discussed. Process structuring and regularizing to create the functional units of microwave electronics are touched upon. Further evolution of electronics and its physical limits are covered.

Авторы: Arutyunov P.A., Tolstikhina A.L., Krasovskii I.N.
Название: Spectral correlation analysis of experimental data on the electron scattering intensity curve taken in a diffraction experiment
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Russian Federation; Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Russian Federation; Tolstikhina, A.L., Institute of Crystallography, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation; Krasovskii, I.N., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The phase and correlation characteristics, as well as the coherence function, of the electron scattering intensity curve recorded in a diffraction experiment are investigated. Numerical simulation was carried out with operator schemes and the DSPlay software developed by the University of California. They use 128 recorded points of the scattering intensity as input data. The calculated characteristics of the intensity curves for electron scattering by thin amorphous and polycrystalline NiO, Fe 2O 3, and SiO 2 films are analyzed. The obtained numerical results are discussed.

Название: Concerning a stochastic dynamical system
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bezhaeva, Z.I., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation; Oseledets, V.I., M. V. Lomonosov Moscow State University, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We study the discrete-time dynamical system X n+1 = 2σ cos(2πθ n)g(X n), n ∈ ℤ, where θ n is an ergodic stationary process whose univariate distribution is uniform on the interval [0, 1], the function g(x) is odd, bounded, increasing, and continuous, and ℤ is the ring of integers. It is proved that under certain conditions there exists a unique stationary process that is a solution of the above equation and this process has a continuous purely singular spectrum. ©1997 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Continuous purely singular spectrum; Discrete-time dynamical system; Uniformly distributed ergodic stationary process

Название: Use of diamond-like carbon films in X-ray optics
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Res. Institute of Vacuum Technique, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow 113105, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kondrashov, P.E., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Novoselova, E.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Baranov, A.M., Res. Institute of Vacuum Technique, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow 113105, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The possibility to use multilayer structures based entirely on carbon films as reflecting coatings for X-ray optics elements is analyzed. The structures grown by plasma deposition technique contained up to 100 superthin supersmooth layers. It is shown that the X-ray interference can be observed in such structures. Parameters of multilayer structures consisting of superthin carbon layers were calculated for various wavelengths in the soft X-ray range. It is shown that the reflection coefficient of such structures is comparable to that of traditional Me/Me, Me/Si, and Me/C X-ray mirrors but the resolution is greater by a factor of 2-3. Samples of X-ray mirrors were made and their characteristics measured. © 1997 Elsevier Science S.A.
Ключевые слова автора: Application; DLC films; X-ray mirrors; X-ray optics

Vernadskogo 78, 117454 Moscow, Russian Federation; Zhukovskiǐ, V.Ch., M V Lomonosov Moscow State University, Physics Department, Vorob'evy Gory, 119899 Moscow, Russian Federation; Éminov, P.A., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), Bol'shoǐ Trekhsvyatitel'skiǐ per. 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Theoretical aspects of the propagation of photons, electrons, and neutrinos in external electromagnetic fields at finite temperature and density are considered. The photon polarization operator and the radiative mass shifts and anomalous magnetic moments of the electron and the massive neutrino are investigated based on the finite-temperature quantum field theory with the use of exact solutions to the relativistic equations of motion for particles in external fields of various configurations. The present approach permits using model results as reference ones for experimental data as well as presenting a wider choice of interpretations for the results obtained. ©1997 Uspekhi Fizicheskikh Nauk, Russian Academy of Sciences.

Название: Digital-filter synthesis from signal-flow graphs
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, P.A., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Afanas'ev, K.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Theoretical aspects of IIR-filter synthesis from signal-flow graphs with the help of optimization techniques are studied. The transition from signal-flow graphs to various realizations of digital-filter transfer functions is performed with the algorithm reported in [2]. This algorithm and Steiglitz criterion for mean-square-error minimization are used to generalize the Fletcher-Powell nonlinear-optimization method. Sensitivity theory is applied to the calculation of the objective-function gradient.

Название: The two-element system with one restoring device optimum maintenance
Организации: Department of Operation Research, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelskij p., 3/12, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Shnourkoff, P.V., Department of Operation Research, Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Trekhsvyatitelskij p., 3/12, 109028, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The paper considers the problem of the optimum preventive maintenance of the system with two elements and one restoring device. The system's behaviour is described by a semi-Markov process with complex descrete and continuous set of states. Whether the preventive maintenance is performed depends on the state of the system's elements and the level of past life of the element which performs the duties of the main element. The paper contains the solution to the system of integral equations relative to the stationary distribution of a Markov chain included in given semi-Markov process. This results makes it possible to find various-stationary functional on the process trajectories and lead the task of optimum control to searching the extreme value of given function of two real variables.

Название: On the algebraic geometry of S-duality
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karpov, B.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: This paper deals with algebro-geometric questions arising in the verification of the S-duality conjecture for supersymmetric Yang-Mills quantum field theories in the four-dimensional case. We describe all the cases for the gauge groups of rank 1 and 2, where the Gell-Man-Law beta-function is either zero or negative, and point out some series of such cases for gauge groups of arbitrary rank. Realization of one of these series on the complex projective plane demonstrates a relationship with exceptional bundles. ©1997 Plenum Publishing Corporation.
Ключевые слова автора: Exceptional bundles; Four dimensional topology; Gauge group; Supersymmetric Yang-Mills quantum field theories

Авторы: Kondrashov P.E., Smirnov I.S., Novoselova E.G., Yablokov S.Yu., Baranov A.M.
Название: Capabilities of combined studies of DLC films by X-ray methods
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Res. Institute of Vacuum Technique, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow 113105, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kondrashov, P.E., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.S., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Novoselova, E.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Yablokov, S.Yu., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bol. Vuzovsky per. 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Baranov, A.M., Res. Institute of Vacuum Technique, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow 113105, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We demonstrate the possibility of determining a large group of physical properties of DLC films using only one group of methods based on X-ray interference studies. These include methods the determination of the film thickness, material density and roughness of the surface. We present the analysis of possibilities to use the method of the two-crystal X-ray spectrometer to evaluate internal stress and to deduce the modules of elasticity and thermal expansion coefficients of the film. It is shown that this method can be used for the in-situ control of the film parameters during the film deposition in the technological chamber. © 1997 Elsevier Science S.A.
Ключевые слова автора: Deposition; DLC; X-ray

Название: Method of resurgent analysis in atomic collision theory
Организации: Moscow State University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moscow Tech. Univ. Electronics Math., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Sternin, B.Yu., Moscow State University, Moscow, Russian Federation; Shatalov, V.E., Moscow Tech. Univ. Electronics Math., Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We consider the atomic collision problem in the adiabatic approximation. We show that the transition probabilities can be evaluated in this approximation using the tools of resurgent analysis. We suggest a computational algorithm for the transition probabilities and give the mathematical foundation of this algorithm. The analysis is carried out using the example of the two-level Landau-Zener model.

Vuzovskiǐ per., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Omel'yanov, G.A., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The aim of the paper is to give a mathematical description of one of the possible mechanisms of the turbulent dynamo phenomenon. We suggest a scenario of dynamo effect development in which both Reynolds numbers, the hydrodynamic (R) and the magnetic, tend to infinity at the same rate, so that their ratio is a constant of the order of 1. The main result is the proof of the existence of a "fast" dynamo, in which the amplitude of the large-scale magnetic field increases from O(1/√R) to O(1) within a time interval that is small but independent of R as R → ∞. © 1996 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc.

Краткое описание: The volume-metrical microwave monolithic ICs (VMMMIC) design technique enables the combination of several semiconductor structures for different active elements and the integration of physical processes of different nature in one IC. Physical and technological design principles are discussed emphasizing on main functional elements for VMMMICs based on semi-isolating GaAs. Investigations of sample elements indicated great potentials of the design method for the specific distributed microwave amplifier based on the stable negative differential conductance phenomenon in GaAs.

Авторы организаций: Solntsev, Victor A., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A nonlinear electron conductance and the possibility of generating the oscillations in the field emission diode has been studied. A diode operation in the current cutoff regime has been considered. It is similarity with the avalanche transit-time diode has been noted. A great influence of the field non-uniformity near the cathode on the electron conductance and efficiency has been shown.

Название: Mode selection analysis in pseudoperiodical slow-wave systems
Название источника: Trans Black Sea Region Symposium on Applied Electromagnetism
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Solntsev, V.A., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Solntseva, K.P., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A general theory of wave selection in pseudoperiodical slow-wave systems is suggested. In the slow-wave system section of finite length there is a continuous spectrum of wave numbers instead of spatial harmonics. A general relationship for wave amplitudes depending on the pitch distribution and other parameters along the system showed that with linear pitch changes, parasitic harmonics can be suppressed by a factor of 4 or 5. An investigation of a helix waveguide considering a pitch discontinuous jump revealed parasitic harmonics suppression by a factor of 2 even if the waveguide sections are short and 5 pitched.
Ключевые слова указателя: Harmonic analysis; Spectrum analysis; Abstract only; Mode selection analysis; Pseudoperiodical slow-wave systems; Waveguides

Краткое описание: The paper presents new measuring technology based on slow- wave structures (SWS) application. It shows peculiarities and advantages of sensors on SWS. The method is based on the interaction between the electromagnetic wave exited in SWS and the object to be checked up. It deals as well with a transducer for non-contact measurements of surface conductivity and thickness of thin films and conductive layers on dielectric or semiconductor substrates. It shows perspectives of designing other transducers on SWS for measuring different physical parameters.

Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University), 3/12 B. Vuzovskiǐ per, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The family of isoenergetic surfaces H(x, p) = E for an ergodic Hamiltonian flow is considered. The semiclassical correction ih/2[∂/∂τr, ∂/∂E] to the operator ∂/∂τ of differentiation along this flow is derived. The eigenvalues of the resultant operators correspond to differences of the eigenvalues of the corresponding Schrödinger operator as h → 0. We consider the correction to d/dτ corresponding to quasipartfcles of a self-consistent boson field. © 1997 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc.

Название: Analog-digital systems for adaptive measurements and parameter estimation of noisy processes
Название источника: IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement
Организации: IEEE; Institute of Electronics Fundamentals, Warsaw University of Technology, 00-665 Warsaw, Poland; Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Platonov, A.A., IEEE, Institute of Electronics Fundamentals, Warsaw University of Technology, 00-665 Warsaw, Poland, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Szabatin, J., IEEE, Institute of Electronics Fundamentals, Warsaw University of Technology, 00-665 Warsaw, Poland
Краткое описание: The theoretical framework and principles of designing a new class of highly effective analog-digital computer-aided measurement systems are presented. The proposed approach enables the designers to determine uniquely the optimal structure, parameters and characteristics of measurement systems working in the presence of noises and disturbances as well as to carry out the comprehensive analysis of their work. The approach is based on the new idea of the nonlinear adaptively controlled (smart) sensor. The algorithms for optimal processing of the measured data and estimating unknown parameters of analyzed processes or objects, coupled with the optimal adaptive control of the sensor parameters, are derived. The superiority of measurement systems with adaptively controlled sensors over the conventional ones employing nonadaptive sensors is shown. The main theoretical results and conclusions are verified and confirmed via simulations taking as an example the string-frame accelerometer. © 1996 IEEE.
Ключевые слова указателя: Adaptive control systems; Algorithms; Computer applications; Mathematical models; Nonlinear control systems; Optimal control systems; Optimization; Parameter estimation; Sensors; Spurious signal noise; Adaptive measurements; Analog digital computer aided measurement systems; Nonlinear adaptively controlled sensors; Measurement theory

Название: Solutions of the nonlinear wave equation utt = (uux)x invariant under conditional symmetries
Название источника: Journal of Physics A: Mathematical and General
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., 3/12 B. Vouzovskii per., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Foursov, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., 3/12 B. Vouzovskii per., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation; Vorob'ev, E.M., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. Electronics and Math., 3/12 B. Vouzovskii per., Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper we discuss the application of conditional symmetries for obtaining exact and approximate solutions of the equation utt = (uux)x. We propose to use the invariance properties of the infinitesimal conditional symmetries with respect to the classical Lie symmetries in order to explicitly solve the determining equations for the conditional symmetries. Exact solutions invariant under the conditional symmetries are given by explicit formulae, approximate solutions are calculated and presented in the graphical form by using 'Mathematica'.

Название: On sputtering of W-Cu composition by polyenergetic flux of hydrogen particles
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoy Vusovskiy per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; All-Russ. Electrotechnical Institute, Krasnokazarmennaya ul.. 12, 111250 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoy Vusovskiy per., 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Udris, Ya.Ya., All-Russ. Electrotechnical Institute, Krasnokazarmennaya ul.. 12, 111250 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The sputtering of pure W, pure Cu, and W-Cu composition with the polyenergetic flux of hydrogen particles has been investigated. To simulate the operating conditions of the divertor plate in the thermonuclear reactor the high-voltage glow discharge device has been used. The particle energy was distributed in the range from zero to 20 keV. The intensity of the polyenergetic flux of fast particles (positive ions and neutrals) was ∼ 1021 m-2 s-1 at a mean particle energy of 3.5 keV. The experiments showed that the sputtering coefficients of the materials had abnormally high values in these experimental conditions.
Ключевые слова указателя: Atoms; Copper; Hydrogen; Ions; Metallic matrix composites; Sputtering; Testing; Divertors; Tungsten

Краткое описание: This paper is devoted to generalizing to multidimensional systems the methods for constructing controlling devices that were developed for one-dimensional systems. The problem is solved in the presence of indeterminacy in the information about the control object and of a spread in the parameters of the controlling device about their nominal values with present-day understanding of the necessity for it to be well posed and for the designed system to be coarse and robust.

Название: Representation of exact and semiclassical eigenfunctions via coherent states. Hydrogen atom in a magnetic field
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation; Novikova, E.M., Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics Math., B. Trekhsvyatitel'skii per. 3/12, 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Global formulas for eigenfunctions and solutions to the Cauchy problem, including the path integral representation, are obtained using the coherent states technique. The reduction of coherent states via symmetry groups is studied for a transformation from "Bessel" to "hypergeometric" states. The eigenfunctions of the Hamiltonian for the hydrogen atom in a homogeneous magnetic field are expressed in terms of Bessel coherent states. For a small field, after guantum averaging, the Hamiltonian is represented in terms of generators with quadratic commutation relations. The irreducible representations of this quadratic algebra are realized on hypergeometric states. The notion of deformed hypergeometric states is also introduced for this quadratic algebra as an analog of squeezed Gaussian packets of the Heisenberg algebra. The asymptotic equations of eigenfunctions with respect to a small field and a large leading quantum number are derived using these states and their "deaveraging." Some explicit formulas for the Zeeman splitting of the spectrum are obtained up to the fourth order with respect to the field, as well as for lower and upper levels in the cluster, including the case of "incidence on the center.".

Название: Conceptual classification of microwave filters: A review
Организации: Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Gvozdev, V.I., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation; Petrov, A.S., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The current state of selective microwave devices and evolution of basic ideas that can lead to new circuit-design solutions are reviewed. Regular-matrix and evolutionary-search approaches, which form the basis of filter synthesis, receive much attention. Active synthesis is possible if two ideas are implemented. The first one is structuring, whose essence is partition of a complex object into primitive constituents and reverse assembly of the whole object with arbitrary space interelement links introduced. Due to these links, the initial circuit takes on new properties that the constituents lack. The second idea is mutual mapping of target objects, which generally are of different natures and have various space and time scales, through equivalent or mutually mapped mathematical forms. An objective function or objective-function matrix specifies synthesis direction.

Название: Joint distribution of catastrophe moment and additive functional profits
Название источника: Theory of Probability and its Applications
Организации: Moscow Stt. Inst. Electronics/Math., B. Vuzovskii per., 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Inst. High-Efficiency Compl. Syst., Russian Acad. Sci., Vavilov St., 39, Moscow, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: A model is defined of a controlled semi-Markov process with catastrophes generalizing the model of a renewal process with catastrophes investigated by A. D. Soloviev. The two-dimensional vector is considered with each component being an additive functional of the trajectories of this process. An equation is obtained for the joint distribution of these functional and some theorems are proved which describe the structure of expectations and mixed moment depending on the distribution functions determining the control strategy.
Ключевые слова автора: Additive functional; Catastrophe; Control strategy; Controlled semi-Markov process; The structure of a functional; Two-dimensional mixed moment

As is shown, hydrogenated carbon films can be used to create mirrors with high resolution. © 1996 American Institute of Physics.

Авторы организаций: Orlov, A.I., High-School Center of Economics Education, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Problems that arise in the relations between theoretical mathematical statistics and practical statistical analysis are discussed, exemplified by "matching" of sequentially applied statistical procedures. Emphasis is placed on the special case of "matching" encountered in multiple (in particular, repeated) testing of statistical hypotheses. The current concepts and techniques are critically revised. A novel approach based on intensive use of a personal computer is proposed. ©1996 Plenum Publishing Corporation.

Краткое описание: Properties a-C:HI/a-C:HII multilayer periodic structures and individual layers were studied by X-ray diffraction, ESCA, SIMS, optical and electrical measurements. It was shown that obtained multilayer structures can be termed non-classical because they can be formed without changing the layer composition at the interface. The models of a-C and a-C:H layer structure were discussed. The experimental results obtained show that the structure of a-C and a-C:H films cannot be considered as cluster structures.

Название: Models of deep centres in gallium phosphide
Организации: Inst. of Materials for Electronics, Gagarina 1, Kaluga 248650, Russian Federation; Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Vuzovskii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Skazochkin, A.V., Inst. of Materials for Electronics, Gagarina 1, Kaluga 248650, Russian Federation; Krutogolov, Yu.K., Inst. of Materials for Electronics, Gagarina 1, Kaluga 248650, Russian Federation; Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Inst. Electronics Math., Bolshoi Vuzovskii 3/12, Moscow 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The effects of varying the ammonia flux on the concentrations of background Si and free carriers and on deep traps for majority and minority carriers in n-GaP layers grown by vapour epitaxy have been studied by secondary ion mass spectrometry and deep level transient spectroscopy. The contribution from the background silicon to the free carrier concentration in samples variously doped with nitrogen is discussed. It is shown that the deep centre at Ec - 0.24 eV may be attributed to silicon. The model of this centre in the form SiGa-VP accounts for experimental results obtained in the present work and those already reported. The concentration of the dominant nonradiative recombination centre at Ev + 0.75 eV is studied, depending on growth conditions, and its model is proposed in the form of a complex consisting of intrinsic defects.

Организации: High-Current Electronics Institute, Siberian Division, Russian Academy of Sciences, 4 Academichesky pr., 634055 Tomsk, Russian Federation; Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Inst. of Electronics/Math., 3/12 B. Vusovsky per., 109028 Moscow, Russian Federation

Краткое описание: A concept of semiclassically concentrated states is developed on the basis of the Maslov germ theory. Higher approximations of semiclassical trajectory-coherent states and of semiclassical Green function (in the class of semiclassically concentrated states) for a many-dimensional Schrödinger-type equation are constructed. It is shown that, in class of such semiclassically concentrated states, a Schrödinger-type equation (up to any order of ℏ, ℏ → 0) is equivalent, from the viewpoint of calculating the quantum averages, to a closed finite system of ordinary differential equations. © 1996 Academic Press, Inc.

Название: Random polynomials over a finite field

Краткое описание: Random monic polynomials of degree n over a finite field GF(p), chosen uniformly at random from the pn possibilities, are considered. For a random polynomial f, the structural vector ξ(n) = (ξl (n),. . . , ξn(n)), where ξi(n) is the number of irreducible factors of degree i in f, is introduced and the exact and asymptotic (as n → ∞) distributions of various characteristics of the random structure ξ(n) are investigated.
Ключевые слова автора: Asymptotic distributions; Conditional distributions; Finite field; Generating functions; Irreducible factors; Moments; Random polynomials; Structure of polynomials

Краткое описание: The presence of twisted helical flow patterns in the cardiac cavities during ventricular filling and ejection was supposed. This work was intended in order to show that the intraventricular trabeculation plays the determining role in such a flow formation and to find some analytical approaches for its analysis. The morphometric study of human left-ventricular and aortic corrosion casts and dynamic measurement of the aorta by MRI- technique were performed. The data were analysed by means of the 'Mathematica' program. Two groups of trabecules were identified that refer to the inlet and outlet of the ventricular blood flow. The first group consists of trabecules of the free left-ventricular wall. The second group consists of long trabecules going along the anterior left-ventricular wall and intracavital lines of the papillary muscles. Both are twisted clockwise and converge in the flow direction. Each group of trabecules is oriented towards the mitral or aortic valve orifices, correspondingly. It was concluded that the helical trabecular organization acts as flow directing paddles that change their mutual orientation during the cardiac cycle evolution. The reorientation of the flow takes place due to sequential contraction of the ventricular structures. The formalization of trabecular orientation will allow one to calculate improved models of implantable substitutes and auxiliary devices for cardiovascular surgery.The presence of twisted helical flow patterns in the cardiac cavities during ventricular filling and ejection was supposed. The data were analysed by means of the 'Mathematica' program. Two groups of trabecules were identified that refer to the inlet and outlet of the ventricular blood flow. The first group consists of trabecules of the free left-ventricular wall. The second group consists of long trabecules going along the anterior left-ventricular wall and intracavital lines of the papillary muscles. Both are twisted clockwise and converge in the flow direction. Each group of trabecules is oriented towards the mitral or aortic valve orifices, correspondingly. It was concluded that the helical trabecular organization acts as flow directing paddles that change their mutual orientation during the cardiac cycle evolution. The formalization of trabecular orientation will allow one to calculate improved models of implantable substitutes and auxiliary devices for cardio-vascular surgery.

Краткое описание: Computer-aided symbolic and graphic computation allows to make significantly easier both theoretical and applied symmetry analysis of PDE. This idea is illustrated by applying a special “Mathematica” package for obtaining conditional symmetries of the nonlinear wave equation u t = (u u x)x invariant or partially invariant under its classical Lie symmetries. © 1996 Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.

Организации: Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kondrashov, Pavel E., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Smirnov, Igor S., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Novoselova, E.G., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Baranov, Alexander M., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Ivanovsky, G.F., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Multilayer carbon interference structures (MCIS) obtained by interleaving hydrogenated carbon layers were studied. MCIS with period from 115 A down to 20 A were obtained by ion- plasma methods. MCIS parameters in the wavelength range 1.54 Q-44.7 A were studied using x-ray diffraction methods. With the help of a two-crystal spectrometer the MCIS rocking curves for the first Bragg peak were measured. The relations R = f(Θ) were calculated for various wavelengths. The differences between experimental and theoretical results are discussed. It is shown that the use of MCIS leads to the same high resolution as that of KAP crystals. The parameters were calculated for the MCIS that are expected to have a reflection coefficient of up to 70 percent at λ = 1.54 A and a resolution several times greater than that of the traditional Me/C-structures.

Краткое описание: Basic problems of the theory and practice of expert estimation are described. The dogmas of consistency and one-dimensionality are analyzed critically. The paper discusses the main stages of an expert poll, the selection of experts, and mathematical models of experts' behavior (parametric, nonparametric, and data analysis models). Verification of consistency and classification of experts, finding a final opinion, and ude of interval expert estimates are considered. ©1996 Plenum Publishing Corporation.

Краткое описание: A general method for determining the probability of failure-free performance of a redundant nonrecoverable system is developed. Название: Weak and partial symmetries of nonlinear pde in two independent variables
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Vuzovskii per., 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Vorob’ev, E.M., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, 3/12 B. Vuzovskii per., 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Nonclassical infinitesimal weak symmetries introduced by Olver and Rosenau and partial symmetries introduced by the author are analyzed. For a family of nonlinear heat equations of the form u t = (k(u) u x)x + q(u), pairs of functions (k(u), q(u)) are pointed out such that the corresponding equations admit nontrivial two-dimensional modules of partial symmetries. These modules yield explicit solutions that look like u(t, x) = F (θ(t) x + φ(t)) or u(t, x) = G(f(x) + g(t)). © 1996 Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.

Название: A model of global distribution of the exhaust gases from rocket engines in the upper atmosphere
Организации: Institute of Applied Geophysics, ul. Glebovskaya 20b, Moscow, 107258, Russian Federation; Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics
Авторы организаций: Vlasov, M.N., Institute of Applied Geophysics, ul. Glebovskaya 20b, Moscow, 107258, Russian Federation; Grushin, V.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics
Краткое описание: A three-dimensional model of large-scale and global distribution of gases produced in the upper atmosphere as a result of operation of rocket engines was constructed on the basis of a numerical solution of a diffusion equation. The model enables one to describe dynamics of heavy gases and of light ones, for which an escape from the upper atmosphere to geocorona is essential. Space-time distributions of hydrogen and carbon dioxide were calculated for the particular conditions of exhausts. Characteristic times of relaxation for the masses of exhaust gases ejected by modern space rockets vary from several to ten days. Conditions of low solar activity are especially unfavorable from the point of view of possible influence of the gas exhausts on the upper atmosphere. © 1996 MAEe cyrillic signK Hayκa/Interperiodica Publishing.

Название: Perceived control and performance in Russian privatized enterprises: Western implications
Организации: Israel Institute of Technology, Haifa, Israel; Higher School of Economics, Maly Gnesdnikovsky Per 4/2, Rotterdam School of Management, P.O. Box 1738, Rotterdam DR 3000, Netherlands; Fac. of Indust. Eng. and Management, Tehnion-Israel Inst. of Technology, Technion City, Haifa 32000, Israel
Авторы организаций: Gurkov, I., Higher School of Economics, Maly Gnesdnikovsky Per 4/2, Rotterdam School of Management, P.O. Box 1738, Rotterdam DR 3000, Netherlands; Maital, S., Israel Institute of Technology, Haifa, Israel, Fac. of Indust. Eng. and Management, Tehnion-Israel Inst. of Technology, Technion City, Haifa 32000, Israel
Краткое описание: In a detailed study of 20 newly-privatized Russian enterprises, Igor Gurkov and Shlomo Maital ask two important questions concerning ownership and performance. First, who really controls the newly-privatized enterprises and who is generally thought to control them - are they the same? Second, what is the relationship between the type of control - in particular, does one form of control lead to superior performance? The authors find that, for nearly half of the firms, managers were perceived to be the real owners and controllers. But this perception is not borne out by reality. In all of the 20 companies surveyed, across a variety of industries, 51 per cent or more of the stock was found to be distributed among the employees. The implications of this situation for Western firms seeking partners with Russian privatized enterprises is spelled out.

Название: Self-learning intellectual system of expert diagnostics of technological malfunctions in ULSI manufacturing
Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: Moscow State Inst. of Electronics, and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Arutyunov, Peter A., Moscow State Inst. of Electronics, and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Kuznetsov, Mikhail G., Moscow State Inst. of Electronics, and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: The field of Information Intellectual System (IIS) application in technology spreads over solving problems, that cannot be easily formalized and that are connected with the diagnostics and quality control of ULSI. One of the main tasks of IIS in the technology of Microelectronics is the precedent search. Another task no less serious is to mathematically process technological experience using information coded array. The purpose of it is, firstly, to establish interrelation between symptomatic and failures and, secondly, to choose an optimal plan of rehabilitation of the technological process and the crystal. The paper describes the basic concepts and principles of software and mathematical software development for computer system of expert diagnostics of technological malfunctions in ULSI manufacturing. The system includes: data base (DB), knowledge base (KB), and subsystems (of precedent search, expert diagnostics and consultations on rehabilitation). DB and KB contain information of defects. The research prototype of this system was realized on IBM PC 3.5.

Краткое описание: Volume-metrical microwave monolithic IC designs exhibit several significant features that enable the use of a wide range of optoelectronic devices in microwave ICs. In this article, the physical and technological design principles for basic waveguide and resonant elements are discussed. Attention is also directed on the main functional elements for volume-metrical microwave ICs based on semi-isolating GaAs, and on the CAM/CAD methods. Several sample elements are also investigated.

Название: Analysis of the amplification and efficiency in polytron and diode with medium transit angles and decelerating static field
Название источника: Proceedings of the IEEE International Vacuum Microelectronics Conference, IVMC

Краткое описание: The nonlinear phenomena and ultimate characteristics of amplification and generation in vacuum microstructures are analyzed. The effect of the space charge and the static field homogeneity on the ultimate values of efficiency and gain is considered. Numerical simulation of electron motion under the effects of external static electric field, RF field of the gate-anode line, static and high frequency space charge field is conducted. A one-dimension model taking the overtake and return of electrons into account is used. Lastly, results of the negative electron conductance calculation are used to calculate the amplification, efficiency and to define the conditions for generating oscillations for different values of the gate-anode line.

Название: The Zeeman effect for the 'anisotropic hydrogen atoms' in the complex WKB approximation: II. Quantization of two-dimensional Lagrangian tori (with focal points) for the Pauli operator with spin-orbit interaction
Название источника: Journal of Physics A: Mathematical and General
Организации: Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation; Olive, V.M.; Volkova, J.L., Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: On the basis of the complex WKB method, new spectral series for perturbed states of an 'anisotropic' hydrogen atom, taking into account the electron's spin polarization in a homogeneous magnetic field are constructed. These series correspond to conditionally periodic motions of a classical electron in the plane orthogonal to the field direction. The semiclassical wavefunctions are regular in the entire configuration space including the focal points and have the 'superscar' properties near the domain of classical motion, i.e. near the projection of stable two-dimensional Lagrangian tori on the configuration space. Both for Schrodinger and Pauli operators the analytical description of the semiclassical wavefunctions 'superscar' structure is obtained. This structure is non-uniform with respect to the space coordinates and has singularities with respect to the parameter h(cross),h(cross) to 0, near focal points. In the limit case of strong magnetic fields explicit analytical formulae for the semiclassical energy levels are obtained.

Название: Emission properties of an aluminum-lithium alloy
Название источника: Physics, chemistry and mechanics of surfaces
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Bondarenko, G.G., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Shishkov, A.V., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Study of an aluminum-lithium alloy Al-2.2 wt.% Li showed that the material possesses high secondary-electron emission properties at comparatively low working temperatures (300-400°C). The maximum coefficient of secondary-electron emission (σmax = 7) for the alloy activated in the optimum regime (thermal treatment at 450°C for 2 h) was obtained with a comparatively low energy of primary electrons (600 eV). The material also exhibits a low value of the first critical potential (15 ± 2 eV), which is important for the materials used in secondary-emission cathodes.

Название источника: Proceedings of SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
Организации: Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kondrashov, Pavel E., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Smirnov, Igor S., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Novoselova, Helena, Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Baranov, Alexander M., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation; Sleptsov, V.V., Inst. of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Multilayer interference structures (MIS) consisting of alternating diamond-like layers with different parameters were investigated. The structures with periods from 68 Angstrom up to 21 angstrom were obtained by ion-plasma methods. Properties of diamond-like MIS and diamond-like films were studied by x-ray diffraction measurements in the range 1.54 angstrom - 11.8 angstrom and ESCA. The numerical computations of reflecting ability of multilayer diamond-like structures were carried out. The difference between experimental and theoretical results are discussed. It is shown experimentally the feasibility of creating wideband mirrors for the soft x-ray range using diamond-like layers with different electron densities.

Авторы: Belov V.V., Olive V.M., Volkova J.L.
Название: The Zeeman effect for the 'anistropic hydrogen atom' in the complex WKB approximation: I. Quantization of closed orbits for the Pauli operator with spin-orbit interaction
Название источника: Journal of Physics A: Mathematical and General
Организации: Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation; Olive, V.M.; Volkova, J.L., Dept. of Appl. Math., Moscow Inst. of Electron. and Math., Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Using the complex WKB method, new semiclassical spectral series for perturbed states of an 'anisotropic' hydrogen atom, taking into account the electron's spin polarization in a homogeneous magnetic held (the anomalous Zeeman effect) are constructed. They are valid uniformly for all values of the field's magnitude. These series correspond to families (stable in the linear approximation) of periodic and conditionally periodic motions of a classical electron in the plane orthogonal to the direction of the field. The corresponding semiclassical wavefunctions have the property of quantum 'superscaring' in the coordinate space near these classical trajectories of motion. We obtain the limit cases of our semiclassical energy levels for strong and weak magnetic fields. We compare them with the only known approximations, i.e. for the hydrogen atom.

Название: The Hamiltonian structure of equations for quantum averages in systems with matrix Hamiltonians
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Авторы организаций: Belov, V.V., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR; Kondrat'eva, M.F., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Краткое описание: An infinite system of ordinary differential equations for ¯x, ¯p, and for averages of a set of operators is derived for quantum-mechanical problems with a (K×K) matrix Hamiltonian H(x,p), x ε ℝN. The set of operators is chosen to be basis in the space MatKℂ⊗U(WN), where U(WN) is the universal enveloping algebra of the Heisenberg-Weyl algebra WN, generated by the time-dependent operators Î, x−¯x(t) · Î, and P−¯p(t) · Î, where Î is the identity operator and ¯x and ¯p are the averages of the position and momentum operators. The system in question can be written in Hamiltonian form; the corresponding Poisson bracket is degenerate and is equal to the sum of the standard bracket on ℝ2 N with respect to the variables (x, p) and the generalized Dirac bracket with respect to the other variables. The possibility of obtaining finite-dimensional approximations to the infinite-dimensional system in the semiclassical limit ħ→0 is investigated. © 1996, Plenum Publishing Corporation. All rights reserved.

Авторы: Ivchenko G.I., Polepchuk O.V., Khonov S.A.
Название: Concerning a class of similarity tests
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Авторы организаций: Ivchenko, G.I., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR; Polepchuk, O.V., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR; Khonov, S.A., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Краткое описание: A two-parameter generalization of Jaccard's index of similarity is proposed as a class of measures for testing the homogeneity of two independent multinomial samples. The power approach used in modern asymptotic theory of decomposable statistics is applied to the asymptotic analysis of these measures. The asymptotic analysis is amplified by numerical tabulation yielding an asymptotically optimal similarity test in this class of measures. © 1996, Plenum Publishing Corporation. All rights reserved.

Авторы: Lokhov Yu.N., Moskalev I.V., Cherkasov A.S.
Название: Model of precision surface treatment of quartz glass with a bound abrasive
Организации: Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Lokhov, Yu.N., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Moskalev, I.V., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Cherkasov, A.S., Moscow State Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A model of precision surface treatment of silica glass with a grinding tool on a pitch binder was developed. The relationships between the properties of the materials (fused silica, diamond abrasive grains) and the controlled parameters of the process were obtained. Conditions for the efficient removal of the subsurface damaged layer from the specimen under brittle fracture conditions are presented. © 1996, Plenum Publishing Corporation. All rights reserved.

Название: Asymptotics of the solutions to the N-particle Kolmogorov-Feller equations and the asymptotics of the solution to the Boltzmann equation in the region of large deviations
Организации: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Авторы организаций: Maslov, V.P., Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, USSR
Краткое описание: We construct a representation in which the asymptotics of the solution to the Kolmogorov-Feller equation in the Fock space Γ(L1(ℝn)) is of a form similar to the WKB asymptotic expansion; namely, the Boltzmann equation in L1(ℝn) plays the role of the Hamilton equations, the linearized Boltzmann equation extended to Γ(L1(ℝn)) plays the role of the transport equation, and the Hamilton-Jacobi equation follows from the conservation of the total probability for the solutions of the Boltzmann equation. We also construct the asymptotics of the solution to the Boltzmann equation with small transfer of momentum; this asymptotics is given by the tunnel canonical operator corresponding to the self-consistent characteristic equation. © 1996, Plenum Publishing Corporation. All rights reserved.

Авторы: Kondrashov P.E., Smirnov I.S., Sleptsov V.V., Baranov A.M., Elinson V.M.
Название: Multilayer diamond-like structures for X-ray optics
Организации: Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Vuzovskiy per. 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; NPO Vacuummashpribor, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow, 113105, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Kondrashov, P.E., Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Vuzovskiy per. 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Smirnov, I.S., Institute of Electronics and Mathematics, Bol. Vuzovskiy per. 3/12, Moscow, Russian Federation; Sleptsov, V.V., NPO Vacuummashpribor, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow, 113105, Russian Federation; Baranov, A.M., NPO Vacuummashpribor, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow, 113105, Russian Federation; Elinson, V.M., NPO Vacuummashpribor, Nagorny pr.7, Moscow, 113105, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: A new type of multilayer interference structures for X-ray optics consisting of alternating carbon layers with different parameters is proposed. The properties of carbon films and multilayer carbon structures were investigated by X-ray diffraction measurements. The numerical computations of reflecting ability of multilayer carbon structures with an ideally smooth interface and with roughness of the individual layers were carried out. It was found that intensity of the calculated first Bragg peak was much too high compared with the experiment. That is the consequence of both the interface roughness and the random fluctuation in layer thicknesses. © 1995.
Ключевые слова автора: Application; Diamond-like carbon; X-ray diffraction

Название: Stability of continuous and discrete Volterra integro-differential equations by Liapunov approach
Название источника: Journal of Integral Equations and Applications

Per Applicazioni della Matematica, CNR, Via P. Castellino, Napoli, 111, Italy
Краткое описание: The Liapunov method is used to obtain stability conditions on some classes of Volterra integro-differential equations, and it is generalized for studying stability of discrete Volterra equations. As a first application of such generalization, stability conditions for the Volterra linear multistep methods, applied to a general linear system of Volterra integro-differential equations, are derived. © 1995 Rocky Mountain Mathematics Consortium.

Название: Computer aided design of superplastic forming processes based on the SPLEN program set
Организации: Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Chumachenko, E.N., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation; Smirnov, O.M., Moscow State Inst of Electronics and, Mathematics, Moscow, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Stress-strain state in the preform during superplastic forming (SPF) of shells is analyzed in this paper. The problem has been solved by means of the computer program set SPLEN-0 based on the finite element method (FEM). Simulation of the real technological processes of SPF any given axisymmetrical or box shaped shell parts is shown to be possible. Stress and effective strain rate fields for any moment of forming process can be obtained which is essential for developing optimal technological regime of SPF.

Название: Some remarks on quasi-invariant actions of loop groups and the group of diffeomorphisms of the circle
Организации: MIEM (Moscow Institute of Electronis and Mathematics), Bolskoy Vuzovskii 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Neretin, Y.A., MIEM (Moscow Institute of Electronis and Mathematics), Bolskoy Vuzovskii 3/12, Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: We construct the series of quasi-invariant actions of the group Diff of diffeomorphisms of the circle and loop groups on the functional spaces provided by non-Wiener Gauss measures. We construct some measures which can be considered as analogues of Haar measure for loop groups and the group Diff. These constructions allow us to construct series of representations of these groups including all known types of representations (higest weight representations, energy representations, almost invariant structures, etc.) © 1994 Springer-Verlag.

Название: Turning points and phase shifts in ordinary differential equations with saturating nonlinearity
Организации: Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Pereskokov, A.V., Department of Applied Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: In this paper we consider an ordinary differential equation with nonlinearity which becomes constant if the solution amplitude increases. We use a modification of the Kuzmak-Whitham method, solutions of boundary layer type and a model Painleve equation. We constructed a global asymptotic solution including neighbourhoods of turning points and calculated the phase shifts at turning points taking into account the nonlinear character of corrections. An asymptotics of eigenvalues is found. © 1993 IOS Press. All rights reserved.
Ключевые слова указателя: Approximation theory; Boundary value problems; Differential equations; Eigenvalues and eigenfunctions; Mathematical models; Nonlinear equations; Phase shift; Asymptotic solutions; Kuzmak Whitham method; Ordinary differential equations; Painleve equation; Saturating nonlinearities; Turning points; Waveform analysis

Название: Quantum and semiclassical representations over Lagrangian submanifolds in su(2)*, so(4)*, and su(1,1)*
Организации: Applied Mathematics Department, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Авторы организаций: Karasev, M., Applied Mathematics Department, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation; Kozlov, M., Applied Mathematics Department, Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (MIEM), Moscow, 109028, Russian Federation
Краткое описание: Irreducible representations of three simplest Lie algebras are realized over Lagrangian submanifolds Λ (over closed curves, tori, and spheres) in coadjoint orbits. The intertwining operator is constructed which enables to pass from an abstract representation to a "Λ representation." The integral kernel of the intertwining operator involves special "Λ-coherent states." The simple integral formulas are obtained for exact and semiclassical eigenvectors and for solutions of the Cauchy problem over Lie algebras, mentioned in the title. The Hamiltonians considered are nonanalytic in general. copy; 1993 American Institute of Physics.

Название: Basic aspects of settlement structure planning in the GDR.
Организации: Higher School of Economics, Berlin, GDR.
Авторы организаций: Scherf, K., Higher School of Economics, Berlin, GDR.
Краткое описание: Provides a methodological background to the development of a settlement structure strategy in a socialist economy, and highlights the research needs. Then discusses the socio-economic elements of settlement structure planning in the GDR, emphasising regional equality, population growth, and migration.-R.Land

Название: Calculation of the asymmetrical stripline characteristic impedance by self-consistent field method
Организации: Sofia University, Sofia, Bulgaria; Higher School of Economics, Varna, Bulgaria
Авторы организаций: Ivanov, S.A., Sofia University, Sofia, Bulgaria; Voinov, V.R., Higher School of Economics, Varna, Bulgaria
Краткое описание: The application of the self-consistent field methods to the calculation of the asymmetrical stripline characteristic impedance has been investigated. A criterion for iteration procedure is proposed and numerical data for large variety of the strip thickness and width are presented. For some particular cases, where is possible comparison with the results of other authors, the data obtained for the impedance-are in good agreement. © 1979 Taylor and Francis Group, LLC.
Ключевые слова указателя: MICROSTRIP DEVICES

Название: Correlation problems in atomic and molecular systems. V. Spin-adapted coupled cluster many-electron theory
Организации: E. R. No. 139 du Centre Nationale de la Recherche Scientifique, Institut Le Bel, Université Louis Pasteur, 67008 Strasbourg, France; Quantum Theory Group, Department of Applied Mathematics, Faculty of Mathematics; Department of Chemistry, Guelph-Waterloo Center for Graduate Work in Chemistry, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, Ont. N2L 3G1, Canada
Авторы организаций: Paldus, J., E. R. No. 139 du Centre Nationale de la Recherche Scientifique, Institut Le Bel, Université Louis Pasteur, 67008 Strasbourg, France, Quantum Theory Group, Department of Applied Mathematics, Faculty of Mathematics, Department of Chemistry, Guelph-Waterloo Center for Graduate Work in Chemistry, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, Ont. N2L 3G1, Canada
Краткое описание: The graphical techniques of spin algebras are combined with a diagrammatic approach based on the time independent Wick theorem to yield the spin-adapted form of the coupled cluster theory. The general rules for the implementation of this formalism are formulated and illustrated on the basic coupled-pair many-electron theory pertaining to closed shell ground states, for which case the explicit spin-adapted equations are derived. The advantages of the spin-adapted form of the theory are discussed along with the new insights it affords. Copyright © 1977 American Institute of Physics.

Название: Formation and Possible Structure of Covalent Hydrates of Alloxazines
Название источника: Zeitschrift fur Naturforschung - Section B Journal of Chemical Sciences
Организации: Institute of Commodity Science, Higher School of Economics, Poznáń, Poland; Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics, Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa, United States
Авторы организаций: Koziol, J., Institute of Commodity Science, Higher School of Economics, Poznáń, Poland; Metzler, D.E., Department of Biochemistry and Biophysics, Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa, United States
Краткое описание: A slow and reversible hydration of N(l)-unsubstituted alloxazines in aqueous alkaline solutions has been studied. Reaction products stable (kinetically) in neutral and acidic solutions were isolated and investigated by IR, NMR, UV and mass spectroscopy. The possible mechanism of the reaction and the structure of the isolated products is discussed. © 1972, Verlag der Zeitschrift. All rights reserved.
Сокращенное название источника: Z. Naturforsch. Sect. B J. Chem. Sci.

Название: STUDIES ON FLAVINS IN ORGANIC SOLVENTS — III. SPECTRAL BEHAVIOUR OF LUMIFLAVIN
Организации: Department of Products Quality, Higher School of Economics, Poznan, Poland
Авторы организаций: Kozioł, J., Department of Products Quality, Higher School of Economics, Poznan, Poland
Краткое описание: Abstract— The absorption and fluorescence emission spectra of lumiflavin have been studied in nonaqueous solvents of different polarity. The corrected emission spectra show apparent mirror symmetry to the longest wavelength absorption maximum. In view of high molar extinction coefficient of the longest wavelength maximum in absorption spectra, constant polarization of fluorescence across it in dioxane and high values of quantum yields of Buorescence, τ→τ* character of corresponding electronic transition was proposed. Roughly linear correlation was found between transition energies and quantum yields of fluorescence on the one hand, and polarity of solvents expressed in Kosower's ‘Z’ values (excepting acetic acid) on the other. In preliminary experiments it was found that lumiflavin in dioxane and in acetic acid is strongly photodecomposed by the monochromatic(436 nm) light. Copyright © 1969, Wiley Blackwell. All rights reserved
Ключевые слова указателя: riboflavin derivative; solvent; article; fluorescence; spectrophotometry; Flavins; Fluorescence; Solvents; Spectrophotometry

Название: Thin-layer chromatography of cinchona alkaloids. II. Qualitative examination of dihydro-bases of the cinchona alkaloids in commercial products
Организации: Department of General Chemistry, the Higher School of Economics, Institute of Cultivation, Fertilization and Soil Science, Poznañ, Poland

Краткое описание: Fourteen commercial preparations of cinchona bark alkaloids were tested for their hydro-base content by thin-layer chromatography. From the intensity of fluorescence as well as the size and intensity of coloration of the spots, the content of dihydro-bases was assessed, thus establishing the quality of the commercial preparation in each case. © 1965.
